question: The FreeStyle Skin (SKIN) can be easily replaced.
answer:
[Video subtitles] 
 ※ This video is a video without voice.
 1.Please read the manual carefully first and replace SKIN
 2. Use the enclosed tool to separate the main body and stand.
 3. Double-sided tape separation is required when replacing SKIN. Use the enclosed tool to separate the double-sided tape. 
 ※ When removing double-sided tape or containing alcohol, solvent surfactants on the surface of the product, or do not use chemicals such as wax, benzene, and cleaning agents in the product
 4. The lens at the top faces up and slightly lifts the bottom of the SKIN to replace it.
 5. When replacing, do not apply excessive force to the lens at the top of The Freestyle and the speaker grill at the bottom. It causes damage.
 6. Be sure to remove the double-sided tape attached to the body and skin.
 7. When replacing SKIN, make sure to check the operation button and sensor position
 8. Please remove the tag on the double-sided tape attached to SKIN. If double-sided tape is not used, excitation may occur.
 9. Remove the tag at the top in the downward direction and the tag at the bottom in the upward direction. 
 ※ After removing the tag, press both sides slightly to attach well
 10. Assemble the main body and stand. If it is difficult to replace, please contact the service center.

question: The screen is dark.
answer:
A: The screen may look relatively dark depending on the ambient brightness. It darkens the environment, or it darkens the screen mode A clear screen Please set it to . If you shorten the viewing distance, you can watch it on a brighter screen. 
 ※ A clear screen ? It is a screen that can be seen brighter and clearer in bright surroundings. Clear screen setting method
 1.Remote control Please press (home button).
 2. ≡ Please choose (menu).
 3. Set Please choose.
 4. Full setup Please choose.
 5. Screen → Screen mode Please choose.
 6. Use the remote control rudder. A clear screen Please select and use. 
 ① What is LED Lumen? A: It is a unit that displays the brightness that the human eye actually feels, and refers to the total amount emitted by the light source. 
 ※ ANSI Lumen: The brightness of the screen projected on the screen screen is measured based on the American National Standards Institute 
 ② How long does the lamp last? A: The light source of this product is LED, and the optical life standard can be used for about 20,000 hours when used normally. After 20,000 hours, the screen brightness is lowered, not the LED is turned off. 
 ③ Is it possible to change the lens? A: The LED lens of the product can be replaced, and please check with a professional engineer at a nearby service center and receive detailed information. Find Samsung Electronics Service Center

question: Is there any noise while using “Weeing” or “Geeing”?
answer: A: FAN (fan) operation sound may be generated to lower the temperature inside the product. There may be a change in operation sound depending on the change in screen brightness, and it is a regular operation sound to perform functions normally, such as refrigerator compressor or FAN (fan) operation sound, washing machine water supply, dehydration operation sound, etc. It is managed by our strict standards and has nothing to do with product performance and reliability. Q2-1. When the Auto Focus function operates, it makes a “straight” sound. A: It is a normal operation sound generated in the process of automatic focus, and it is an operation sound for focus control, so you can use it with confidence.

question: What is the standard for using commercial batteries?
answer: A: Based on a single port, 50W Power Delivery (PD) auxiliary battery (DC 20V) supported for output can be used. question: Can't the keystone be corrected?
answer: A: We need to check if the film for lens protection has been removed. If the protective film is not removed, the keystone may not be calibrated or malfunction may occur.  It is a very dust-sensitive product, so it is recommended to use a soft cloth (microfiber, dragon) when wiping the lens part. If you are not using The Freestyle (The Freestyle), please put a lens cap on it and keep it. Q5-1. I can't adjust the automatic keystone. A: If the keystone setting is automatic, it may not be accurately corrected depending on the angle of the product (optimal installation state angle) or projection angle. Optimum installation status Like... SAMSUNG logo Is it supposed to go down, When projecting to the ceiling, install it at 45 degrees or higher from the ceiling direction Please check if it is done. If automatic keystone adjustment is not possible, please manually adjust the screen and use it.

question: The product is hot.
answer:
A: Due to the nature of the product, heat may occur when viewed for a long time, but the temperature remains stable due to the FAN (fan) operation inside. Heat is released into the vent for stable operation when used for a long time, and please check if there are any obstacles that block the vent, and if there are any obstacles that block the vent, remove them. Touching around the vents can make you feel hot. Please be careful. If the indoor temperature is high, warm air may enter the vent, which may reduce the cooling effect of the FAN (fan), so in this case, it is recommended to lower the indoor temperature through ventilation. Maintain some system operations such as Wi-fi (wireless network) and Mic (microphone) so that voice recognition is possible even when power is turned off Power consumption is generated for , which can cause heat to be felt in the product. If you do not want this, please change the voice call method in the TV menu or remove the power cord when not in use. Heat generation is not a product defect or operational problem, so please use it with confidence. 
 ※ How to change voice call
 1.Please press the home button on the remote control.
 2. Please select a setting.
 3. Please select the full settings.
 4. General and personal information → Voice function Please choose. 
 5.Bixby Calling Method Please choose. 
6. Waking up with remote control Or Say High Bixby Please select and use it.

question: How do I clean it?
answer: A: When cleaning the exterior, do not spray water or cleaning agent directly on the product, but wipe it lightly with a separate cleaning cloth. However, the plastic part is recommended to use a soft cloth (microfiber, dragon).

question: Can't you use the remote control?
answer: A: The remote control is equipped with a film to prevent battery discharge. It is located at the bottom of the remote control, and if the remote control does not work, the film must be removed. Please check the film location in the picture below and remove it.

question: Domestic A/S Standard Guide for Overseas TVs
answer:
TV products sold overseas, based on domestic A/S It is called "overseas TV" sold overseas (hereinafter referred to as "overseas TV"). This is the A / S standard guide for ). Samsung "Overseas TV" is a product that is not provided with International Warranty (International Warranty), so quality assurance is provided only in the country of sale of the product. If a product defect or defect occurs while using "overseas TV" in Korea, Korea's quality assurance conditions and consumer dispute resolution standards cannot be applied. 
 ※ International guarantee: Free repair warranty period provided overseas However, if it can be repaired in Korea, it can be repaired by applying the warranty period of the selling country (if purchased in the United States, the US warranty period is applied). (Apply from purchase after March 1, 2014) 
 ※ Please be informed through a professional counselor whether it can be repaired or not. (Guidance is possible after checking TV model code and manufacturing number) Check model code and manufacturing number Materials required for the service of products purchased directly from overseas may be delayed depending on the status of service materials in overseas corporations. Only repair of the product or replacement of materials is possible, and if the warranty period has elapsed or there is a failure due to intentional or negligence of the consumer, it will be repaired for a fee. Example) A/S standard for American TV Free repair of products and panels is provided for one year For products less than 101 cm (40 inches), travel expenses are charged regardless of the warranty period when requesting a visit after-sales service. The exchange or refund of the product must be requested directly to the place of purchase in the country where the product was purchased. 
 ※ If a refund is made in Korea due to special circumstances (if approved by the company), it will be refunded based on the price of the product at the time of purchase, and all expenses (tariffs, delivery costs, etc.) will not be included. We apply the depreciation rate of the country of sale after the warranty period has elapsed. Other A/S related precautions In order to receive the after-sales service, you must keep the product purchase receipt and invoice. There is a risk of damage during the transportation process after ordering, but the damage during transportation is excluded from free repair. In some cases, A/S parts need to be imported from abroad, which may take a long time to repair. In the following cases, "overseas TV" will not be repaired, and travel expenses will be charged when a repairman visits. - When requesting after-sales service to acquire the product and resell it to the consumer - When a refurbished product or an individual requests after-sales service of a product that has been arbitrarily modified or altered. Refurbished products: Products that have been returned or scratched due to a simple change of heart or defect, etc., which have been processed and resold; Please contact each vendor to repair the refurbished product. 
 ※ If you use overseas TV in Korea, there are the following problems, so please refer to it for purchase. (Based on products for the United States) - There may be restrictions on viewing due to different cable broadcasting methods. - Subtitles, voice multiples, and stereo functions are not supported. - Broadcast recording function (PVR) is not supported. - The language of the set or remote control is in English. - Korean voice recognition function is not supported. - If the power voltage does not match, a separate trans (transformer) is required. - After purchasing the product, you must install it yourself, and if you request installation, you must pay a separate fee.

question: When I'm watching TV or turning it off or on, it makes a thud.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.When you turn the product on and off to watch TV, you can make various sounds such as "Ttaktak," "Ttuk," and "Ttuk."
 2. This can be caused by shrinkage/expansion of plastic parts according to changes in the temperature of the product or ambient temperature. 
 ※ Screw fastening part, stand, chassis connection part, etc. of the product
 3. This phenomenon is common in products with a lot of heat changes, and it is similar to the sound of a thud as the external temperature drops sharply when the car is turned off in winter, and the sound of a "thud" when water enters a cup containing ice.
 4. If indoor/outdoor temperature changes such as "spring, fall, and winter" are severe during the four seasons, the frequency of occurrence may increase. Especially during quiet or late-night hours, you can feel it louder.
 5. It usually occurs in newly purchased products and the sound can decrease over time. It's not a product problem, so you can use it with confidence.
 6. If there is a lot of noise periodically, please contact Samsung Electronics Service for an inspection. 
 ※ Not intermittent symptoms If you can hear the thud continuously more than 10 times inside the TV, you can expect it to be a TV circuit board symptom. Please get an accurate diagnosis from a professional engineer for that part.

 ※ Mobile devices that support Samsung DeX should be checked at Samsungdex.com. ■ Connect to Samsung Dex
 1.Pull the notification window of the mobile device down from the top of the screen and move to the left to select "Dex"
 2. From the searched device list, select the TV you want to connect to and click Start Now.
 3. In the notification window displayed on the TV screen, press the "Allow" button to accept the connection request.
 4. Complete the connection according to the instructions on the screen. When the connection is completed, the Samsung DeX screen appears on the connected TV.
 5. Mobile devices connected by Dex are automatically displayed on the PC on TV home screen. You can find devices connected to the TV on “My Device”
 6. If you select a device name, you can connect directly to your mobile device.

question: Connecting PC remotely to TV in 2021
answer:
■ Remotely connect to PC
 1.If the Windows PC or Mac is powered on and the remote access option is allowed, it can be connected directly to the remote PC.
 2. Set the PC environment to use the PC on TV function. 
 ※ Windows connection through RDP protocol is supported in Windows 10 Professional version or higher. 
 ※ MAC OS connection through VNC protocol is supported by MAC OS X
 10.5 or higher. [How to Establish Windows Remote Desktop Connection ] 
 ① Please enter Control Panel in the search bar of the taskbar or select the "Control Panel" app in the Start menu → Windows system. 2 Select “System and Security” and click Allow Remote Access on the System. 3 In the System Properties pane → Remote Desktop, select “Allow Remote Connection to This Computer” and click the Apply button. [ Mac Virtual Network Computing Setting Method ] 1 Select Menu → System → Configuration and then "Share". Select the checkbox for screen sharing and remote login from the service. 2 Select the checkbox for screen sharing and remote login. * In Mac OS, if the resolution is not changed, the previous screen may remain while connecting to the remote PC.
 3. Press the home button on the TV remote control to select "External Input" → "PC on TV".
 4. Enter the IP address or profile of the PC you want to access. Enter your PC's user name and password, and select a protocol. 
 ※ Depending on the network situation, screen or voice disconnection may occur, so it is recommended to use wired network connection. 
 ※ When PC enters power saving mode, connection is disconnected and reconnection is not possible. It is recommended to turn off and use the power saving mode of the PC. PC support specification for using PC on TV function - Windows connection through the RDP protocol Windows 10 Professional Version error Is supported by (Windows 10 Home version is not supported) - MAC OS connection through VNC protocol MAC OS X
 10.5 or higher Is supported by

question: The remote doesn't work.
answer:
※ If the remote control does not work, it may occur if the remote control pairing is cut off or the remote control battery is discharged or the battery is consumed.
 1.Take a picture of the front of the remote control through the camera on your smartphone. * For iPhones, it is easier to check with the front camera.
 2. If you see an infrared signal while pressing the power button on the remote control, the remote control is normal. We need to check if the remote control is paired.
 3. If you do not see an infrared signal, charge the remote control through a solar cell or a USB port at the bottom of the remote control.
 4. For the remote control that uses batteries, replace the batteries. The remote control provided may vary depending on the model you purchased. ■ Remote control pairing method
 1.With the TV on, press the Return button and the Play/Pause button at the same time for more than 3 seconds.
 2. The pairing of the TV and the remote control starts. Please proceed with remote control pairing according to the guidance on the screen ■ TV remote control charging method
 1.There is a solar cell on the back of the TV remote control that can charge the remote control.
 2. When the remote control is not in use, the back of the remote control can be placed upward to charge through natural and indoor light.
 3. If the remote control battery is insufficient and does not work, connect the USB cable to the bottom of the remote control and use it after charging.
 4. When charging through a solar cell, be careful not to have the remote control between the sofa gaps or under the table. ■ Initialize remote control (QA60 model ↑) if it is not resolved even after eco remote control pairing attempt Press the Return button and Select button at the same time for at least 10 seconds. Rechargeable initialization Non-rechargeable initialization Initialization due to battery replacement (battery replacement product only) ▶ Please replace the battery of the remote control to suit the polarity (+, -).

question: Is it possible to use domestic products overseas?
answer: Usage guide If you use domestic products purchased from abroad in Korea, you need to check the following two conditions. 1) Voltage/frequency In Korea, 220V power is used, and when purchasing overseas products, you must check if 220V power is supported (freebolt). If the voltage is not right, you need to use Dorance (trans). Electrical safety approval standards are not available if they are different from domestic standards. If you ignore these safety standards and use them, they can cause failures or other accidents. In particular, if it is a product for the Americas, you need to use Dorance (trans). □ Domestic Electrical Safety Approval Standard  □ Specifications for approval of electrical safety for overseas America 2) Broadcasting method / modulation method (color method) You can use it only when the broadcasting method is correct to view the screen by connecting TV and AV products. There are three broadcasting methods: NTSC, PAL, and SECAM, and NTSC method is used in Korea. Products purchased overseas must support NTSC to be used in Korea, and if the broadcasting method is not correct, the screen is displayed in black and white, making normal viewing impossible.

question: Please tell me about Bixby usage function.
answer:
Usage guide Using Bixby: You can control the TV by voice by telling the command to the microphone on the Samsung Smart Remote Control.
 1.To use Bixby, the TV must be connected to the Internet.
 2. To use Bixby, you need to register and log in to your Samsung account. If you press the button, say the desired command, and then take your hand off the button, you can recognize what the user said on the TV and execute the function. Once you press the button, the Find Now button appears at the bottom of the screen. Press the Select Remote Control button on the Find Now item to go to the Bixby usage screen. ▶ Example of using Bixby utterance - TV control: Turn off the power , go back, shut down the whole thing, select the green button. Turn up the volume, turn down the volume, mute it. Show me HDMI number one. Change the volume to 20. What's the volume? ▶ Know Before Using Bixby - Speech recognition language and functions may vary depending on the region. - If a language different from the national language is set, some support features are limited. - The Bixby function is available only when the TV is connected to the Internet. - Even if it is connected to Internet, there may be no response due to Bixby server error. - If Bixby is updated, the existing function operation specifications may be changed. - Bixby function is only available on Samsung smart remote control with built-in microphone and TV with voice recognition function. ▶ Long-distance voice support (using microphone inside remote control) You can start a conversation with Bixby right away by saying "High Bixby" to start by calling Bixby by voice without pressing the remote control voice button. After saying "High Bixby," the Bixby icon is activated at the bottom of the TV screen and the tone rings. Tell me what you want. (Bixby call in Bixby voice setting needs to be turned on)  ᄆ Model that can support long-distance voice recognition function  ᄆ Remote control microphone front reference distance within 1.5M to 2M

question: The voice recognition channel doesn't work.
answer:
Expected cause Voice recognition is not supposed to be turned on, or interactive voice recognition may not work due to network non-use. Voice recognition usage setting 
 ① 'Products before 2013 - You can use it only when you set voice recognition to On. [Menu → System → Voice Recognition → On] Menu → System Voice recognition Voice recognition → Select on 
 ② 'Products after 2014' - The voice recognition function is set to turn on by default, so it can be used without any settings. When voice recognition is fired on the TV main microphone at a general viewing distance such as sofa, normal recognition may not be possible due to ambient noise. More accurate recognition is possible when using the voice recognition function applied to the smart remote control when watching TV at a general viewing distance such as sofa. METHOD FOR USING VOICE RECOGNITION FUNCTION OF SMART REMOTE The voice recognition button. Please press it. Voice recognition on TV screen When the help bar pops up, On the microphone home at the top of the remote control Give me the command. [Note] In the case of camera exterior products, the voice recognition microphone is not built-in and uses a smart remote control Voice recognition is available. When installing an external camera, the voice recognition function can also be used in the TV body. If you can not access the network, you can only use the basic voice recognition command. E.g.) Upload the channel, down the channel In addition to the commands provided by default, if you want to use the voice recognition function more conveniently in this way, No. 11 and No. 7, you need to set up a network to use the interactive voice recognition function. E.g.) 11, 11, 7, 7 [Note] Voice recognition is provided in two ways: basic voice recognition and interactive voice recognition that can be used when accessing the network. Basic voice recognition can be used for channel upload / channel down commands, but commands 11 and 7 are not recognized. If the channel does not work in this way, it is a symptom caused by not setting up a network other than a product, so please set up a network and use it. In order to set up a network, you need a wireless Internet router at home, and if you need to install a wireless Internet router, please request it to an Internet carrier. METHOD FOR USING VOICE RECOGNITION FUNCTION [Menu → System → Voice Recognition Usage Guide] Menu → Customer Support Voice recognition usage guide Experience selection Repeat the operation according to the order.

question: Other functions cannot be executed when using voice recognition.
answer:
Expected cause Malfunction may occur when noise is misrecognized around. Method of action If the noise is severe during the test, the test may stop in the middle. Try again when there is no noise around you. Voice recognition [There may be differences depending on the usage environment ] - Average living noise at home: about 40 dB → optimal recognition - Daily conversation: about 60 dB → difficult to recognize - Listen to music at home: about 85 dB → difficult to recognize - For loud rock bands: about 110 dB → Unrecognizable Set the "voice citizen sensitivity" adjustment to low among voice recognition functions.
 1.System → Voice and Motion Recognition → Select "Voice Recognition"
 2. Voice recognition → Select "voice sensitivity"
 3. Voice sensitivity → Set high in "ring"
 4. Voice sensitivity → Set "recognition sensitivity" to high

question: I can't complete the voice recognition configuration.
answer: Expected cause It may occur when environmental conditions are not met when measuring the distance from the ambient noise TV or commands. Method of action If the noise is severe during the test, the test may stop in the middle. Try again when there is no noise around you. Voice recognition [There may be differences depending on the usage environment ] - Average living noise at home: about 40 dB → optimal recognition - Daily conversation: about 60 dB → difficult to recognize - Listen to music at home: about 85 dB → difficult to recognize - For loud rock bands: about 110 dB → Unrecognizable  During the voice test, the distance should be within 1.5 to 4M from the front of the TV. Try it again.

question: There is a sign that there is no new version.
answer: Method of action "There is no new version on the TV screen If the message " appears, it appears when the Internet (or broadcast signal) upgrade is executed. Firmware upgrade will not proceed if there is no higher version than the software version of the current TV. Firmware version can be confirmed in customer support information. [Entry Method] Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Customer Support → Customer Support Information Check the software version

question: Stop during upgrade.
answer: Expected cause During Internet upgrades, stops due to Internet failures or upgrades through USB cause stops in certain sections due to USB's own problems. Method of action When upgrading the Internet, "There is no new version The message "is a message indicating that the firmware version of the customer's product is the final version and does not require firmware. If it stops or does not proceed during firmware update, the upgrade may or may not stop if it occurs due to Internet communication loss and signal weakness. In this case, please check that network-related items such as smart hubs work normally and proceed so that they can be re-executed. If it is the same when re-running, service inspection is required. If it stops or does not proceed when upgrading through USB, it may occur due to USB itself abnormality, so please proceed so that USB can be executed after saving the changed firmware. If it is the same when re-running, service inspection is required.

question: There is a sign that there is a file to upgrade while watching.
answer:
Expected cause A "file to upgrade" or "new file was found" while watching. Such phrases are displayed when sending firmware upgrade files to improve performance in cooperation with broadcasters It's a message. The above phrase may have different contents for each model. It is a message that appears when we and broadcasters jointly proceed with automatic upgrades to improve product quality and function. You can upgrade according to what you see on the screen.

When all files are downloaded, the OSD on the left is displayed when the channel is switched or the TV is turned off/on. Install now: Once turned off and turned on immediately (at this time, it turns on as an upgraded file ) Later installation: 45 minutes later, show the upgrade confirmation window again Not Installed: Not Upgrading  After installing now, the system is optimized by turning it off and on once. Once completed, the set is turned off and on again.

question: I can't save the recorded contents of the TV broadcast on the computer.
answer:
Expected cause TV and PC are problems caused by different OSs. Method of action This is a problem that occurs when recording TV broadcasting because the format supported is different from PC. Recorded broadcasts cannot be played or backed up on other TVs or PCs due to copyright protection. For reference, PC is Windows-based OS, so it supports FAT16, FAT32, NTFS format, and TV is Linux-based OS, so it supports XFS format. After all, TV and PC are problems caused by different OSs (However, it does not matter when playing) When playing, it means playing a file already stored on a PC or other external device on a TV. 
 ※ Note: All previous data will be deleted when formatting (Required backup) This inconvenience can be reduced when dividing partitions into two (read/write), and please contact HDD manufacturers how to divide partitions.

question: It stops while recording a TV broadcast.
answer:

Method of action The recording function is a function using an external device and is a problem caused by the performance of the storage device. The device's performance is low and cannot be recorded. It is recommended to use other storage devices when a warning window called ' occurs. The performance constraints of the recording function (PVR) are as follows. Memory: Free space of 4GB or more, read/write speed of 20/34mps or more, respectively) - Card reader is not recommended. HDD : A rotation speed of
 2.5 inches or more at 5,400 rpm - 1.8/3.5 inches is not recommended due to unstable power and voltage.

question: Please let me know about USB ODD device compatibility.
answer:
Usage guide When connecting a USB ODD device, it can be used only when the spec is compatible between the TV and the ODD device. ODD interface : A / V connectivity (connectivity) function must be supported. TV cannot be connected if A / V connectivity is not supported on ODD device. Connection : Only TV USB (HDD) terminals can be used. - The USB (HDD) terminal uses 5V 1.0A spec. - Check voltage / power spec when purchasing ODD device Encoding: The codec of the ODD device and the codec supported by the TV must match. [ AV Connectivity ] What is the function? Ordinary ODD refers to a function that cannot be used by connecting to a TV, but USB flash memory such as a TV can be used like usable USB memory. How to use the AV connectivity function
 1.If you touch the open/close button twice within 1.5 seconds while the ODD tray is open, it switches to AV system support mode and the LED remains lit.
 2. After that, whenever the open / close button is touched twice, ODD is repeatedly switched to normal ODD mode and AV system support mode.

question: I want to know whether to upgrade the codec or not.
answer: Usage guide What is a codec? - Compressor / decompressor is a compression / restoration technology for digital video and audio. PCs can be used as installed playback program upgrades if there is a new codec, Unlike PCs, devices such as navigation, PMP, and smartphones, including TVs, have a decoder chipset with codec information built into the product, so only codecs supported by the decoder chipset can be used.  Decoder chipsets do not support upgrades because they cannot be upgraded through software.  For videos that cannot be played, please use encoding-only software on your PC before connecting to the TV and use it after the encoding process. Type of codec (CODEC) QLED TV / The Serif / The Frame / The Sero LST05 model example) Since 2018, we do not support DTS codecs due to license efficiency. Supported codec information for each model can be found in the manual. Refer to the license)

question: Please let me know how to test HDMI cable for TV products in 2020.
answer: Usage guide If malfunction symptoms such as blinking or power off occur while connecting the TV and external devices to HDMI, you can check for abnormalities in the connected HDMI cable using the HDMI cable test function built into the TV. [Note] This feature is only available in the 19-year TV software version 1303.7 or higher. If there is no HDMI cable test function, please update to the latest version software and use it. If you connect a TV and an external device (set-top box, game console, etc.) with an HDMI cable, it is recommended to use a genuine cable. If the certified HDMI cable is not used, malfunction symptoms may occur due to communication errors. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable. [20 HDMI Cable Test Method] Remote control home button → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → HDMI Problem Inspection Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Customer support → Move device care [Move] by self-diagnosis Select [Video Test] Select Video Test [Check] Select an external device to diagnose Do you see the connected screen without any problems [Yes or No] selection Completion of checking connected device problem [No selection screen due to connected product problem] HDMI problem diagnosis [Test start] Cable test in progress (takes about 2 minutes) If there is a problem with the HDMI cable, please replace the connected HDMI cable with a genuine cable and use it.

[Setting Method] Home button → Settings → Customer Support → Device Care → Self Diagnosis → Video Test Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Customer support → Move device care [Move] by self-diagnosis Select [Video Test] Select Video Test [Check] Image test complete. If the image is displayed normally, symptoms may occur due to broadcasting signals or abnormalities in external devices. If the problem continues, you need to check the external device or check the connection status. Video Test [Example] Selection Screen Video Test [No] Selection Screen If the video test is not normal, you need to check the TV and check if the software version is up-to-date.

question: The color spreads when you lie down and watch it.
answer: Symptoms of occurrence The screen may look dark depending on the location (angle) you are watching. The cause of color blur due to the viewing angle is that LCD / LED products block light using liquid crystal, and since the liquid crystal itself does not emit light, color blur and darkening symptoms may occur depending on the angle of watching TV. Also, liquid crystals are divided into two types according to their purpose. The PVA panel, which is mainly used for TVs, has an excellent side viewing angle compared to the TN panel, so you can watch it from the side with a similar image quality to the front. However, due to the panel characteristics, it is not 100% the same as watching from the front. The liquid crystal is divided into a PVA panel for TV and a TN panel for monitor. The TN panel, which is mainly used for monitors, has good light transmittance when viewing the front, enabling clear image quality, but the image quality is much lower than the front when watching the top, bottom, left, and right sides. Since it is a panel mainly used for monitors, the front viewing characteristics are good, but the image quality is poor due to the panel characteristics when viewing the side. Due to the characteristics of the side viewing angle, you can feel the symptoms of color blur and darkening when lying down and watching the side, and please refer to this as a symptom caused by the characteristics of the TN panel, not the abnormality of the product.

question: Only certain channels don't come out.
answer:
Expected cause - It may be caused by a broadcast signal abnormality. - It may occur due to abnormalities in internal circuits, panels, etc. Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide If a line occurs only in a specific channel, it may occur beyond a broadcast signal, not beyond a product. If there is an abnormality in the product, a line is formed in the same location of all channels, but if a line is generated by a broadcast signal, the position where the line is formed varies from channel to channel. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. When you press the menu button on the remote control, you can check for product abnormalities using the menu window displayed. ☞ If the line appears to be covered by the menu window, it is necessary to check the broadcast signal as a symptom of a line occurring due to a broadcast signal abnormality. In this case, you should contact the broadcasting company to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. ☞ If the line appears on the menu window as it is, it is a symptom of product abnormalities and an engine senior visit inspection is required. Self-diagnosis image quality test confirmation [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample images stored on TV are displayed] During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if the high-definition image is clearly visible without noise , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. TV Soft Version Upgrade In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster for a set-top box or broadcast signal inspection [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. There are two ways to upgrade: USB or network.
 1.When upgrading to USB Samsung Electronics Homepage Access → Customer Support → Model Search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file → Save it in USB memory after decompression → Connect USB TV
 2. When the network is connected You can update it directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. [Installation Method] Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update Now

question: What is SUHD Quantum Dot TV in 2015?
answer: Product guide Quantum Dots? It refers to semiconductor crystals of nanoparticles of 1/10000 size of hair.  [Nanocitran] A sheet made by adding semiconductor particles (quantum dots) of 2 to 10 nm in the form of a film is called a "nanosheet." Quantum Dots Principle? When the blue LED is passed through the nanosheet, the color that can be seen with the human eye looks different depending on the size of the quantum dot. Using this principle, we can use different particle sizes Quantum dots are distributed in nanosheets to increase red and green color reproducibility. → TV made with this principle is called QDTV or SUHD.

question: Only certain channels have poor image quality.

In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. question: I can't get a voice after connecting the set-top box, converter, and IPTV.
answer: Expected cause It may not come out depending on the cable connection status, STB (set-top box) and TV volume control. Method of action Check the volume adjustment of TV and set-top box If the volume of either the TV or the set-top box is low, the voice may be small or inaudible. In this case, you need to adjust the volume of the TV and set-top box, respectively. When adjusting the TV volume, it is displayed from 0 to 100 on the left / right side of the screen, and when adjusting the volume of the set-top box, it is displayed from 0 to 30 at the top of the screen. Check the volume of the set-top box. Check the TV volume. Self-diagnosis sound quality test confirmation This symptom may occur due to a broadcast signal or TV abnormality, and the sound quality test function can check whether the product is abnormal or not. [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test] Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Customer support → Move self-diagnosis Select [Start sound quality test] During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the voice is heard normally, noise occurs due to the broadcast signal problem, not the product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If the played sample sound voice is not heard, the TV speaker volume should be adjusted to 15 or more, and if it is still the same, initialization should be carried out. Check HDMI cable It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. If the authenticated HDMI cable is not used, communication errors may cause voice inaudibility symptoms. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI If you do not have the phrase, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable and use it.

question: When the remote control is operated, Samsung TV, Samsung Smart Monitor, and Samsung Premier Projector work together.
answer:
Symptoms of use After installing Samsung TV, Samsung Smart Monitor, and Samsung Premier Projector in the same space such as living room and AV room, the product works together when the remote control is operated. Cause of occurrence Samsung video products such as Samsung TV, Samsung Smart Monitor, and Samsung Premier are designed with the same remote control (IR) system, so if they are installed in the same space, they affect each other and perform the same operation. Power off/on, volume up/down, channel up/down, home and direction buttons, etc. Method of action
 1.It is not recommended to install these products together in the same space . Install Samsung TV on Premier Projector, install Samsung Smart Monitor next to Samsung TV, etc.
 2. If it is a smart remote control (Bluetooth remote control) model, Bluetooth (BT) pairing must be performed between the products . When pairing, the rest of the buttons except the power button can operate 1:1 between products. (Please select power on and off near the product) . Pairing between TV – TV remote control (pairing if there are multiple TVs) . Smart Monitor – Pairing between Smart Monitor remote control . Premier Projector – Pairing between Premier Projector remote control Remote control pairing method Press the Return button and Play button for 3 seconds at the same time toward the TV.

question: The input mode changes automatically.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to external device abnormality or TV malfunction. Method of action Check event log In the case of 2019 products, the event log function is applied, and a function to check the operation of the TV is added due to external devices. You can check whether the event log function automatically changes the input mode with an abnormal signal from an external device. [Setting Method] Home → Menu → Customer Support → Customer Support Information → Under Direction Key → Check Event Log Event log information No event log information If there is information in the event log, the TV is operated by an external device, and the symptom of automatically changing the input mode If it matches the date of occurrence, you should check the external device. If there is no information in the event log, it is necessary to update the TV to the latest version and use it if it is not malfunctioning by an external device. Initialization method If the input mode is automatically changed, it may occur as a TV malfunction symptom, and in this case, it must be initialized under factory shipment conditions. After [Caution] initialization, you must proceed with the initial setup. ■ ~ 2009 model Initialization function is not applied. → Remove the power cord for about 1 minute and reconnect. ■ 2010 ~ 2011 model Press the [End] button in the middle of the remote control for 10 seconds. In the center of the TV screen, "Revert all settings to their initial state. "A message is displayed and select OK to proceed with initialization. ■ Models after 2012 Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Initialization] Password [0000] Enter Select [Initialization] [Check] Reboot when selected and initialization completed HDMI-CEC Configuration Method If the TV and the external device are connected to the HDMI terminal, the input mode may be automatically changed due to the HDMI-CEC communication error. This is not a product problem, but a symptom caused by incorrect communication between TV and external devices, and can be set to prevent communication through HDMI. Menu → System Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) When checking to turn on Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) Select Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) off [Note] HDMI-CEC is not a function applied only to Samsung products, but a communication standard used worldwide Misoperation may occur due to different communication contents used by Samsung and communication contents used by set-top box manufacturers, Even if you choose to turn off HDMI-CEC, you can use the same video / voice transmission through HDMI terminal. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware Software malfunctions applied to TVs can cause off symptoms while watching. The upgrade method is as follows.
 1.Upgrade to USB Samsung Electronics Homepage Access → Customer Support → Model Search → Download → Firmware → Download Firmware File → Save to USB memory after decompression → Connect USB TV
 2. When the network is connected You can update it directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. [Installation Method] Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update Now Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu – Customer Support – Soft Upgrade Select [Software Update] Select [Update now] After checking the update, proceed with the update

question: STB (Settop Box) cloudy, cloudy, and unclear.
answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by unstable broadcast signals. Jeongsang-myeon Abnormal (cloud, blurry) Abnormal (screen glitter) Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide In the case of symptoms occurring on a specific channel, they may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. TVs can watch digital and analog broadcasts at the same time, which can occur if the broadcast signal is weak when watching analog wired broadcasting channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Self-diagnosis method If the image quality looks bad, it may occur due to broadcasting signal problems, TV abnormalities, and abnormality of the product can be checked through the image quality test function. ■ How to enter image quality test [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] will be conducted. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality ■ How to enter 2017 model image quality test Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self-diagnosis → Screen Test.
 1.Press the home button of the remote control
 2. Move lower left [Settings]
 3. Menu → Move customer support
 4. Select [Self Diagnosis]
 5. Select [Start Screen Test]
 6. Check the sample image shown on the TV During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if the high-definition image is clearly visible without noise , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. How to change HDMI connection status When connecting the TV and the set-top box, you can watch the broadcast by connecting to the component and HDMI terminal. When connected to the HDMI terminal, it can be viewed with the best image quality, and when connected to the component terminal, the image quality may be lower than that of the HDMI terminal. Since basic component cables are provided when installing set-top boxes, HDMI cables must be purchased separately if you want to watch in higher definition. HDMI cable purchases can be made at nearby service centers and Internet open markets. TV/External Input of TV Remote Control Press the button. In the external input list, the set-top box connection terminal Please check (component / HDMI) Resolution checking method If the connection status and resolution are set low with the set-top box, the image quality may look bad. Let's check the connection status and set-top box resolution settings. ■ Press the [Information Display] button on the remote control Smart remote control General remote control When you press the information display button at the bottom of the TV remote control, the connection terminal / resolution is displayed in the upper left corner of the TV as shown in the figure below, and the 1920*1080 resolution must be set in the set-top box You can watch the broadcast in HD high definition. If the resolution of the set-top box is set to 1920*1080 or less, you should contact the broadcaster to change the resolution setting. [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] Resolution - 720p Resolution - 1080i ■ Note If the resolution is not displayed even if you press the information display button on the TV remote control, it may occur when the integrated remote control is set. In this case, if you press the TV / external input button to select the TV mode and select the external input mode again, you can check the resolution status in the upper left corner of the TV screen. METHOD FOR RECONNECTING CABLE AND REMOVING SET-TOOP BOX If it is cloudy or unclear while watching a broadcast through a set-top box, it may be caused by a set-top box or a weak reception of a broadcast signal. In this case, you should contact the broadcaster for a set-top box or broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. ■ Checklist
 1.Turn off the power to the TV and set-top box (OFF), separate the cable on the back of the TV, and reconnect (HDMI, component).
 2. If it is difficult to separate from the TV, please disconnect the cable from the set-top box and reconnect (HDMI, component).
 3. Turn off the main switch on the back of the set-top box (OFF) and turn on the power again in a minute (ON).
 4. The set-top box booting process takes at least 1 to 10 minutes and is completed when the broadcast comes out normally.

If the certified HDMI cable is not used, communication errors may cause poor image quality while watching. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase Please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable and use it. question: Screen, no voice.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to switching to external input mode, set-top box abnormality, or power abnormality. Method of action Check to switch to external input mode It is necessary to check the power status of the set-top box and check the conversion of external input. The back of a TV External device connection After checking the terminal, Select external input Do it, please. Example of external device connection External input selection example How to check the power status of the set-top box If the power of the set-top box is turned off when watching the broadcast by connecting the set-top box and the TV, the 'input signal is weak or absent. 'Message may be displayed. Pressing the power button of the set-top box remote control or the set-top box body turns on the green lamp on the set-top box body and turns on the set-top box power. Check reconnection after disconnecting power outlet It is necessary to check the connection status of the wall power outlet. There may be cases where the wall power outlet is not connected or the power is not generated due to a wall outlet abnormality.
 1.Please disconnect the TV power cord from the wall outlet and reconnect it.
 2. Please connect other electronic products such as cell phone charger and hair dryer to the wall outlet to check if they work normally. Power cord connection missing Power cord normal connection status Check the reconnection after disconnecting the power cord on the back of the TV When adjusting the TV angle to the left/right for TV viewing or when lifting the TV for external device connection (HDMI, USB, PC) in the wall-mounted installation state The power cord contact on the back of the TV is loose and seemingly normal, but it may be caused by no power cord contact. In this case, disconnect the power cord on the back of the TV and reconnect the power cord. When reconnecting the power cord, you need to plug it in so that it can be contacted well. TV rear power cord Loose contact TV rear power cord Connection separation TV rear power cord Reconnection Check the power switch of the multi-tap In order to improve energy efficiency, it can usually occur when the multi-tap power switch is 'off'. Please change the power switch of the multi-tap to 'on'. You can use it normally after checking the power switch of the multi-tap. Multitap OFF status Multi-tap ON state Multi-tap individual power off state Check the connection status of the multi-tap If all products such as TV, set-top box, DVD, and mobile phone charger connected to the multi-tap are not powered on, it may occur more than the multi-tap, and in this case, please replace the multi-tap with a new one. If it has not been resolved, I recommend you to check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.

question: Only half of the screen comes out.
answer: Expected cause It may occur due to an abnormality in the broadcast signal or an abnormality in the product. Symptoms that do not appear in the left / right half Symptoms that do not appear in the upper/lower half Method of action Check other channel change Symptoms with only half of the screen may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality or a product abnormality. In this case, it is necessary to change the channel you are watching to another broadcast channel to check if it occurs the same. If it is displayed as normal when changing other channels, it is necessary to check the broadcast signal. If you use a set-top box, it may occur due to more than a set-top box or a connected cable. Image quality test diagnosis confirmation Home → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test Press the remote control home button Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Start image quality test] Sample image stored on TV is displayed When conducting the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, but the image is not seen in half If it looks normal, it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Check One Connect Cable This may occur if the One Connect cable is not connected normally, In this case, please disconnect and reconnect the One Connect cable. Remove and reconnect the One Connect cable on the back of the TV Remove and reconnect the One Connect cable on the back of the One Connect If it has not been resolved, I recommend you to check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.

question: I can see a round light on the screen.
answer: Expected cause It may occur due to broadcasting signal abnormality or liquid crystal abnormality . Method of action Broadcast signal check Symptoms of a round light leaking on the screen only on a specific broadcast channel can be caused by a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. If there is an abnormality in the liquid crystal or mainboard of the product, it occurs equally on all channels, but if it occurs on a specific channel, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, etc.) you are watching to check the signal. Self-diagnosis confirmation method - It is possible to simply diagnose the abnormality of the product using the self-diagnosis function that can check the abnormality of the TV product. ■ Setting method - Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Screen test [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start screen test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed] [If there are no symptoms of the problem, select No] [Select to close image quality test completion] When the image quality is tested, the sample image is played on the screen, and the image is clearly visible Image quality abnormalities may occur due to abnormalities in external broadcast signals, not product abnormalities. In this case, you should contact the cable broadcaster you are watching for a signal check. If the sample image is not clear during the image quality test There is a possibility that it may occur due to internal symptoms of LCD panel or TV. Please get an accurate diagnosis from a professional engineer for that part.

question: Please tell me how to set the art mode.
answer:
Art mode setting method Available for How to Set The Frame Art Mode. Using Art Mode It is a function that displays image content such as works of art or photos as a frame without watching TV. Remote control When the button is pressed, it is switched to TV mode or art mode. In art mode If you press the button, press the button to switch to TV mode. In art mode, the brightness and color tone of the TV are automatically adjusted according to the surrounding illuminance environment, and the TV can be turned on or off automatically. (When the ambient brightness becomes dark, the screen becomes dark and is set to turn off after a certain period of time) In art mode, you can connect to the TV using the Smart Things app on your mobile device to retrieve photos from your mobile device. ■ Recent appreciation You can manage recently selected images. ■ Samsung Collection You can select images for multiple topics. (11 themes including landscape, architecture, etc.) ■ My collection You can check your favorite works or photos in Favorites, and you can select images stored on external storage devices or mobile devices and save them in your photos. ■ Art Store You can go to the art store and purchase various images. (Network required) ■ Enjoy images by time zone
 1.Use the direction button on the remote control to go to Samsung Collection or My Collection.
 2. Use the direction button on the remote control to move to one of the submenus.
 3. Use the direction button on the remote control to move to the option at the top.
 4. Press the Select button on the remote control when the work change item appears.
 5. Use the direction button on the remote control to select the time when the image will be replaced and then press the select button. ■ Import images stored in external storage
 1.Connect the external storage device where the image is stored to the TV.
 2. Use the direction button on the remote control to move to my collection and then to the connected external storage item.
 3. Use the direction button on the remote control to move to the option at the top and select Save.
 4. You can select an image by moving to the desired image using the direction button of the remote control and pressing the selection button. (Multiple selection is possible)
 5. Use the direction button on the remote control to copy to my picture at the top and press the select button.
 6. The selected image is saved in my photo. Recommended resolution: 3840 x 2160 (16:9) ■ Purchase images from art store
 1.Use the direction button on the remote control to move to the art store item.
 2. Use the direction button of the remote control to move to the desired topic and press the select button. Images that correspond to the topic appear on the screen.
 3. Use the direction button of the remote control to move to the desired image and press the select button.
 4. To purchase the selected image, use the direction button on the remote control to move to the purchase at the top and press the selection button.
 5. Select the payment method you want using the direction button on the remote control and press the Select button.
 6. Please proceed with the payment according to the instructions on the screen. ■ Join Art Store Membership
 1.Use the direction button on the remote control to go to the art store.
 2. Use the direction button on the remote control to move to membership.
 3. You can sign up for membership by entering the necessary information according to the instructions on the screen. You can use the art store without restrictions, and you can enjoy a variety of works by replacing them with new works every time they suit your taste.

question: Please let me know how to test the image quality among the self-diagnosis functions of the 2020 TV.
answer:
Function guide If the TV screen does not appear properly, it is possible to simply diagnose whether the cause is due to an external environment such as a product or broadcast signal and cable. Setting method (2020) - Remote control home button → Settings → Customer Support → Device Care → Self Diagnosis → Image quality test Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Customer support → Move device care [Move] by self-diagnosis Select [Quality Test] Select Image Quality Test [Check] The test photo is displayed. Image quality test complete 
 ① If the diagnosis results are normal, symptoms may occur due to broadcasting signals or abnormalities in external devices. 
 ② If the problem continues, you need to check the external device or check the connection status.  
 ③ If the image quality test is not normal, three additional tests are possible through [No]. 
 ④ If the additional test images are the same, it is necessary to check the TV and check if the software version is up to date. Image quality test [Example] selection screen Diagnosis result (explanation) Image quality test [No] selection screen Image quality test 3 times failed phrase During the image quality test, a sample image is played on the screen, and if the image is clearly visible, abnormal image quality may occur due to abnormalities in external broadcast signals, not product abnormalities. question: Please let me know how to initialize the TV.
answer:
1. If you want to restore the set value when using the TV, or if the TV stops working or shows no response, you can initialize the part or the entire TV.
 2. [Please reconnect the TV power. ] First, disconnect and reconnect the power cord of the TV completely.
 3. [Screen Initialization Method] If the screen is strange or you want to restore the screen adjustment (set), enter the home and proceed with initialization by entering Settings → Screen → Expert Settings → Screen Initialization.
 4. [Acoustic Initialization Method] If the sound is strange or you want to restore the sound adjustment (set), enter the home and proceed with initialization by entering Settings → Sound → Expert Settings → Sound Initialization.
 5. [Network Initialization Method] If the network is strange or you want to restore the network settings, enter Home → Settings → General → Network → Network Initialization and enter Initialization. (The router name and password are initialized, so please take notes in advance)
 6. [Smart Hub Initialization Method] If the smart hub is strange or you want to restore the smart hub and app installation, enter Home → Settings → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Smart Hub Initialization and proceed with initialization. (All apps such as Samsung account, TV Plus, etc. are initialized )
 7. [Request method for remote service support] If you want to initialize the entire TV to the first purchase state, the call center will remotely access and initialize it. Enter Home → Settings → Customer Support → Remote Support or Service Support Request and call 1588-3366 to request TV remote consultation. 
 ※ When initializing the entire TV, it is the same as the beginning of product purchase, so please take notes of the router name and password in advance.

question: The 2020 TV screen is blinking.
answer:
If the entire TV screen blinks, it is likely to be an abnormality in the broadcast signal or external device signal, or an abnormality in the cable that transmits the signal. Check and reconnect antenna cables If you are watching TV with an antenna, please completely separate and reconnect the antenna connection line between the TV and the wall terminal. HDMI Cable Test Method
 1.Select the Home button or Menu button → Settings → Customer Support → Device Care → Self Diagnosis → 'HDMI Problem Check' on the TV remote control.
 2. Please select the input terminal you want to test.
 3. If the connected screen looks fine, please select “Yes”.
 4. Adjust the volume. If you hear the sound of the connected device without any problems, please select “Yes.”
 5. If the cable is normal, no problem is found.
 6. But if you can't see the screen or hear the sound, choose No.
 7. Please choose to start the test.
 8. Depending on the condition of the cable, it may take 1 to 3 minutes, so please wait.
 9. When diagnosing HDMI cable problem, check the connection status and replace it with a genuine cable. Check and reconnect HDMI cable when using set-top
 1.I recommend you to use a genuine cable. If the authenticated HDMI cable is not used, the screen may not be visible or a connection error may occur.
 2. Connect the set-top box and TV to check if the external input connection line such as HDMI is connected normally when watching the broadcast.
 3. If the same symptoms continue to occur, abnormalities in the broadcast signal or external device signal may occur. Please contact the cable company for a signal check.

question: I want to know the terms of Samsung TV.
answer:
Question content I'm comparing the specifications for a long time, and I have a question.  Sound DNSe+ , Speaker type Down Firing + Panel of Full Range display - Crystal black panel, what is CMR? Also, there is one marked with Hz, 240Hz. What's the difference? Answers
 1.Acoustic DNSe+ It is a sound field effect technology developed by Samsung Electronics that reinforces the sense of space and sound such as stereophonic sound, bass reinforcement, noise environment response, and EQ.
 2. Speaker type Down Firing + Full Range Down Firing refers to a structure in which driver units are placed facing the floor to strengthen the omnidirectional characteristics of low and ultra-low sounds and increase space control. Full Range is a speaker that plays the entire band from high to low with one speaker.
 3. Panel of Display - Crystal Black Panel General black panels and crystal black panels are types of panels, and film coatings are applied to the screen to realize clearer and more accurate contrast ratios, and in order to distinguish the degree of this coating, The name is expressed in two ways. The panels include crystal black panels, natural black panels, and black panels, and have the following characteristics. Less reflective order ☞ Crystal black panel → Natural black panel → Black panel order (black panel is least reflective) Good order of image quality (light and shade ratio) ☞ Black panel → Natural black panel → Crystal black panel order (Crystal black panel is good)
 4. What's CMR? CMR is short for Clear Motion Rate and is a notation of how clear the motion can actually be compared to 60Hz.
 5. Also, there is one marked with Hz, 240Hz. What's the difference? One screen that displays the screen is called a frame, and the number of frames increases as the HZ increases, and the longevity of the screen displayed in one second increases. The screen is displayed more smoothly.

question: I'd like to know about the Digital Butler.
answer: Function guide  The digital hub is a feature of Samsung Smart TV, which allows you to view all connected devices and devices at once and connect them to the TV. The digital hub can create a list of all connected devices and shows everything at once on a large screen.    Home appliances have various connection methods such as Bluetooth/Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)/Wi-Fi. The digital hub connects supported devices regardless of the connection method, so there is no need for a separate distinction. In addition, IR remote control devices that are not connected to the Internet can be connected to IR signals on TVs through digital hubs.  Devices that require registration can be easily detected and connected through alarms. In addition, other devices (SmartThings devices, Set-top boxes, etc.) already registered on Samsung Smart TV can be controlled as digital hubs without separate registration.   - Features and user interfaces may vary depending on the model and region. - This feature may not be supported when purchasing a product. - Digital hubs may not be supported for some products and features.

question: When using the TV set-top box in 2020, the power is turned off or on intermittently.
answer:
If the power is turned off or on intermittently when using the set-top, it is caused by an abnormal signal on the set-top. Event log checking method
 1.Press the Home or Menu button on the TV remote control to select Settings → Customer Support → Customer Support Information.
 2. Please use the direction button of the remote control on the customer support information screen and pass it to the next page.
 3. If there is information in the event log, the TV is operated by an external device. If it coincides with the intermittent occurrence date, please check the external device.
 4. If there is no event log information at the bottom of the customer support information, it is not a malfunction caused by an external device, so please update the TV to the latest version. How to disable TV Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC)
 1.Press the home button on the TV remote control to set → General → Select Anynet + (HDMI-CEC) in external device management and change it to Release. Check and reconnect HDMI cable when using set-top
 1.I recommend you to use a genuine cable. If the authenticated HDMI cable is not used, the screen may not be visible or a connection error may occur.
 2. Connect the set-top box and TV to check if external input connection lines such as HDMI are connected normally when watching the broadcast. Software update
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to set → Customer Support → Software Update → Select Update Now.
 2. Do not turn off the TV during the update. When the update is complete, the TV turns off and on automatically. At this time, both screen and sound settings can be initialized, so it is recommended to take notes of the settings in advance.
 3. Please proceed with the update when you find the latest version.

question: Please let me know how to use external input, etc. with the button of the main body without the TV remote control
answer:
Question content  There are no buttons on the TV other than the remote control, is it not there originally? Do I have to operate it only with a remote control or if I can't find it, can't I watch TV if I lose the remote control or break down?   Answers  Of the UN40H5200AF model There are no buttons on the front of the TV TV Use the panel key on the side to use external input and TV power on/off on the "Function Menu" screen I can do it.  Please refer to the image below for detailed usage.   Using panel keys  
 1.Power On: Press the panel key when the TV is on standby to turn on the TV. 
 2. Adjust volume: Adjust volume by moving the panel key left and right while the TV is on. 
 3. Select a channel: With the TV turned on, move the panel key up and down to select a channel. 
 4. Use function menu: Press the panel key with the TV on to display the function menu screen. If you press the panel key again, the function menu screen disappears. 
 5. Using Multimedia: Select Multimedia by moving the panel key on the feature menu screen. The Media Play screen appears. 
 6. Using Menu: Select 'Menu' by moving the panel key on the Functional Menu screen. The menu screen appears. It is the same as the menu screen that appears when you press the 'Menu' button on the remote control. 
 7. Select TV/External Input: Move the panel key on the Function menu screen to select TV/External Input. The TV/External Input Screen appears. 
 8. Power off: On the function menu screen, select Power by moving the panel key.    Press the panel key for at least 1 second to exit from menu, media play, and TV/external input.  If you lose the remote control, you can move or select each item in the menu with the panel key at the bottom of the TV.  If there is no input signal, the TV automatically switches to standby mode after 15 minutes.  When operating the desired function by moving the panel key up, down, left, and right, be careful not to press the panel key. If you press the panel key first, you cannot move up, down, left, right.

question: The 2020 TV screen is blurred or the picture quality is bad.

question: The sound bar HDMI ARC is not recognized, the sound bar Bluetooth is cut off.
answer:

 2. Due to the influence of external devices, the connection between the TV and the sound bar may not be smooth.
 3. Inspection method
 4. Disconnect the connection lines of all products except TV and sound bar connections.
 5. Keep the distance between the sound bar and the router at least 1 m (meter).
 6. When connecting the TV and the sound bar, it is normal, but if it occurs by connecting additional external devices such as set-tops or game consoles, please check the device. 
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video. 
 ※ ARC function is to input or output sound only by connecting HDMI cable from sound bar that supports ARC TV voice. □ Input conditions that support ARC - TV can be output only for digital voice among input conditions through tuner. - In HDMI version 1.4 or higher, products that support ARC function are compatible with each other. (i.e., the TV supports HDMI 2 (ARC) but will not be able to use it unless it supports peripheral ARC. ) - If both products support ARC function in 1.4 version, sound bar voice is output when selecting TV simple menu → receiver listening. Please try the following method to take action against symptoms. - If the sound bar HDMI ARC is not recognized, you can change the HDMI cable to check the recognition status. - If the sound bar Bluetooth is cut off, it may be a symptom due to the surrounding environment. If the wireless router (2.4GHz/5GHz) is nearby, symptoms may occur due to overlapping signals, so please try Bluetooth connection again by raising the distance from the router. If the above method is not solved, it may occur due to sound bar HDMI connection terminal or built-in Bluetooth symptoms. Please get an accurate diagnosis from a professional engineer for that part.

question: ATMOS Sound is not working on Netflix of 2019 TV.
answer:

question: Please tell me how to set up Samsung Smart TV with smartphone.

question: Please let me know about Samsung TV Plus.
answer:
Function guide Samsung TV Plus  TV Support Target: Smart TV model released after 2013   Samsung TV Plus provides various contents such as entertainment, movies, dramas, documentaries, and home shopping by connecting the Internet to Samsung Smart TV It is a virtual channel service that allows you to choose according to your taste and enjoy it for free. If you connect your smart TV wirelessly to an Internet-connected LAN line or Wi-Fi without a separate subscription process or app installation, You can use it right away. Just like choosing a terrestrial channel with a remote control, watch a video content channel numbered 500-900. How to watch Samsung TV Plus  
 1.Click the Samsung TV Plus app in the bottom list of the home screen. There is no need to install a separate app, and the default app cannot be deleted. 
 2. Move down or up on the broadcast guide screen to check the list of Samsung TV Plus channels. You can choose the broadcast of the channel you want. 
 3. Enter number 501 to go directly to the Samsung TV Plus channel. Samsung TV Plus Channel Editing Method  You can delete or restore the Samsung TV Plus channel from the channel editing screen.  Samsung TV Plus Channel List Edit Channel  Deleted channels do not appear in the channel list and appear gray on the channel edit screen. The restored channel reappears in the channel list. How to delete Samsung TV Plus app  You can delete the Samsung TV Plus app from the bottom list of the home screen. Even if you delete the app, you can watch the Samsung TV Plus channel.  
 1.Move focus from the bottom list of the home screen to the Samsung TV Plus app. 
 2. Press the down button. Disable > Deletion Click on.   
 ※ You can restore the Samsung TV Plus app to the bottom of the home screen.  > External input  
 1.Move focus to Samsung TV Plus app. 
 2. Press the up button. Add to Home Click on.

question: I think the wall-mounted installation is tilted.
answer: Expected cause Wall hangers may be tilted, or they may appear to be tilted by optical illusions due to wall names, art walls, etc. When the wall hanger is tilted Optical illusion due to wall art wall, etc. Method of action When installing wall hangings, the horizontal system is used to level them, so the symptoms of tilting to one side may appear to be tilted horizontally due to tolerances in use or to optical illusions due to wall art walls. Horizontal adjustment screws can be adjusted on the rear wall hanger to adjust the horizontal, but there may be a risk of safety accidents such as TV crashes during the adjustment process, and in this case, an engineer should visit and check accurately. If you do horizontal adjustment yourself, please pay special attention to safety accidents. [Horizontal Adjustment Method – General Wall Hanging] The rear wall mount of the TV can be leveled by adjusting the height adjustment screw at both ends. Adjust normal wall mount height adjustment screw Mini wall mount height adjustment screw adjustment [Horizontal Adjustment Method – Close Wall Hanging] Hold both sides of the TV and adjust it horizontally Check the horizontal state with the horizontal system Close the close wall hanger to the wall Horizontal adjustment completed normally

question: The sound bar is disconnected from the USB connection sound bar.
answer:

Method of action Soundbar Firmware Update ■ Download HW-MS6501 / MS651/MS751 file Samsung Electronics homepage ( http://www.samsung.com/sec ) Search for the model in customer support. Save the upgrade file to the USB memory with the Ver 1143.0 file dated October 30, 2017. (Must be decompressed) ■ Two types of gender available
 1.C type cable can be used as USB gender
 2. C type USB gender available (Galaxy S8, Note 8 accessories)
 3. Micro USB Gender Not Available (Galaxy S7 Accessories) Two types of gender available
 1.C type cable gender
 2. C-type gender
 3. Micro Gender (Not Available) ■ How to update HW-MS6501 / MS651/MS751 
 ※ MS550 proceed in the same way. However, you can plug it directly into the memory terminal without USB gender - Install USB memory using the C type gender of the WIRELESS terminal at the bottom of the sound bar. - If you turn on the power to install the sound bar in the OFF state memory, automatic update through USB will proceed. - If the upgrade phrase does not appear, you can turn on the power after reconnecting the power code with the memory plugged in. Update method
 1.Fastening to USB Memory Type C Gender
 2. Wireless terminal connection in power off state
 3. After connecting, the sound bar power cord is reconnected Next power on.
 4. After 1 ~ 2 minutes, the right “UPDATE” is displayed 
 ※ If the update phrase does not appear, turn off the power, reconnect the sound bar power code once again, and turn on the power.
