question: The TV screen is broken.
answer:
The TV panel is broken. The TV panel is made of glass and is vulnerable to external shocks and TV falls (conduction), so please be extra careful when using the TV. Check the type of damage Damage caused by external impact can be caused by star shape, spider web shape, etc. Prevention method
 1.You should be careful because damage may occur due to balls, toys, BB pistols, etc.
 2. When cleaning with a stick hanger, be careful not to hit the end of the handle with a stick hanger.
 3. Be careful not to hit objects around you when turning left and right of the TV. METHOD FOR INSTALLING CONDUCTION PREVENTION KIT
 1.It does not provide the loops, screws, and strings used. Please buy it separately.
 2. Connect the hook and screw to the back of the TV and fix it.
 3. Insert the screws into the loop and stick them firmly into the wall. Make sure the screws are in place.
 4. Tie the TV and the hooks fixed to the wall with a strong string.

question: There is high-frequency noise while watching TV and static noise while watching TV.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.High-frequency noise while watching TV. I'm watching TV and it's making a lot of noise.
 2. If a high-frequency sound or spark popping sound occurs while watching TV, noise occurs in the external input signal or a potential difference occurs between external devices.
 3. Acoustic test method
 4. Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to set → Customer support → Self-diagnosis → Start sound test.
 5. If the reproduced sample sound is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise due to broadcasting signal problems, not product problems.
 6. In this case, you should contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check. (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.)
 7. However, if noise occurs in the played sample sound, it is recommended to check the TV.
 8. Check and reconnect antenna cables
 9. Please completely separate and reconnect the antenna connection line between the TV and the wall terminal.
 10. Please make sure to connect the antenna cable even if you are not using it. (To be adjacent)
 11. Check and reconnect HDMI cables when using set-top 12. I recommend you to use a genuine cable. If the authenticated HDMI cable is not used, the screen may not be visible or a connection error may occur. 13. Connect the set-top box and TV to check if external input connection lines such as HDMI are connected normally when watching the broadcast. 14. Connect TV and external device to same outlet 15. Connect the power outlet of the TV and external device to the same outlet. 
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video.

question: The TV voice is shaking and I can hear a noise in the voice.
answer:
1. The TV voice is shaking, I can hear a noise in the TV voice.
 2. If the voice is shaking or noisy, it may occur if the broadcast signal is abnormal, the external input level is too high, or does not match.
 3. Acoustic test method
 4. Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select Settings → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Start Sound Test.
 5. If the reproduced sample sound is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise due to broadcasting signal problems, not product problems.
 6. In this case, you should contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check. (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) 7 However, if noise occurs in the played sample sound, it is recommended to check the TV.
 8. Automatic channel control method
 9. Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select Settings → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings.
 10. The number of channels searched may vary depending on the region, broadcaster, and surrounding environment.
 11. If the channel or automatic channel setting is disabled, it is an external device, not a public wave signal, so contact the set-top and carrier to be informed of the automatic channel setting. 12. Set-top volume control 13. Set-top volume control can be performed by pressing the +, - buttons of the set-top remote control to increase or decrease the set-top volume. 14. If you usually adjust the volume with the TV remote control, please set the set-top volume to medium. 15. Sound setting method 16. Press the Home or Menu button to select Settings → Sound → Expert Settings → Equillizer. 17. If the sound is shaking in a specific sound field, please set the bass (100 Hz, 200 Hz) low in the expert setting. 
 ※ The set-top remote control may have different shapes and button positions depending on the type of set-top box provided by telecommunication companies such as wired, cable, Skylife, and IPTV. If it is different from how to use the remote control in the video above, please contact the carrier that provided the set-top remote control.

question: The brightness of the 2015 TV screen changes automatically.
answer:
Method of action Screen brightness changes automatically  ■ Cause  - Symptoms of automatic change of screen of 2015 TV model In the case of other models, after checking the model of the product You can get guidance through a professional counselor.  - It may occur when functions related to screen and power saving are set.   Automatic contrast: Function that automatically adjusts screen contrast to keep contrast in optimal condition  Motion lighting: The function that automatically adjusts the contrast according to the brightness of the screen image  Echo power saving: Adjust screen brightness to reduce power consumption    ■ Screen mode  - Set to the standardization surface (
 ※ All three functions can be set (activated) in the standardization surface)  
 1.Automatic contrast adjustment 'off' setting - Change menu → advanced setting → automatic contrast adjustment → 'off' 
 2. Set the motion light function to 'off' - Change menu → advanced setting → motion lighting → 'off' 
 3. Echo power saving setting - Change menu → system → eco power saving setting → power saving mode → 'off'    ■ Setting screen mode  
 1.Select a screen from the menu  
 2. Go to 'Screen Mode'  
 3. Setting to 'Standard Screen'    
 ※ Note: When it is 'standard screen', all three functions can be set to 'off'  ■ Setting automatic contrast adjustment  
 1.Select a screen from the menu  
 2. Go to Advanced Settings  
 3. Moving to Automatic Myeongam Adjustment  
 4. Setting to 'off'    ■ Setting motion lighting  
 1.Selecting a System from the Menu  
 2. Go to 'Eco Power Saving Settings'  
 3. Move to Motion Lighting  
 4. Change to 'off'    ■ Eco power saving setting  
 1.Selecting a System from the Menu  
 2. Go to 'Eco Power Saving Settings'  
 3. Select 'power saving mode'  
 4. Go to 'power saving mode' → Set to 'off'    If it has not been resolved, I recommend you to check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.

question: I can't get a specific channel voice.
answer:
Expected cause It can be caused by a set-top box or a broadcast signal abnormality. Method of action Broadcast signal sensitivity check Symptoms of no voice on a specific channel can occur due to broadcasting signals or TV abnormalities, and the function of checking the sensitivity of broadcasting signals built into the TV can check the abnormality/nothingness of the product. [Setting Method] Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self-diagnosis → Start signal information Customer Support - Self Diagnosis - Start Signal Information Check the signal information for the channel while watching. If there are less than 4 antenna signals or the SNR value is less than 20, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal in this case if the broadcast signal is weak. Sound quality test confirmation Symptoms of no voice on a specific channel can occur due to broadcasting signals or TV abnormalities, and the sound quality test function can check for abnormalities in the product. [Setting Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test Press the home button of the remote control Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Customer support → Move self-diagnosis Select [Start sound quality test] During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the sample sound played is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise due to broadcasting signal problems, not product problems. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If noise is generated in the reproduced sample sound, it can be caused by an abnormality in the speaker or voice circuit and must be checked. Check the latest version update Software malfunctions may prevent certain channel voices from being heard, which requires upgrades to the latest version of the software. Even after the upgrade, if it is the same, please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] 
 ① Internet Upgrade - Before 2012: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Internet Up - After 2013: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Menu → System Software update Update now 
 ② USB Upgrade Downpath: Access to Samsung Electronics homepage → Customer support → Model search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file to PC → Decompress the received firmware file and save it in USB memory → Connect USB to TV [Installation Method] - After 2013: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now - Before 2013: Menu → Customer Support → Software Upgrade → USB Upgrade Menu - Customer Support Software upgrade Select Upgrade to USB

answer:

question: I want to know about the use of voice recognition in the curved TV UHD 9000 model series.
answer:
METHOD FOR USING VOICE RECOGNITION OF UHD 9000 MODEL You can use certain menus and functions of your TV more easily using your voice. To accurately recognize a user's voice, you must pronounce it slowly and accurately from the language in the System Speech Recognition menu to the selected language. Voice recognition includes interactive voice recognition that is used as if talking to a TV and command-type voice recognition that is used only with a set command. To use interactive voice recognition, you must have completed Internet connectivity, smart hub settings, agreement on terms and conditions, and time settings. When voice recognition is executed without setting, a setting guide pop-up is displayed. If you complete the settings according to the instructions, you can use interactive voice recognition. If you don't set it up, you can use command-type voice recognition. In this case, only "defined commands" are available. Before using voice recognition, read and familiarize yourself with precautions, and then use voice recognition. 
 1.Complete the settings for user and TV voice in voice recognition (Menu > System > Voice Recognition).
 2. Press the voice recognition button of Samsung Smart Control (Smart Remote Control) and tell the command to the appropriate size for the microphone. 
 ① Learning how to use basic voice recognition Focus shift If you say the command you want, "left," "right," "up," or "down," the focus moves. However, it can only be used in situations where focus can be moved. Item selection When you say "Select," select the item where the focus is located. Viewing Full Voice Commands If you say "Help," you can check the entire voice command by category. Tell me the category you want. Turn off voice recognition Say "End voice recognition," or press the voice recognition button. End voice recognition. Only the specified voice command can be recognized, and depending on the version, the voice command may be different from the command written in the manual. 
 ② Using voice recognition as if talking to a TV You can direct various actions such as viewing reservation and recording reservation, VOD and app search and execution, without having to learn specific commands or remember keywords. For example, , "*** (title) Record reservation. If you say, ", the TV sets up a reservation recording for the program. TV voice on/off When you talk to a TV with voice recognition, you can turn on or off the voice from the TV. System > Speech Recognition From the menu. TV voice Choose . Listening to TV voice with desired gender voice System > Speech Recognition From the menu. Phonetic-gender After selecting , select the desired voice gender. You can hear the TV voice as the voice of the selected gender.

answer:
UHD 9000 Model Link Screen (Screen Split Function) Execution Method While watching TV, you can use various functions such as web search and apps at the same time. Press the Menu button to select Run Screen > Multilink Screen (Screen Split Function).

Before using the smart hub with the multi-link screen (screen split function), On TV Settings (Smart Hub > On TV > On TV Settings) Complete the smart hub setting with. METHOD FOR USING MULTILINK SCREEN (Screen Split Function) Content and channels of UHD or FHD resolution are not available at the same time. Using multilink screen, Smart hub When you run, the TV automatically shuts down the multi-link screen (screen split function) and runs the smart hub. Some TV features or apps may not be supported on the multi-link screen (screen split feature). In this case, exit the multi-link screen (screen split function) and use the function.  1 Select a feature to use

You can change the channel or volume of the selected screen.  3 Connecting Bluetooth Headphones If you connect your Bluetooth headphones to your TV, you can listen to other screens with your Bluetooth headphones. Compatibility problems may occur depending on the type of device. (Mobile-only headphones may not work. ) Depending on the type of device, lip-synching may occur in which the image and voice do not match.  1.First, put your Bluetooth headphones on hold. Please refer to the manual of Bluetooth headphones to make the connection standby.

The Bluetooth headphone connection screen appears on the screen and automatically searches for connectable headphones. - If you can not search, place your Bluetooth headphones close to the TV and select Research. Re-search for paired headphones.
 5. Select the Bluetooth headphones you want to connect from the search-completed list, and then select Pairing and Connection. The TV and Bluetooth headphones are connected.  4 Select the sound of the screen you want to hear You can select and listen to the sound of the screen you want to listen to on the TV speaker or Bluetooth headphones, respectively.
 1.During multi-link screen execution (screen division function), press the multi-screen button of Samsung Smart Control (integrated remote control). The Options menu appears on the screen.

question: Is it possible to connect the TV voice output terminal and earphone?
answer:
Customer Questions
 1.Is it possible to connect the Bluetooth headset to the UN50F6900AF TV model and output voice only with the headset?
 2. And can I connect earphones or headsets to the rear terminal by wire? It's called audio minijack, but doesn't regular stereojack have an output terminal? Answers Hello. Sir/ma'am. I am the person in charge of Samsung Electronics service cyber center. Please understand that the UN50F6900AF model you inquired about does not support Bluetooth headsets and cannot be connected to wireless headsets. The UN50F6900AF model does not support earphone terminals (stereo jacks) and only has voice output terminals. The voice output terminal is a terminal that only outputs the sound from the TV as it is, and when the earphone is connected, the sound is output to the TV and also to the earphone. The voice output terminal cannot adjust the volume, and in the case of the earphone jack terminal, is the sound muted so that the sound cannot be output to the TV speaker? , the voice output terminal is not muted, so audio output is performed together with the TV and the earphone connected to the voice output terminal. In other words, if the volume of the TV is reduced after connecting the earphone to the voice output terminal, the TV speaker does not make a sound, and the earphone terminal outputs audio, but the size of the output audio volume cannot be adjusted. Please understand that the UN50F6900AF model does not have a Bluetooth headset and earphone terminal. Thank you.

question: Please let me know about TV USB microphone connection
answer: Question content UN50H6430AF is being used. It is not equipped with a wireless LAN, so I am using a Samsung genuine wireless LAN plugged into USB. Not long ago, there was a Geumyoung karaoke app on the smart hub, so it was beneficial and good to run it, so I bought a USB microphone (KSM-508) through Geumyoung Shopping Mall, plugged it into USB, and used it, and it came out about 0.5 seconds late when the microphone voice was output to the speaker. There are a total of 3 USB terminals on the TV, and it's the same even if you plug them in. As a result of the inquiry to Geumyoung, I exchanged it for the same other product, but it's the same. Geumyoung says there is no problem because they test and go out. If the same symptoms appear with the new product, it may be a TV problem, so please contact the manufacturer. The microphone standard is frequency response: 60hz to 15khz impedance: 600 omega+-3 at 1khz. I don't know if it's professional, but please let me know if the speed of outputting the microphone as sound after responding to the TV is slow or the microphone itself is a problem. Answers In the case of USB microphones, voice delay inevitably occurs in the process of converting digital signals into analog signals, and Geumyoung Mimi Noraebang uses AUX to enter the outside input of TV, so there is no symptom of delayed voice. Please note that it is a characteristic part of the Geumyoung karaoke device. Among the products of Geumyoung Noraebang, you need to use Geumyoung Mini Emp, an external device. It's a pity that you're using a USB microphone, but it's hard to improve. Please understand that it is a hardware SPEC.

question: Does the TV have to be connected to the Internet to get remote service?
answer: A1. Yes, the TV must be connected to high-speed Internet to access and control the TV. If you don't have an Internet connection, or if your Internet connection is unstable and slow, you get a message that you can't get remote service.

question: Is remote service safe?
answer: A2. Yes, remote service systems are secure using secure connections. In addition, the consultation information is stored on our server and will never be leaked to the outside world.

question: Can the consultant access my TV at any time?
answer: A3. No, sir. You can only access it when you receive the access code, and you will not be able to access the TV again after the connection is disconnected. And when you turn off the TV, the connection is cut off immediately.

question: Can the counselor see what I'm looking at the same way?
answer: A4. Yes, the counselor can see the same screen as the TV screen you are watching. So that we can diagnose exactly what the problem is.

question: Is the remote service a paid service?
answer: A5. No, sir. Remote service is free. Samsung strives to provide the best service to customers. You can think of remote service as another service provided to you.

question: When a counselor accesses the TV, what can I do?
answer: A6. Once you access the TV, the Samsung counselor can control the TV as if it were in front of the TV. You can change the TV setting value, see the channel list, and see information about the device connected to the TV and the app installed on the TV. You can also update the TV's firmware or return the TV to its initial state.

question: Can the counselor see me through the camera built into the TV?
answer: A7. It is possible when an app (Skype, camera app, etc.) using a camera is installed, but you don't have to worry because you never run these apps unless necessary. Even if it is necessary, we will get the customer's consent in advance. If you close the camera, there is absolutely no way to see it through the camera.

question: The voice got louder while watching TV. It gets smaller.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶). Let's find out how to deal with symptoms of increased and decreased voice while watching TV. 
 ※ While watching TV, it got bigger and smaller on the same channel If repeated, it is likely to be more than a broadcast signal or a characteristic of broadcaster equipment. Broadcasting signal test method
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select “Settings,” “Customer Support,” and “Start Signal Information.”
 2. If the antenna signal is 4 or less or the SNR value is 20 or less, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal.

 1.There may be a difference in voice level depending on the broadcast program produced by the broadcasting station, and when the channel is changed, the voice may be small or the voice may be large.

question: The screen is not blurred or clear when using the set-top box.
answer:

question: I can't connect to the TV wireless network.
answer:
I can't get through to the TV wireless network. 
 ※ If the network connection status is “not connected”, the router may be powered off or the network setting status may be abnormal. Network status checking method

 2. Network settings allow you to run network settings immediately. Router Power checking method
 1.If there is no router power light, please reconnect the power.
 2. Please check if there is a light on the router power source.
 3. If the power is not turned on, please contact the router manufacturer. Network initialization
 1.Press the Home or Menu button to select “Settings,” “General,” “Network,” and “Network Initialization.”
 2. The network password will be deleted when network initialization is executed, so please check the password before execution. Network reset Wireless network reset method
 1.Press the Home or Menu button to select Wireless in “Settings”, “General”, “Network”, “Run Network Settings”.
 2. Check and connect the set network name and password of the wireless router.
 3. The network name and password can be found on the settings screen of the wireless router. Wired network reset method
 1.Press the Home or Menu button to select Wired in “Settings,” “General,” “Network,” and “Run Network Settings.”
 2. Check and connect the set network name and password of the wireless router.
 3. The network name and password can be found on the settings screen of the wireless router. 
 ※ Router: AP If it is not solved by the above method, the router does not recognize the TV, so please reset the router or reset it and try to connect again.

question: Each TV channel has a different voice size.
answer:

 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select “Settings,” “Customer Support,” and “Start Signal Information.”
 2. If the antenna signal is 4 or less or the SNR value is 20 or less, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal.
 3. Signal information is a function that can only be used in digital broadcasting channels. Automatic channel control method

 3. If the channel or automatic channel setting is disabled, it is an external device, not a public wave signal, so contact the set-top and carrier to receive guidance on automatic channel setting. Automatic volume control method
 1.There may be a difference in voice level depending on the broadcast program produced by the broadcasting station, and when the channel is changed, the voice may be small or the voice may be large.
 2. It mainly occurs on wired broadcasting channels rather than regular broadcasting channels, and automatic volume function is applied on TV to compensate for different volume for each channel.
 3. When you set the automatic volume function, the volume decreases, but you can watch all channels at a similar volume.
 4. Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select and turn on the automatic volume in “Settings,” “Sound,” and “Expert Settings.” Software update
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select Update now in “Settings,” “Customer Support,” and “Software Update.”
 2. Do not turn off the TV during the update.
 3. When the update is complete, the TV turns off and on automatically.
 4. At this time, both screen and sound settings can be initialized, so it is recommended to take notes of the settings in advance.
 5. Please proceed with the update when you find the latest version.

 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select Update now in “Settings,” “Customer Support,” and “Software Update.”
 2. Do not turn off the TV during the update.
 3. When the update is complete, the TV turns off and on automatically.
 4. At this time, both screen and sound settings can be initialized, so it is recommended to take notes of the settings in advance.
 5. Please proceed with the update when you find the latest version. 
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video.

question: Only half of the TV screen comes out.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶). Only half of the TV screen comes out. 
 ※ If the TV screen does not appear in certain parts such as upper / lower, left / right, it is highly likely that it is a product abnormality or external device signal failure. Screen test method
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select “Settings,” “Customer Support,” “Self Diagnosis,” and “Start Screen Test.”
 2. Please “check” the image quality test notification message. Sample images for testing are displayed.
 3. “Do you still see the symptoms of the problem in the test video? The message ” appears.
 4. Select “No” when the image quality test screen appears normally.
 5. Please check the broadcast signal rather than the TV problem.
 6. If you have the same symptoms in the additional sample image, you'd better check the TV. AOC Cable Reconnection
 1.Please reconnect One Connect and TV.
 2. Please separate and assemble the AOC cable from the TV and One Connect. Set-top power checking method
 1.If there is no set-top power light, please reconnect the power.
 2. When the set-top power is on standby, use the set-top remote control to turn on the power.
 3. If the power is not turned on, please contact the set-top manufacturer.

question: I can't search with TV voice recognition.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶). I can't search with TV voice recognition. 
 ※ If the TV voice recognition function does not work, it may occur depending on the usage environment, network status, and voice recognition server status Network status checking method
 1.If the network connection status is “not connected,” you can check the symptoms through the network status. Please check the symptoms and take action.
 2. Network settings allow you to run network settings immediately. METHOD FOR USING VOICE RECOGNITION
 1.You can perform voice commands by pressing the remote control microphone button.
 2. For example, you can say “broadcast guide” to run the broadcast guide.
 3. If the “text statement” does not appear on the screen when executing the voice command, please check the network connection status that the network is not connected. How to check router (AP) power
 1.If there is no router power light, please reconnect the power.
 2. Please check if there is a light on the router power. .
 3. If the power is not turned on, contact the router manufacturer /li> Network reset
 1.The network password will be deleted when network initialization is executed, so please check the password before execution. Wireless network reset method
 1.Press the Home or Menu button to select Wireless in “Settings,” “General,” “Network,” and “Run Network Settings.”
 2. Check and connect the set network name and password of the wireless router.
 3. The network name and password can be found on the settings screen of the wireless router. Wired network reset method
 1.Press the Home or Menu button to select Wired in “Settings,” “General,” “Network,” and “Run Network Settings.”
 2. Check and connect the set network name and password of the wireless router.
 3. The network name and password can be found on the settings screen of the wireless router. Software update
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select Update now in “Settings,” “Customer Support,” and “Software Update.”
 2. Do not turn off the TV during the update.
 3. When the update is complete, the TV turns off and on automatically.

question: I see a dot on the TV screen.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶). I see a dot on the TV screen. (Based on defective pixels)
 1.In the case of digital broadcasting, the camera being filmed looks like a defective pixel on TV due to foreign matter or dust When shooting in the dark, bright light spots may shine in several places.
 2. At this time, if there are no symptoms when watching other broadcasts by switching to the old channel, it can be seen as a problem according to the broadcaster's shooting signal.
 3.. If the same part occurs when switching other channels or watching other broadcasts, inspection is required. Screen test method
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select “Settings,” “Customer Support,” “Self Diagnosis,” and “Start Screen Test.”
 2. Please “check” the image quality test notification message. Sample images for testing are displayed.
 3. “Do you still see the symptoms of the problem in the test video? The message ” appears.
 4. Select “No” when the image quality test screen appears normally.
 5. Please check the broadcast signal rather than the TV problem.
 6. If you have the same symptoms in the additional sample image, you'd better check the TV. Defective pixel checking method
 1.Symptoms that appear purple in black dots or white patterns on the screen allow one defect per million, For FHD TVs, up to 6 are normal.
 2. The point on the screen is bright, and if the same phenomenon occurs on all channels, inspection is required. 
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video.

question: I can't connect to the set-top box.
answer:
I can't connect to the set-top box. If the set-top box is not recognized or connected, it is likely to be more than a cable that transmits a set-top signal or signal. Set-top input switching method How to switch from TV broadcasting screen to set top (HDMI1) Press the Home or Menu button on the TV remote control to select the input you want to switch from the external input. Check and reconnect HDMI cables when using set-top
 1.We recommend using genuine cables. If the authenticated HDMI cable is not used, the screen may not be visible or a connection error may occur.
 2. Please check the genuine logo. Check the print or imprint of “Ultra High Speed HDMI” on the HDMI cable.
 3. Connect the set-top box and TV to check if external input connection lines such as HDMI are connected normally when watching the broadcast. HDMI Cable Test Method
 1.Click Home or Menu on the TV remote control to select “Settings,” “Customer Support,” “Self Diagnosis,” and “Start Signal Information.”
 2. Please select “HDMI Cable Test” and “Start Test”. Depending on the condition of the cable, it may take 1 to 3 minutes, so please wait.
 3. If the cable is normal, no problem is found.
 4. When diagnosing HDMI cable door zero, check the connection status and replace it with a genuine cable. Set-top power checking method
 1.If there is no set-top power light, please reconnect the power.
 2. When the set-top power is on standby, use the set-top remote control to turn on the power.
 3. If the power is not turned on, please contact the set-top manufacturer.

question: I can't connect to the set-top box with the TV remote control.
answer:
I can't connect to the set-top box with the TV remote control. If the integrated remote control is not set or malfunctions with the TV remote control, there is an obstacle or misset between products. Integrated remote control setting method
 1.First, check if the device you want to set up and the smart remote control are connected to the TV.
 2. Press the Home or Menu button on the TV remote control to select “External Input” and “Integrated Remote Control Settings.”
 3. Please check if the power of the device is on and press the start button. Please select the type of device to set the integrated remote control.
 4. If the set-top box you want to set is directly connected to the TV, please select “Connect directly to the TV.”
 5. If the set-top box you want to set is connected to the TV through the home theater, please select “Connect through the home theater”.
 6. Enter a “residential area” to find a faster service provider and set up your TV. Set up a broadcasting service provider to experience various broadcasts.
 7. Select the external input terminal of the TV to which the set-top box you want to set is connected. Use a simple test to see if you can operate the set-top box.
 8. Select the channel up/channel down button on the screen and check the right screen.
 9. If the channel has changed, select the “Yes” button, and if the channel has not changed, select the “No” button.
 10. Settings have been completed. Now try all the devices connected with one Samsung smart remote control. Precautions for Installing Integrated Remote Control
 1.If there is a blockage due to an obstacle between products when installing the integrated remote control, the reception status may cause a failure in installing the integrated remote control.
 2. Remove obstacles between products and proceed with the installation of integrated remote control.

question: There's foreign matter and fingerprints on the TV panel.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶) There's foreign matter and fingerprints on the TV panel. 
 ※ Depending on the type of foreign matter on the TV panel, it may be mistaken for TV defect or may not be erased well. ▶ Exterior stain checking method
 1.If a stain on the surface of the TV liquid crystal does not occur during TV power off (OFF), it may occur due to foreign substances inside the panel or abnormalities in the panel. In this case, you need to check the product.
 2. If you see this water on the exterior of the liquid crystal during TV power off (OFF), you can clean the exterior stains due to contamination by foreign substances on the exterior of the panel. ▶ Exterior stain cleaning method
 1.When purchasing a TV, soak the microfiber cloth provided in water, wipe it gently, and drain it with a dry cloth.
 2. If the stain is not erased due to severe contamination, use disinfection ethanol sold on the market Wipe the area quickly and gently wipe the remaining oil and water with a microfiber cloth.

question: Please let me know how to connect UN55ES7100F model Wi-Fi direct function.
answer:
Question content Please tell me how to connect UN55ES7100F model and smartphone Wi-Fi direct function. Answers The UN55ES7100F model supports Wi-Fi direct function, so I will guide you on how to connect. (Please note that the Wi-Fi Direct function can play videos, photos, and music files, and content that is not a codec supported by TV may not be played.) ■ Wi-Fi Direct - Execution method: Menu → Network → WiFi Direct - You can connect your TV and wireless mobile device directly without a wireless router. It only applies to LED 5500, 6350, and PDP 550 models, and this feature is available when connecting Samsung wireless LAN adapters. This feature is possible only when the mobile device supports the Wi-Fi Direct feature. ■ Connect to mobile device with Wi-Fi direct function First, turn on the Wi-Fi Direct function of your mobile device.
 1.Go to the Wi-Fi Direct screen. (Network → Wi-Fi Direct)
 2. First, turn on the Wi-Fi Direct function of your mobile device. Select the Wi-Fi device you want. Push Button Configuration (PCB): Press the WPS (PBC) button on the device you want to connect within 2 minutes. All network values are set automatically and connected to the network. PIN: Enter the PIN number displayed on the Wi-Fi device. To disconnect, select the connected device, then select Disconnect. If the TV and smartphone are connected through the Wi-Fi Direct function, video, photo, and music files do not appear immediately on the TV screen. If you select the photo or video you want to send to the TV from the photo or video item of your smartphone, the items will appear on the photo. If you select the red square part of the figure below among the items, you will see the device item you want to connect to, and if you select the connected TV item, it will be sent to the TV and appear on the TV screen. The entry menu varies depending on the smartphone model and the smartphone OS version. If you select the red square part of the picture below among the shared items and select Wi-Fi Direct from the list below, the connected devices will appear and please select the TV item to check. If it doesn't come out right away as shown in the picture below, please turn it over to the next list and check if there is a Wi-Fi direct item in the next list.

question: UN48JU6800F, please let me know how to disable additional information
answer:
Question content We are using UN48JU6800F model. Did you check today's news in the shape of a remote control at the bottom right of the screen? Click on the remote control for additional information. A pop-up saying ' is popping up. There is no button called additional information on the remote control, and I am watching TV well, but it is very inconvenient to watch because a pop-up pops up. I really want to disable this function. Please let me know how to disable it in the menu. Answers It is a pop-up message that appears when the additional information service starts on November 5, 2015, and please refer to the following to disable the message so that it does not appear.
 1.If there is no additional information button on the TV remote control, press the smart hub button on the remote control to select the additional information item.
 2. If the additional information item appears on the right screen, use the up/down direction key of the remote control to move to the “Settings” item and select the “Notification Settings” below.
 3. Select the notification settings and uncheck the “Show Service Notifications” item.

question: TV Plus service is not available.
answer:
Contents of inquiry Since a few days ago, Internet services such as YouTube have been normal, but only TV Plus services have not been available. What's the reason? Answers The TV PLUS service is a broadcast that watches high-definition content through a network. If TV PLUS does not work, please use it after working as below.
 1.Menu → Smart Hub → Please use it again after initializing Smart Hub. After initialization, you must agree to the terms and conditions of the smart hub.
 2. Turn off the TV, unplug the power cord, and plug it back in after 1 to 2 minutes.
 3. Please wait up to 5 minutes with the power on and try using TV PLUS again.
 4. Please check the TV PLUS channel by uploading the channel in remote control external input → TV mode (TV PLUS).

question: UN32D6330BF, I would like to know if Bluetooth headset is available.
answer: Question content I need earphones because I have to watch TV alone at night, can I use a wireless earphone? If not, please let me know if you can use the wireless earphone using the wireless LAN adapter (WIS09ABGN) you purchased together when purchasing a TV. Answers UN32D6330BF is a model without Bluetooth function and cannot be used by connecting Bluetooth headset. In addition, the wireless LAN adapter (WIS09ABGN) is an adapter for using a wireless network, and Bluetooth earphones cannot be used even if the device is used. For reference, UN32D6330BF is a model without stereo / RCA cable connection terminal and cannot be used by connecting wired earphones.

question: Please let me know how to connect UN32J4030AFXKR, PC speaker and Bluetooth speaker.

question: UN55F6450AF, please let me know about earphone connection terminal.

Question content Is there an earphone (diameter
 3.5mm) terminal that is commonly used in UN55F6450AF, and what is the standard if it is a different standard? Can I use earphones that can communicate with Bluetooth by connecting them? Answers The earphone terminal is not supported in UN55F6450AF, and there is a
 3.5Ø voice output terminal. The voice output terminal does not adjust the volume size and does not mute. question: UN55H6300AF, I would like to know if Bluetooth speaker connection is possible.
answer: Contents of inquiry I want to watch a movie by connecting a Bluetooth speaker and a TV, but the Bluetooth speaker does not have an AUX terminal and only has a power and USB terminal. As far as I know, the UN55H6300AF model does not have Bluetooth function, and I wonder if it can be used by connecting a device called Bluetooth Transmeter. Answers The UN55H6300AF model does not support Bluetooth function. Computer products can be used after installing USB dongles even if Bluetooth does not support them, but TV products are difficult to use because they do not recognize Bluetooth USB dongles. Even if you connect a device called Bluetooth Transmeter, the TV does not recognize it, so please refer to it when using it.

question: I'd like to hear the TV voice on the home theater speaker.
answer:
Method of action Check TV and home theater connection If you want to listen to the TV voice on the home theater speaker, you must proceed with the initial installation. HDMI, optical cable is required separately for installation. HDMI, Optical Cable Image HDMI cable Optical cable
 1.Please connect HDMI and optical cable to the rear terminal of the TV. HDMI Connects Optical Cable TV rear terminal HDMI Cable Connection Optical cable connection
 2. Please connect HDMI and optical cable to the rear terminal of the home theater. Connect HDMI and optical cable to rear terminal of home theater Home theater rear terminal HDMI Cable Connection Optical cable connection Check Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) setting If the Anynet+ setting is changed to Off, the Anynet+ item is not displayed in the simple menu item, and the receiver listening function is not available. In this case, you should check Anynet+ settings. Menu → System → Anynet + → [Off → On Change] Anynet+ Off, On Menu - System Anynet+ Turn off → Change on Initialization method guide ■ ~ 2009 Initialization function is not applied → Remove power cord for 1 minute and use reconnection ■ 2010 ~ 2011 Initialization method from 2010 to 2011 The [End] button in the middle of the remote control Press hard for 10 seconds. "First time to set all settings in the center of the TV screen And bring it back to its state. "Message displayed It will be initialized by selecting [OK] ■ 2012 ~ Initialization method after 2012 Menu → Customer Support Self-diagnosis reset Initial password 0000 Initialization check Initialization complete. Check the HDMI connection status of the set-top box When using the receiver listening function to listen to the TV's voice through the home theater, it can be operated through the Anynet+ function among the functions applied to the TV. The condition for the Anynet+ function to operate is that Anynet+ must be supported between the TV and the device connected by HDMI, and the Anynet+ function of the TV is not available if the device connected by HDMI does not support Anynet+. When a set-top box (cable/skylife/IPTV) is connected to a TV and an HDMI terminal, the set-top box does not support the Anynet+ function, so the Anynet+ function is not available when connecting the TV and the set-top box.  Since the Anynet+ function is not available, the receiver listening function is not available, so TV voice cannot be heard at the home theater. [Method of Action]
 1.After connecting the TV and the set-top box to the component terminal, you can listen to the TV voice at the home theater with the [Simple Menu → Listening to Receiver] function.
 2. Press the Home Theater Remote Control and Body [Select Function] button to display the [DIGITAL IN] phrase on the home theater body liquid crystal, and you can listen to TV voice at the home theater. Function selection button image Remote control → Select function Home Theater Body → Select Function

question: Please let me know about the 2018 TV game mode setting function.

Function guide

[Note] The screen may blink when switching the function settings. 1 .Game mode Implement optimized image quality and response speed when connecting game consoles. Automatic switching must be supported by the game console specifications. 
 ※ Game console means video game console such as PlayStationTM or XboxTM When using game mode, screen mode and sound mode are automatically set to game. 1) When the TV is turned on, the home button of the TV remote control ( Press ). 2) Choose Settings - Menu. 3) Select Menu – General. 4) General – Select external device management. 5) External Device Management – Select Game Mode Settings. 6) The default value of game mode is turned off. 7) Select Game Mode Off as On. 2 .Game Motion Plus It is a function for implementing moving videos. - Displays smoothly and clearly in RPG, adventure games, etc. 1) When the TV is turned on, the home button of the TV remote control ( Press ). 2) Choose Settings - Menu. 3) Select Menu – General. 4) General – Select external device management. 5) External Device Management – Select Game Mode Settings.

 10. 3 .FreeSync It is a function that compensates for screen drag, break, and disconnection in the game. It only works on content that supports Radeon FreeSync. The resolution of the external device is recommended to be 1080p @ 120Hz. You can check the resolution that can be supported for the FreeSync function. FreeSync mode setting: Off / Advanced (48-120Hz) / Basic (90-120Hz) 
 ※ FreeSync mode supported by external devices may be different. 
 ① Resolution (dotx line): 1920 x 1080, 2 display format: 120 Hz, 3 horizontal frequency (KHz): 135,000

 ※ This function may not be supported depending on the model.
 1.When the TV is turned on, the home button of the TV remote control ( Press ).

question: I can't get a voice after connecting the set-top box / converter.
answer:

In this case, you need to adjust the volume of the TV and set-top box, respectively. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If the played sample sound voice is not heard, the TV speaker volume should be adjusted to 15 or more, and if it is still the same, initialization should be carried out. Check HDMI cable It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. If the authenticated HDMI cable is not used, communication errors may cause voice inaudibility symptoms. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable.

question: Automatic channel, there is no specific channel.
answer:

question: I can't get a picture. , I can't see the intermittent screen.
answer:
1. If the screen does not appear on the TV, it often occurs when the contact point of the power cord is loose or the peripheral is turned off.
 2. First of all, if the screen does not appear on the TV, please check the LED lamp at the bottom of the TV. The LED lamp is located in the center or corner of the bottom.
 3. If the lamp is turned off, please completely disconnect and reconnect the power cord of the TV.
 4. Please reconnect the wall outlet and multi outlet in the same way.
 5. If it is connected to a power saving outlet, please connect it to a power outlet at all times.
 6. The lamp is off, but there is no "input signal" on the TV screen "Or if the black screen, Samsung logo comes out, the peripheral is powered off.
 7. Please check peripheral power and connection cable status.
 8. If you do not have a connected peripheral, please select an external input as a TV. (Home → Settings → External Input → TV)
 9. If the lamp is on, the TV is on standby, so please press the power button with the remote control.
 10. If there is no response to the lamp even if you press the power button of the remote control, the battery of the remote control is consumed, so please replace it with a new battery.
 11. For models that use jack packs (one-connect), please completely separate and reconnect the cable and jack pack power cord that connects the jack pack and the TV body.

question: Terrestrial broadcasting is cut off.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.If the TV broadcast screen is not in good condition or is cut off, it mainly occurs due to more than signals from antennas, boosters, and distributors in apartments and general homes.
 2. If you are watching TV with an antenna, please completely separate and reconnect the antenna connection line between the TV and the wall terminal.
 3. Please check the status of antenna cable pin. If the antenna pin is bent or broken, please replace the cable.
 4. If you are using a distributor or booster, please separate it completely and reconnect it. Or try connecting directly to the TV.
 5. If there is an external problem through self-diagnosis, contact the apartment management office or cable cable company. The broadcast signal self-diagnosis method is as follows.
 6. When watching digital, you can check the broadcast signal along with the antenna picture by pressing the home or menu button of the remote control to set → customer support → self-diagnosis → signal information.
 7. When checking, if the antenna signal strength is 4 spaces or less or the SNR value is 20 spaces or less, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal. “Signal Information” is a feature only available on digital broadcast channels.
 8. If you select "signal history," you can check the history of automatically storing channels with weak signal strength.

question: This is how to check when the screen is strange while watching TV.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.Let's find out simply how to check if the cause is due to the product or the external environment caused by broadcasting signals and cables when the TV screen and screen are bad.
 2. While watching TV, the screen may appear intermittently or continuously like a mosaic or a specific part may be broken. It usually appears when watching a digital channel.
 3. Or there are lines on the screen or white dots that appear messy. In this case, it usually appears when watching an analog channel or a wired channel. The cause of the screen
 1.If the above symptoms appear, it is a way to simply check whether the product is a TV problem or a broadcaster problem such as an external environment, that is, cable lines or cable wires.
 2. First, when connected to the antenna line or set-top box on the TV, please check if external input connection lines such as HDMI are connected normally.
 3. Select the Home or Menu button on the remote control.
 4. Move to the left and go to the "Settings" tab to select Settings.
 5. Please go down and select "Customer Support".
 6. Please choose self-diagnosis.
 7. Please select Start Screen Test.
 8. Please 'check' the image quality test notification message.
 9. Please check the video.
 10. You get a message saying, "Do you still see the symptoms of the problem in the test video?" If the image quality test screen appears normally, select No. Please check the broadcast signal rather than the TV problem.
 11. Select an example if it is similar to the image quality test screen. It shows two additional screens, and if this is also the same symptom, it is recommended to check the TV. 12. When watching digital, you can check the broadcast signal with the antenna picture by pressing the home or menu button of the remote control to select “Customer Support”, “Self Diagnosis”, and “Signal Information”. 13. When checking, if the antenna signal is 4 or less or the SNR value is 20 or less, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal. “Signal Information” is a feature only available on digital broadcast channels. 14. Select “Signal History” to check the history of automatic storage of channels with weak signal strength. A case where an abnormality occurs in the screen or sound quality
 1.When watching using a public antenna, such as an apartment or multi-family house, screen and voice-related abnormalities may occur if the direction of the antenna is reversed or the antenna moves due to rain or wind.
 2. Screen and voice-related abnormalities may occur due to signal attenuation or power abandonment by boosters and distributors used in apartments and general homes.
 3. Incorrect adjustment of equipment in cable cable broadcasters, apartment management offices, etc. may also cause screen and voice problems. 
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video.

question: I'm curious about Q & A related to terrestrial UHD broadcasting quality.
answer:
Usage guide ■ Target model (all UHD TV models)   - 2017 UHD TV (UHD TV in 2017 supports American ATSC
 3.0)  - UHD TV before 2016 (UHD TV before 2016 supports European DVB-T2) → For UHD TVs before 2016, you need to purchase a UHD kit to watch the broadcast.   ■ UHD broadcasting quality Q & A Q1. It's UHD, but why is the picture quality bad? A1. UHD should be produced with UHD cameras, editors, microphones, and storage devices from the time of production, but so far, UHD contents have not been produced much due to the lack of UHD equipment. Therefore, since most of the contents of the existing FHD are changed to UHD image quality and transmitted, the image quality is not much different from that of the FHD. In addition, there are not many brokerage houses equipped with UHD transmission equipment at broadcasting stations, so the image quality is set low and transmitted to establish a stable reception environment. To see UHD quality, please see content made exclusively for UHD. (There is a UHD-only channel on TV plus ) Q2. Why should I use STB (or UHD KIT) to watch terrestrial UHD? A2. In the case of products before 2016, it was possible to receive DVB-T2, a European method, and around June 2016, ATSC
 3.0 UHD was adopted as a standard method in Korea and the main broadcast of terrestrial UHD began in May 2017. Please purchase STB (or UHD KIT) for products before 2016. Q3. When can I see the right UHD content? A3. In consultation with each other, the government and broadcasting stations were scheduled to conduct 5% of all broadcasts as UHD content in 2017, and plan to gradually increase it to 25% in 2020 and 100% in 2028.

question: It's clicking.
answer: Expected cause It is a noise caused by applying a relay switch to prevent unnecessary power loss. Method of action As power efficiency increases worldwide, relay switches are applied among power terminal parts to prevent unnecessary power loss. When the power is turned on, the relay switch contacts and normal power is supplied to the TV. The relay switch connects and generates click noise. Relay switch contact drops when power is turned off and power is cut off before it is supplied to the TV. At this time, the relay switch contact falls and click noise is generated. In other words, click noise is generated when the relay switch is operated during power ON / OFF, which is not a problem with the product, but a specification of the product to prevent unnecessary power loss.

question: The stand's tilting.

This tolerance causes symptoms that appear to be tilted to one side even if normal installation is carried out, and the larger the inch, the worse the symptoms that appear to be tilted may look. The scope of Samsung Electronics' management of left and right deviations with normal specifications is as follows, and if it is within the specifications below, please refer to it as a symptom caused by tolerance, not product abnormalities. Inch classification Deviation specification 55.88 cm or less
 3.0 mm 106.68 cm or less
 5.0 mm 109.22 cm or more
 7.0 mm [Stand assembly/installation] In the process of assembling/installing the stand, if the screw is not normally fastened, the left and right horizontal sides of the stand may not fit and may look tilted. In this case, you can separate the stand from the TV and reassemble it. ☞ Assembly: 1 → 2 → 3 → 4 ☞ Decomposition: 4 → 3 → 2 → 1

answer: Expected cause It may occur because the channel is not remembered. It is a function that automatically remembers channels after exploring all channels on TV in a way that remembers channels with broadcast signals while exploring all channels on TV, and does not remember channels without broadcast signals. It takes about 3~5 minutes for automatic channel. If a specific broadcasting channel does not appear even after setting up an automatic channel, it is a symptom caused by a weak broadcasting signal, not a product abnormality, so please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] [Setting Method] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings [Press remote control home button] Move [Settings] at the bottom left Press [Channel/Broadcast] on the menu Press [Automatic Channel Settings]

question: It only works in front of the TV.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to insufficient battery capacity of the remote control or more than the remote control. Method of action Remote control battery replacement description Most of the symptoms that the remote control does not work are caused by the lack of remaining battery capacity of the remote control. The battery of the remote control provided at the time of purchase is naturally discharged in the distribution process, so it is difficult to use it as much as expected, and the remote control battery must be replaced with a new one. For products sold as low-cost bundled products, the usage time is much shorter than that of genuine batteries, so it is recommended to use genuine batteries packaged in pairs. Battery polarity confirmation explanation When replacing the remote control battery, the battery polarity may be wrong and the remote control may not work. You need to connect the battery - pole to an area that protrudes like a battery insertion spring. If the battery + pole is connected to a spring-like protruding area, the remote control does not work. [Battery normal connection (+) polarity] [Battery normal connection (-) polarity] A new pair of battery replacement explanations When replacing the remote control battery, it may occur when using it by replacing the battery used by other products, not by replacing it in pairs. Unlike the old remote control in the past, the remote control of the recently sold model is equipped with smart functions and has high power consumption, so even batteries that operated normally in other products may not operate normally on TV. When replacing the remote control battery, you must replace the pair together. [Remocon battery-like pair] [Remocon battery different pair] [Note] The remote control genuine battery is charged at
 3.2 V and sold, and in the case of the TV remote control, if the battery voltage drops below 2 V, the remote control does not work. Remote controls for products other than TVs operate below 2 V, but in the case of Samsung remote controls, smart functions are applied and operate only under conditions above 2 V, so other products If you replace the battery you used, the remote control will not work if it is less than 2 V, so you must replace the pair together when replacing the remote control battery. Explaining the Causes of Three-wavelength Fluorescent Lamps If the fluorescent light in the home is turned off and the TV remote control is operated, the frequency of the three-wavelength fluorescent light may invade the TV remote control frequency area and cause frequency confusion. The three-wavelength fluorescent lamp uses an electronic safety device exclusively instead of a coiled magnetic stabilizer, and electromagnetic waves generated from the stabilizer may cause frequency interference at the TV remote control receiver, causing symptoms of not receiving the remote control. [Method of Action] As a temporary measure, there are ways to turn off and use fluorescent lights facing the TV, and to replace fluorescent lights with regular fluorescent lights rather than three-wavelength lights. Please contact the nearest lighting company to replace the fluorescent light. In 1997, the National Institute of Technology and Quality standardized the electronic stabilizer KS C8100 for fluorescent lamps, and the electronic stabilizer frequency for fluorescent lamps is stipulated to use bands other than 33 kHz to 40 kHz. 
 ※ It is caused by the frequency of the three-wavelength fluorescent lamp invading the frequency 38 kHz area of the TV remote control.

question: Can I use the overseas model evolution kit?
answer: Guide to using overseas model evolution kit - Domestic evolution kits can not be purchased and used for overseas models. - You can't use it because you bought an overseas evolution kit for a domestic model. ■ Reasons for non-use Evolution kits are sold in two models: FHD and UHD. 1) Firmware information (Mycom information) is different for overseas and domestic models. → If the firmware information value is different, it may not work abnormally. 2) Domestic and overseas models may not operate abnormally due to different hardware. 3) It is difficult to guide because there is no safety standard test report (compatibility verification) for the product. → According to the service regulations, products produced in each country are recommended to be used only in that country. question: There is no terrestrial UHD broadcast.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur because the terrestrial UHD broadcast receiving set-top box is not connected or the automatic channel is not set. Method of action UHD broadcast reception set-top box connection guide In the case of UHD TVs released between 2013 and 2016, which were purchased before April 2017, the European method (DVB-T2) is applied, so in order to receive UHD broadcasting, terrestrial UHD broadcasting reception set-top boxes must be installed to watch them. □ Required device: UHF antenna, terrestrial UHD broadcast receiving set-top box □ Connection method □ Viewing method
 1.The TV changes to the HDMI input terminal to which the UHD broadcast receiving set-top box is connected. (e.g., TV HDMI1 input mode must be changed when connecting to HDMI1 terminal ) Press the remote control home button Connected after selecting external input Move to external device Setting method: Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Press Channel/Broadcast in Menu Auto channel setup press Antenna connection and automatic channel setup In the case of 2017 UHD TV purchased after April 2017, the changed American method (ATSC3.0) circuit is applied so that terrestrial UHD broadcasting can be watched when UHF antenna is connected. After connecting the terrestrial UHF antenna, set up the automatic channel and use it. If UHF broadcasting does not come out even after setting up an automatic channel, it is necessary to check the UHD broadcasting transmission schedule by region if UHF broadcasting signals are not received in the residential area. Setting method: Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Press Channel/Broadcast in Menu Press Channel/Broadcast in Menu UHF Antenna Confirms Terrestrial UHD Broadcasting Receiver Kit Currently, there is no plan to retransmit terrestrial UHD broadcasting from cable companies, so it is impossible to watch terrestrial UHD broadcasting through cable broadcasting. However, it can be changed so that it can be retransmitted from the cable company in the future. In order to watch terrestrial UHD broadcasting, UHF antennas and terrestrial UHD broadcasting reception set-top boxes must be installed to watch. In order to watch terrestrial UHD broadcasting, you can watch it after connecting UHF antenna

question: I can't see the subtitles when playing the video.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur because the properties of the subtitle file are changed or the subtitles are not set. Method of action Check the title of the video file and subtitle file The name of the video file and subtitle file must be the same. If the titles are different, please modify the title of the file to be the same. . You can only modify the title of the video file and subtitle file on the computer.   How to turn on the subtitle setting Symptoms that subtitles do not appear when playing videos may occur because subtitles are not set. You can change the setting method to turn on the subtitle setting after playing the video. 
 ※ How to turn on subtitle settings During video playback → Simple menu of remote control → Subtitle setting → Subtitle → On. Play video → Simple menu Turn off subtitles → Select On Check with another subtitle file This may occur if the properties of the subtitle file are changed. When changing the properties of a subtitle file, the PC displays normal subtitles, but in the case of a monitor, subtitles cannot be displayed if the properties of the subtitles are changed.  
 ※ How to take action
 1.You have to download the subtitle file to another file and check it.
 2. Using the encoding program, video files and subtitle files can be combined into one to display normal subtitles when encoding into new files. Since there is no encoding program operated by Samsung Electronics, we cannot provide the program, and among the free encoding programs, DaumPod encoders with proven stability and performance are used the most, and you can use blogs to get information on how to encode and use them after encoding.

question: It doesn't work like a PC when running a web browser.
answer:
Constraint Description
 1.The site does not look normal. - The web browser is not compatible with the Java application, so it does not work normally if it is created using the Java application in the site. It doesn't support Active X. , sites that need to install ActiveX before using the site are not supported. - We do not support e-commerce for online product purchases. (Shopping mall payment, etc.) - Because the number of supported fonts is limited, some text may look corrupt. - If the memory capacity allocated to the web browser is exceeded, the page may not be loaded.
 2. I'm trying to watch a video by running a web browser, but it doesn't come out. - For videos that can be played after installing a separate program, there is no storage space where the TV can be installed separately. Cannot play. - In the case of the TV's web browser, up to Flash Player
 10.1 is supported, so content produced in a higher version than that version cannot be played. (The version of the site cannot be checked on TV) - If the memory capacity allocated to the web browser is exceeded, the page may not be loaded. - The web browser does not support the AAC audio codec due to memory limitations. Only MP3 codecs are supported. - Only H.264 + AAC (HW codec) / On2, Sorencon (SW codec) is supported when playing flash videos.
 3. While watching a movie, the web browser window suddenly turns off. Alternatively, the phrase "memory shortage" occurs. - If the memory capacity allocated to the web browser is exceeded, it can be turned off or stopped after the warning appears. For web browsers, use a simple web search.

question: STB (set-top box) intermittent power off and off have repeated symptoms.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to malfunction or communication with the set-top box. Method of action Initialization check TV malfunction symptoms may cause off / on symptoms while watching. In this case, please reset it to factory shipment status and use it. 
 ※ caution : Initialization must be carried out after initialization. Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Initialization] Password [0000] Enter Select [Initialization] [Check] Reboot when selected and initialization completed Check HDMI cable standard and replace cable It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. If the certified HDMI cable is not used, the symptoms of turning off during viewing may occur repeatedly due to communication errors. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase Please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable and use it. Check the "Ultral High Speed HDMI" print or imprint on the HDMI cable. Power cord, reconnect HDMI cable TV malfunction symptoms may cause off / on symptoms while watching. In this case, it is necessary to use after reconnecting the power cord and HDMI cable of the TV. Reconnect after disconnecting HDMI cable Reconnect after disconnecting power cord Check event log In the case of 2019 products, the event log function is applied, and a function to check the operation of the TV is added due to external devices. Whether it is turned off and on due to TV abnormalities using the event log function, or the symptoms of turning off and on due to abnormal signals on the set-top To see if it's happening. [Setting Method] Home → Menu → Customer Support → Customer Support Information → Under Direction Key → Check Event Log Event log information No event log information If there is information in the event log, the TV is operated by the set-top box, and if it matches the day of intermittent off symptoms You need to check the set-top box. If there is no information in the event log, it is necessary to update the TV to the latest version and use it if it is not malfunctioning by an external device. Check HDMI-CEC connection setting If the TV and the set-top box are connected to the HDMI terminal, intermittent power off symptoms may occur due to HDMI-CEC communication error. This is not a product problem, but a symptom caused by incorrect communication between the TV and the set-top box, and can be set so that communication through HDMI is not possible. Menu → System Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) When checking to turn on Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) Select Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) off 
 ※ reference HDMI-CEC is not a function applied only to Samsung products, but a communication standard used worldwide Misoperation may occur due to different communication contents used by Samsung and communication contents used by set-top box manufacturers, Even if you choose to turn off HDMI-CEC, you can use the same video / voice transmission through HDMI terminal. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware Software malfunctions applied to TVs can cause off symptoms while watching. The upgrade method is as follows.
 1.Upgrade to USB Samsung Electronics Homepage Access → Customer Support → Model Search → Download → Firmware → Download Firmware File → Save to USB memory after decompression → Connect USB TV
 2. When the network is connected You can update it directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. question: STB (set-top box) color abnormalities, red screen, and black and white screen symptoms appear.
answer:

Black-and-white Redness/color abnormalities Color blur / overlap / double Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide If the color appears to spread only on a specific channel, it may occur as a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. This is because if there is an abnormality in the product, the same color spreads on all channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Self-diagnosis method If the color looks smudged, it can be caused by a broadcast signal problem, and the image quality test function can check whether the product is abnormal or not. question: There are symptoms of STB (set-top box) screen blinking, mosaic, and breaking.
answer: Expected cause It may occur due to a broadcast signal or a set-top box abnormality. Method of action Broadcast signal check Symptoms that occur on a specific channel may occur due to abnormalities on the set-top box device or broadcast signals entering the set-top box, not product abnormalities. When watching a broadcast through a set-top box, the TV only acts as a monitor that shows the signal sent from the set-top box on the screen, Symptoms of screen breaking can occur due to weak broadcast signals or set-top box abnormalities, not TV abnormalities. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Reconnect the power cord of the set-top box Screen blinking symptoms may occur while watching due to set-top box malfunction. In this case, disconnect the power cord on the back of the set-top box and reconnect it about 1 minute later before using it. The set-top box starts initial power booting and needs to be checked after normal booting about 1 to 3 minutes later. If symptoms repeat even after reconnecting the power cord, please contact the broadcaster for an inspection of the set-top box [cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Self-diagnosis image quality test confirmation In the case of screen blinking symptoms, you can check the abnormality/nothingness of the product using the image quality test built into the TV. [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support [Self Diagnosis] Selection Select [Start image quality test] Sample image stored on TV is displayed When the image quality test is conducted, the image is displayed on the screen, If the image comes out normally,  It's not a product problem. Please contact the broadcaster for set-top box abnormalities or broadcasting signal problems and check the broadcasting signal [cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] Check HDMI cable It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. If the certified HDMI cable is not used, communication errors may cause poor image quality while watching. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase Please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable and use it. Check the "Ultral High Speed HDMI" print or imprint on the HDMI cable.

question: It takes a long time to change the channel.
answer: Check synchronization time when channel is variable When changing the TV channel, a delay time occurs to synchronize the video and voice. In the past, analog TVs did not require much time to process data by watching low-definition images, so they could be changed quickly when changing channels, but since broadcasting itself has a lot of data when watching high-definition digital broadcasting, synchronization time of about 1 to 2 seconds is required when changing channels, resulting in symptoms that take a long time to change channels. Please note that this is caused by an increase in data throughput while watching high-definition digital broadcasting, not product failure, and is used as a common symptom of all digital TVs around the world. It may take a long time to change the channel even when using STB (set-top box). If the sudden channel change is delayed, you need to check if the set-top is being updated regardless of the TV. Inquiries need to be made to each set-top carrier.

question: The sound of all the channels suddenly went down.
answer:
Reason for revision of volume standard Revision of the volume standards for broadcasting programs following the revision of the Broadcasting Act; As of May 2, 2016, the Ministry of Science, ICT and Future Planning has established standard volume standards for digital broadcasting programs and advertisements to ease viewer inconvenience caused by rapid changes in volume between and within channels. (Compliance with Article 70-2 (1) of the Broadcasting Act) Q & A Q1. Did the sound suddenly turn down? A1. As the standard law for digital television broadcast volume is applied from May 2, it is normal that the sound becomes smaller than before. Q2. Is there any reason to set the volume standard lower than before? A2. Due to inequality caused by competition for sound levels between broadcasting channel users (home shopping, sports, dramas, etc.), there was a difference in volume between channels and programs in the channel, and the inconvenience was up to consumers. In order to solve this inconvenience, genre-specific characteristic channels such as music, movies, and sports are cases where the law has been revised, recognizing that volume management at the production stage is necessary. (
 ※ If professional music programs such as classical music and Korean traditional music are provided live, volume standards are not applied) Q3. Is there a standard value for volume level? A3. It is difficult to guide the standard value of the volume level. The standard volume prescribed by the relevant law is -24LKFS, and the tolerance is ±2 dB. .(
 ※ LKFS is a standard unit of volume value calculated in consideration of human auditory cognitive characteristics) Q4. But I'd like to check the TV problem. A4. You can check it through the function of self-diagnosis. Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound quality test Using Constant volume Please check if this comes out.  Alternatively, it can be seen that the volume size that was different for each channel and within the channel is now a uniform volume size. (There are menu differences depending on TV model. Please refer to the user manual ) Testing the sound quality of TV self-diagnosis
 1.Remote control Home button Click
 2. In the lower left-hand corner, Set Please choose.
 3. Customer support on the menu → Device care Selection
 4. Device Care → Self-diagnosis Selection
 5. Sound quality test Please check the sound status by choice. Q5. How can I know that the law has been revised even though consumers have not been notified? A5. It was announced through the following broadcast by broadcasting company. [Publicity text for viewers (TV subtitles)] With the implementation of related laws (Article 70-2 (1) of the Broadcasting Act) to resolve the volume imbalance between broadcasting channels and programs, digital TV broadcasting programs of all broadcasting media (terrestrial waves, cables, satellites, etc.) will be broadcast in compliance with the standard volume from 4 a.m. on May 2, 2016. Viewers, please note that the TV volume may decrease compared to the present.
