question: Can I buy 3D glasses / remote control / keyboard / accessories for overseas?
answer: Information on the purchase of accessories for overseas ■ Purchase overseas 3D glasses Q & A Q: Can I buy overseas TV 3D glasses? A: 3D glasses can be purchased and used in Korea for public use (overseas/domestic). However, it is divided into battery type and rechargeable type according to the model, and the TV must support Bluetooth function, and can only be used by connecting to each other in the model released in the year. 3D glasses type Frequency (IR) 3D glasses Smart (Bluetooth) 3D Glasses ■ Purchase remote control for overseas Q & A Q: The remote control you use is frequency method (IR), can you connect and use the smart (Bluetooth) remote control when you purchase it? A: If the remote control in use is a frequency method (IR), only the frequency method can be used. The smart (Bluetooth) remote control can be used only when the TV supports the Bluetooth function, and can only be used by connecting to each other on models released in the year. However, in the case of overseas TVs, certain buttons may not work when operating the domestic remote control due to restrictions (specialized functions) depending on the market conditions of each country. Information on the purchase of remote control for overseas Frequency (IR) remote control Smart (Bluetooth) remote control ■ Overseas keyboard purchase Q & A Q: Can I buy an overseas TV keyboard? A: TV-only keyboards can be purchased and used in Korea for public (overseas/domestic). TV-only keyboards can only be connected if the TV supports Bluetooth functions and only models released between 2012 and 2015. Note) TV-only keyboards are not connected to other products. However, in the case of overseas TVs, certain buttons may not work when operating domestic keyboards due to restrictions (specialized functions) depending on market conditions by country. Overseas keyboard purchase guide TV-only keyboard ■ Overseas cable related purchase Q & A Q: Can I buy a connection cable such as a power cable? A: Power cables, HDMI cables, AOC cables, gender cables, etc. can be purchased and used in Korea for public use (overseas/domestic). Overseas cable related purchase guide power cable HDMI cable AOC cable Video gender cable

question: Please let me know about the use of integrated remote control after connecting UN50JS7200F model and HW-J250 model only with optical cable.
answer: Question content Is it possible to adjust the power and volume with the TV remote control by connecting the TV (UN50JS7200F) and the sound bar (HW-J250) only with the optical cable? Answers (When connecting optical cable) Is it possible to turn off and turn on the power with the TV remote control? When the digital voice (optical light) output terminal of the UN50JS7200F model and the digital voice (optical light) input terminal of the HW-J250/KR model are connected by optical cable, the sound of the TV is output immediately. The sound bar power ON / OFF is not supported by the TV remote control while only the optical cable is connected to the voice signal output terminal. (When connecting optical cable) Is UP / DOWN of volume possible with TV remote control? This terminal is not supported to adjust the volume of the sound bar with the TV remote control while only the optical cable is connected to the voice signal output terminal. .

question: There is no multi-channel (MMS) broadcast.
answer: Multichannel (MMS) broadcasting viewing method DTV reception must be possible and an antenna that is directly received must be installed. ■ Support model list Support model list Year Product line Model group 2014 - All H series are supported 2013 LED F7400 / F7500 or higher / UN46F6400AF / UN40F6100AF PDP PN51F5500AF / PN51F4500AF / PN51F5300AF 2012 LED ES7000 or higher / UN40ES6500F / UN40EH5300F PDP PN51E490B / PN51E6500EF 2011 LED D6000 or higher / UN32ES5500F / UN32D5550RF PDP PN43D490A / PN51D550C ■ DTV reception area guide Multichannels are not available in all regions. We are planning to expand it step by step, but so far, we have limited support near Suwon. question: Please let me know the product with HDCP applied.
answer:
Function guide What's HDCP? HDCP stands for High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection, which is a coded digital transmission signal. Failure to decrypt causes dizzying movement of dots in various colors or screen failure on TV. This technology prevents indiscriminate replication by applying HDCP to digital content. Therefore, normal output is not possible unless the HDMI-related equipment used is HDCP supported. 
 ※ HDCP has been applied to Samsung TV since 2004.

question: How to assemble the TV stand.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶). Assembling a stand
 1.Let's find out how to assemble the stand when reinstalling the TV after purchasing it for the first time or moving.
 2. Please check the components before assembling the stand.
 3. The components are 1 stand, 1 stand guide, and 8 assembly screws. 
 ※ Components may vary depending on the model, so please refer to the manual.
 4. First, assemble the stand and stand guide. Place the stand guide on the stand. Please adjust the screw hole at this time.
 5. Use the driver to fasten two screws each on the top and back of the stand guide. 
 ※ When using an electric driver, adjust the screw line so that it does not wear out.
 6. Assemble the assembled stand and TV body.
 7. Place a soft cloth on the table and lie down so that the TV screen faces to the floor.
 8. Put the assembled stand into the hole at the bottom of the TV. At this time, push the stand to the end and assemble it.
 9. Please fasten the screws after the assembly is completed. 
 ※ When using an electric driver, adjust the screw line so that it does not wear out.
 10. When screwing, please fasten the bottom first and then fasten the top.
 11. After the assembly is completed, please stop the TV and check if the left and right sides are tilted. If there is a left and right slope, please reassemble the stand guide.

question:
What is the function of film mode, please tell me the difference between automatic 1 and automatic
 2.
answer:
Function guide What's film mode? - You can set the optimal image quality for watching movies. When watching a movie, watch it in the mode you want. 
 ※ It can only be used when watching TV or when the input signal is external input, component (480i, 1080i), HDMI (1080i). The difference between automatic 1 and automatic 2 in film mode
 1.The movie is shot on 24 Progressive.
 2. The broadcast is conducted at 60 Interface
 3. In order to send a movie, the broadcast goes through a 3:2 process and sets 24 Progressive to 60 Interface.
 4. On TV, we think that the signal from the broadcast is 3:2 when the original signal is sent to the movie, and we consider this when making 60P by de-interlace.
 5. The menu used at this time is film mode. - Automatic 1: ignore the subtitles of the movie and de-interlace. (The caption may be broken) - Automatic 2: De-interlace considering the subtitles of the movie. (The caption does not break) Film mode setting method Choose Menu → Screen → Additional Settings → Film Mode [Off, Auto 1, Auto 2]. Select [Film Mode] Select from [Off / Automatic 1 / Automatic 2]

question: I can see a rainbow-colored band.
answer: Expected cause It can be caused by the signal inspection of the broadcasting company. Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide The symptom of a rainbow-colored band on a specific broadcast channel is not a product abnormality, but a symptom caused by a broadcast signal. You should contact the broadcaster (cable, IPTV) you are watching and get confirmation. Self-diagnosis method You can check the abnormality/nothingness of the product through the image quality test function applied to the product. How to check image quality test Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. Look at the test screen and check for abnormalities. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen. If the rainbow-colored band does not overlap and the TEST image is clearly visible, , It is not a product problem, but a symptom caused by broadcasting companies (cables, IPTVs) sending the above pattern of screens when checking broadcasting equipment or sending test broadcasts on their own. If it continues to occur for a long time, you should contact the broadcaster (cable, IPTV) for confirmation. How to check image quality test in 2017 Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed]

question:
Can I upgrade to USB
 3.0?
There is no domestic terrestrial (DTV) broadcast of overseas products.
answer:
Expected cause It may not be different from the domestic broadcasting method (modulation method). Method of action Check broadcasting method (modulation method) When using overseas products in Korea, the broadcasting method (modulation method) is wrong, so normal viewing may not be possible. General broadcasting automatic channel setting ('11 ~ '13) 
 ① Select a channel from the menu 
 ② DTV channel selection 
 ③ Automatic channel setup selection 
 ④ Automatic channel setting execution screen Fixed-line broadcasting automatic channel setting ('11 ~ '13) 
 ① Select a channel from the menu 
 ② DTV channel selection 
 ③ Automatic channel setup selection 
 ④ Automatic channel setting execution screen Broadcasting methods of each country in the world; Broadcasting system Rep. of Korea The United States Europe Analog (ATV) NTSC NTSC PAL Digital (DTV) ATSC NTSC DVB-T In particular, in the United States, analog (ATV) reception methods are the same among domestic broadcasting methods, but digital (DTV) reception methods are different. (Apply clear zoom broadcasting method) What's a clear zoom? Quadrature Amplitude Modulation (QAM) is a technology mainly used for high-speed digital modulation to improve transmission efficiency in limited frequency bands. It is a method of modulating by combining the amplitude and phase of the carrier wave. In the case of digital cable broadcasting, QAM is used as a channel transmission method, and "Clear QAM" refers to a device that can receive channels other than unencrypted channels (paid channels). Set-top box connection   If you have a suggestion to watch TV purchased overseas due to the wrong broadcasting method, you can watch it by connecting the set-top box.

question: I see sunspots/rockspots/whitespots/marks. (defective pixels)
answer:
Expected cause - Due to technical limitations in the manufacturing process of TV panel manufacturers, pixels of about 1 PPM (1,000,000:1) may appear black (Dark Dot), but this does not affect the performance of the product. Method of action Broadcast signal check guide In the case of recently transmitted digital broadcasting, it is the case of filming in a dark place or appearing to be a TV defective pixel due to foreign matter or dust on the camera being filmed. Bright spots can shine in many places. At this time, if there are no symptoms when switching to another channel or watching another broadcast, it can be seen as a problem according to the broadcaster's shooting signal. If points occur in the same part when switching other channels or watching other broadcasts, inspection is required, and panel abnormalities can be diagnosed in the settings function on the TV. Self-diagnosis method - TV setting → customer support → self-diagnosis → image quality test - TV setting → customer support → device care → video test, or image quality test 
 ※ The menu selection order varies depending on the TV model.
 1.Remote control Home button Please press .
 2. Set Please choose.
 3. Customer support Please move to.
 4. Device care Please move to.
 5. Self-diagnosis Please go to and choose.
 6. Image quality test Please check the screen status by selection. In cases of abnormality; Bright Dot: It's ideal to have at least one pixel that looks red, green, blue, purple, sky, yellow, and white in a black pattern. If it is normal Dark Dot: With pixels that look black in certain patterns, TV panel resolution can be seen up to 1 per 1,000,000. How to check Dark Dot by pattern - R.G.B pattern : Pixels that look black in each pattern - White pattern : Red, green, blue, purple, sky, yellow, black-looking pixels 
 ※ Fine foreign matter inside the panel is not included in pixel defect.

question: The screen lighted up automatically. It's getting dark and it's happening again and again. (Motion lighting)
answer:
Expected cause It has the ability to automatically adjust the contrast to maximize the image quality of the product. This can cause the screen brightness to change automatically. (Motion lighting, automatic contrast adjustment, echo power saving function) - 2017 model: Adjust screen brightness, adjust motion brightness Method of action Broadcasting program confirmation Symptoms that occur on a specific channel may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. TVs can watch digital and analog broadcasts at the same time, which can occur if the broadcast signal is weak when watching analog wired broadcasting channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Check Motion Lighting (Motion Brightness Adjustment) Settings Motion lighting, which automatically changes brightness depending on the contrast of the image, may be set and generated. The method of setting motion lighting is as follows. (Motion lighting is supported from 2011 D series or higher. ) Setting method Menu → Screen → Advanced Settings → Motion Lighting → Turn Off 2017 model setting method Menu → General → Eco Power Saving Settings → Adjust Motion Brightness → Change to Off Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Echo power saving setting Select Motion Brightness Adjustment Function Change to turn off motion brightness adjustment (gray light) Check eco power saving (screen brightness adjustment) setting Among the TV functions, the eco-sensor function adjusts the screen brightly when the surroundings are bright and dark when the surroundings are dark depending on the brightness of the surroundings. During viewing, the screen may appear brightly and darkly repeatedly. Please change the eco sensor function to off and use it. How to Change Echo Power Saving Settings [Menu → System → Eco Power Saving Settings → Eco Sensor → Off] proceed. Menu - System Echo Power Saving Settings - Echo Sensor - Select Off 2017 model setting method Menu - General - Echo Power Saving Settings - Adjust Screen Brightness - Change to Off Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Echo power saving setting Screen brightness adjustment function selection Change screen brightness adjustment to off (gray light) How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and there are two ways to upgrade: USB or network. 1 . If you upgrade to USB Access to Samsung Electronics homepage (http://www.samsung.com/sec/) → Customer support → Model search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file → Release compression and save it in USB memory → Connect USB TV to upgrade. 2 . Upgrade while connected to the network You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version . [Installation Method] [Installation Method] menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Select Update Now.
 1.Press the home button of the remote control
 2. Move lower left [Settings]

question: I'd like to know how to set up an integrated remote control for 2014 TV.
answer:

 ※ Please proceed with IR expansion cable reconnection and integrated remote control reset.

(Basic broadcasting source = recommended for ON TV panel)  (Assistant broadcast source = added only to ON TV setting value)  (ON TV is not set = not applied to ON TV)     13. Select the input condition to which the STB is associated.  14. Select Channel Up/Down to see if it changes.  15. If the channel is changed, press Yes to change the completion, and if the completion is not changed, select No to change the channel again.  16. When the channel change is completed normally, select Complete.

question: There is something wrong with the 3D screen on the smart TV...

3D self-diagnosis method

 1.Connect your 3D glasses. (Attempt to reconnect when connection fails)

question: I want to consult about the TV voltage I bought in the US.
answer: Question content I bought an LED TV (UN55F6350AF) in the United States, and I wonder if I can use the TV when I return to Korea after using it locally. I think this product purchased in the U.S. is only for 110 V, can I change it to 220 V at a domestic A/S center? Question content UN55F6350AF model is being purchased and used in the United States, so you inquired if it can be used in Korea in the future. LED TV products sold in the United States in 2013 are 110 V-only products according to safety standards, so voltage cannot be changed.  For reference, the broadcasting method is different, so if you want to watch a broadcast in Korea (Korea), you can only watch it when connecting the set-top box, so please refer to it. Broadcasting system In case of RF condition: Analog broadcasting ends on December 31, 2012 when antenna is connected, and digital broadcasting cannot be watched due to different broadcasting methods Set-top box (STB) condition: If you want to watch TV in Korea (Korea) when watching digital broadcasting, you can only watch it with external input after installing the set-top box (STB). Set-top box (STB) provided when signing up for IPTV: wired broadcasting cable, Skylife, SKB, KT (Olet)

question: Please let me know the TV that supports simultaneous screen in 2013 model
answer:
2013 Simultaneous Screen Support Model Guide  Target model   2013 TV model that supports simultaneous screen function        Simultaneous screen mode  Support model      A/B/C support  LED F7400, 7500, 8000, 8200, 8500, 9000, 85S9AF, 55S9CAF    B/C support  LED F6100, 6330, 6360, 6400, 6420, 6450, 6600, 6700, 6800, 6900, 7100, 7120, 7150    Simultaneous screen Function not supported  LED F5200 or less does not support simultaneous screen     METHOD FOR WEEKING TV ON SIMULTANEOUS SCREEN  Virtual remote control ( ) > Menu ( ) > Screen > Simultaneous Screen Run to turn on.  
 ※ The screen shown may vary depending on the model.  You can watch TV on a small screen while using an external device or computer. For example, You can watch a movie with a Blu-ray player and watch a broadcast on the same screen. However, it cannot be used if a smart hub or stereoscopic image is in operation. In addition, if you turn off the power while watching TV on the simultaneous screen, the function is turned off.   Simultaneous screen : You can choose whether to use the concurrent screen.  Channel : You can select the channel on the subscreen.  Screen size : You can select the size of the subscreen.  Position selection : You can select the location of the subscreen.  Acoustic selection : In simultaneous screen mode, you can select the sound on the screen you want to listen to.   
 ※ When using the game or karaoke function as the main screen, the image quality of the simultaneous screen may be poor. 
 ※ To watch TV on the same screen, the input source of the main screen must be component or HDMI, and the resolution of the input image must be below FHD level. The sub-screen is only available for digital channel viewing. Simultaneous screen function   A. Screen size ( ): Select the size of the subscreen.  B. Screen size ( ): Select the size of the subscreen.  C. Location selection ( ): Select the location of the subscreen.

question: I can't get a set-top box/converter connection.
answer: Expected cause It may occur due to switching to external input mode or HDMI cable abnormality. Method of action Check external input switching If the TV and the set-top box are connected by an HDMI cable, the input mode of the TV must be changed to the HDMI input mode to which the set-top box is connected. Press the home button on the TV remote control. Please select HDMI mode where the set-top box is connected. How to set up a product after 2017 When watching TV broadcasting through the set-top box, you need to switch to connected input mode such as HDMI / component to use the set-top box. Press the remote control home button Select external input and move to connected external device Check the operation status of the set-top box Check if the set-top box power works normally (check power ON status and select channel). If the power is turned on normally, the current channel display appears on the front liquid crystal. If the front liquid crystal is not displayed, it is necessary to check the reconnection of the power cord of the set-top box, If there is no display on the liquid crystal even when reconnecting the power cord, it is necessary to check the set-top box. Power standby status (only time information is displayed as LED) Normal operation status (channel number is displayed as LED) Check cable connection status It is necessary to check whether the TV and the set-top box are connected normally. Please separate and reconnect the cable connected to the back of the TV and set-top box. Remove and reconnect the HDMI cable on the back of the TV Remove and reconnect the HDMI cable on the back of the set-top Remove and reconnect the TV rear component cable Remove and reconnect the set-top rear component cable HDMI cable confirmation guide It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase Uncertified cables may not show the screen or cause symptoms such as poor image quality. In this case, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable and use it. Check the "Ultral High Speed HDMI" print or imprint on the HDMI cable. Check HDMI cable test A self-diagnosis function that checks for abnormalities in the HDMI cable connected to the TV is built into the TV to check for abnormalities in the TV or HDMI cable That we've never seen before. (Apply to products after 2019) [Setting Method] Home → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Signal Information Start → HDMI Cable Test Signal information start → HDMI cable test HDMI cable test in progress HDMI cable normal HDMI cable error

question: I can't get the TV voice output from the speaker of the home theater.
answer: Expected cause It may occur if it is not recognized due to interference by external devices or if it is not a genuine cable. Method of action Guide to setting TV and home theater functions If you connect the TV and the home theater (sound bar) to HDMI and listen to the TV sound through the speaker, connect the TV and the home theater (sound bar) to the HDMI-ARC terminal and check the settings. TV: Select Anynet + (HDMI-CEC) on Home Theater: Select to turn on the audio return channel (ARC) Select TV menu → Aeynet + (HDMI-CEC) Aeynet+ (HDMI-CEC) → Select "On" Home Theater Menu → Select Settings Sound → Audio Return Channel → Automatic Selection Check connection with HDMI (ARC) terminal The audio return channel (ARC) must be connected to the HDMI terminal of the home theater and the HDM (ARC marked terminal) terminal of the TV to make voice in both directions. Connect to HDMI terminal of home theater Connect to HDMI (ARC) terminal of TV  Check HDMI cable It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting a TV and an external device with an HDMI cable. If the certified HDMI cable is not used, communication errors may cause disconnection. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable. Check the "Ultral High Speed HDMI" print or imprint on the HDMI cable. Check after removing connection of external device It may occur due to communication abnormalities with other external devices connected to the TV. Please check after removing the connection of other external devices other than TV and home theater (sound bar).

question: Every channel has the same line.
answer:
Expected cause
 1.It may be caused by a broadcast signal abnormality.
 2. It can be caused by abnormalities such as internal circuitry, panels, etc. Vertical line Horizontal-line Method of action Broadcast signal check confirmation guide (1) If a vertical line occurs only on a specific channel, it may occur beyond a broadcast signal, not beyond a product. If a product abnormality occurs, a line is formed in the same location of all channels, but if a line is generated by a broadcast signal, This is because the location of the line is different for each channel. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Broadcast signal check confirmation guide (2) When you press the menu button on the remote control, you can check for product abnormalities using the menu window displayed. ☞ If the line appears to be covered by the menu window, it is necessary to check the broadcast signal as a symptom of a line occurring due to a broadcast signal abnormality. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. ☞ If the line appears on the menu window as it is, it is a symptom of product abnormality and needs to be checked by the engineer. Self-diagnosis method If the line is visible on the screen, it may occur due to a broadcast signal problem, may occur due to TV abnormalities, and the image quality test function can check whether the product is abnormal or not. How to check image quality test [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality How to check image quality test in 2017 [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed] During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if the high-definition image does not have a line and is clearly visible, , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If there is a line in the high-definition image displayed, it can cause circuit abnormalities and you need to check it out. question: The power is on late.
answer:
Expected cause It can be caused by a temporary malfunction or an abnormality in the power supply circuit. Method of action TV power running time guide In the case of recently sold digital TVs, when the product is powered on, the power is turned on after checking the operation of various circuits to implement high-definition images and preparing to implement high-definition images, so the initial power is turned on for a long time compared to analog TVs in the past. The specifications managed by the product are within 10 seconds of initial power ON, and if the TV screen is displayed within 10 seconds, it is a characteristic of high-definition TV, not a product abnormality, so please refer to it. Power cord connecting method It can be caused by temporary malfunction of the power terminal circuit. In the case of temporary malfunction symptoms, simple initialization is possible, and please disconnect the power cord connection on the back of the TV and reconnect the power cord. 
 ※ In order for the power circuit to be fully initialized, remove the power cord and plug it in after about 1 minute.  When reconnecting the power cord, you need to plug it in so that it can be contacted well. The power cord on the back of the TV is loose. TV rear power cord connection separation Reconnect the power cord on the back of the TV Initialization method Due to malfunction symptoms, it should be initialized under factory shipment conditions. 
 ※ [Caution] Initialization must be carried out after initialization. [Settings Method] Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Initialization → Password 0000 → Initialization completed after rebooting Press the home button of the remote control Move lower left [Settings] Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Initialization] Password [0000] Enter Select [Initialization] [Check] Reboot when selected and initialization completed

question: I can't hear you. (External devices)
I have a black line.
answer:
Expected cause
 1.It may be caused by a broadcast signal abnormality.
 2. It can be caused by abnormalities such as internal circuitry, panels, etc. Vertical line Horizontal-line Method of action Broadcast signal check confirmation guide (1) If a vertical line occurs only on a specific channel, it may occur beyond a broadcast signal, not beyond a product. If a product abnormality occurs, a line is formed in the same location of all channels, but if a line is generated by a broadcast signal, This is because the location of the line is different for each channel. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Broadcast signal check confirmation guide (2) When you press the menu button on the remote control, you can check for product abnormalities using the menu window displayed. ☞ If the line appears to be covered by the menu window, it is necessary to check the broadcast signal as a symptom of a line occurring due to a broadcast signal abnormality. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. ☞ If the line appears on the menu window as it is, it is a symptom of product abnormality and needs to be checked by the engineer. Self-diagnosis method If the line is visible on the screen, it may occur due to a broadcast signal problem, may occur due to TV abnormalities, and the image quality test function can check whether the product is abnormal or not. How to check image quality test [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality How to check image quality test in 2017 [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed] During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if the high-definition image does not have a line and is clearly visible, , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If there is a line in the high-definition image displayed, it can cause circuit abnormalities and you need to check it out. question: The voice recognition TV won't turn off.
answer:
Expected cause
 1.If you turn off the power immediately without turning off the power after floating the help bar on High TV while watching TV, the power will not be turned off by voice recognition.
 2. It may occur if the voice recognition function is not turned on.
 3. If the surrounding noise or voice is small, it may not work. Method of action Speech recognition utterance The way to turn off the power through voice recognition is to fire with a high TV (smart TV) and turn off the power when the lower help bar is floating. Please check again how to turn off the power and use it. Voice recognition utterance word when watching TV
 1.If you command “High TV” while watching TV, the above help bar appears at the bottom of the screen.
 2. Turn off the power - When you say “Exit”, the power off function works. Check voice recognition settings You need to check the voice recognition settings to use the voice recognition function. Please change the voice recognition function to On and use it. Menu → Select "System" System → Select "Voice and Motion Recognition" Voice and Motion Recognition → Select "Voice Recognition" Voice recognition → Select "on" Voice recognition sensitivity check If the utterance is not recognized well while using voice recognition, you should check the voice recognition sensitivity setting. If your voice is small or there is ambient noise, please change the voice recognition sensitivity setting to a higher level and use it. System → Voice and Motion Recognition → Select "Voice Recognition" Voice recognition → Select "voice sensitivity" Voice sensitivity → Set high in "ring" Voice sensitivity → Set "recognition sensitivity" to high Confirmation of surrounding environmental conditions If the surrounding noise is severe or the utterance (voice) is small, it may not work. Please check the distance conditions within 1 to 4 m of the TV standard while the surrounding noise is low and use the voice recognition function again. Environmental Conditions Confirmation Guide Hang Mok Long range voice recognition (TV built-in microphone) Near-field voice recognition (Smart remote control) Ambient noise 40 db or less 50 db or less Ignition size 60 db or more 60 db or more Recognition distance 1 ~ 4 m 30 cm or less TV volume (when voice recognition is operated) It is automatically adjusted to TV volume 5 during voice recognition operation.

question: It works only when you press the button several times.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to insufficient battery capacity of the remote control or more than the remote control. Method of action Remote control battery replacement description Most of the symptoms that the remote control does not work are caused by the lack of remaining battery capacity of the remote control. The battery of the remote control provided at the time of purchase is naturally discharged in the distribution process, so it is difficult to use it as much as expected, and the remote control battery must be replaced with a new one. In the case of products sold as cheap bundled products, the usage time is much shorter than that of genuine batteries, so it is recommended to use genuine batteries packaged in pairs. Battery polarity confirmation explanation When replacing the remote control battery, the battery polarity may be wrong and the remote control may not work. You need to connect the battery - pole to an area that protrudes like a battery insertion spring. If the battery + pole is connected to a spring-like protruding area, the remote control does not work.  Remote control battery insertion part Battery polarity NG Battery normal connection    A new pair of battery replacement explanations When replacing the remote control battery, it may occur when using it by replacing the battery used by other products, not by replacing it in pairs. Unlike the old remote control in the past, the remote control of the recently sold model is equipped with smart functions and has high power consumption, so even batteries that used to operate normally in other products It may not work normally on TV. When replacing the remote control battery, you must replace the pair together. Remote control battery insertion part Remote control battery is different pair [Note] The remote control genuine battery is charged at
 3.2 V and sold, and in the case of the TV remote control, if the battery voltage drops below 2 V, the remote control does not work. Remote controls for products other than TVs operate below 2 V, but in the case of Samsung remote controls, smart functions are applied and operate only under conditions above 2 V, so other products If you replace the battery you used, the remote control will not work if it is less than 2 V, so you must replace the pair together when replacing the remote control battery.

question: It stops playing the video.
answer: Expected cause It can be caused by damage or malfunction of the video file. Method of action METHOD FOR CHECKING VIDEO CODEC INFORMATION Symptoms of stopping only in certain videos may occur because the video file, not the product's abnormality, is damaged or the bitrate, the speed value of the video, does not match the specifications supported by the product. In this case, action can be taken through encoding, and it is necessary to use it after changing it to a video specification that can be supported on TV. Note] Video support specifications that can be supported on TV (based on 2017 QTV) - For detailed specifications, please refer to the manual for each product. USB Memory Format Checking Method If the file system of the memory device is damaged, normal playback may not be possible. Back up the files stored on the memory device to your computer and use them after formatting the memory device. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and there are two ways to upgrade: USB or network. If you upgrade to USB Access to Samsung Electronics homepage (http://www.samsung.com/sec/) → Customer support → Model search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file → Release compression and save it in USB memory → Connect USB TV to upgrade. Upgrade while connected to the network You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version.  [Installation Method] menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Select Update Now. Menu - Move Customer Support Select [Software Update] Select [Update now] After checking the update, proceed with the update

question: The screen does not appear after connecting set-top box / STB / IPTV.
answer: Expected cause It may occur because cable connection and external input switching are not possible. Method of action Check external input switching If the TV and the set-top box are connected by an HDMI cable, the input mode of the TV must be changed to the HDMI input mode to which the set-top box is connected. Press the home button on the TV remote control. Please select HDMI mode where the set-top box is connected. How to set up a product after 2017 When watching TV broadcasting through the set-top box, you need to switch to connected input mode such as HDMI / component to use the set-top box. Press the remote control home button Select external input and move to connected external device Check the operation status of the set-top box Check if the set-top box power works normally (check power ON status and select channel). If the power is turned on normally, the current channel display appears on the front liquid crystal. If the front liquid crystal is not displayed, it is necessary to check the reconnection of the power cord of the set-top box, If there is no display on the liquid crystal even when reconnecting the power cord, it is necessary to check the set-top box. Power standby status (only time information is displayed as LED) Normal operation status (channel number is displayed as LED) Check cable connection status It is necessary to check whether the TV and the set-top box are connected normally. Please separate and reconnect the cable connected to the back of the TV and set-top box. Remove and reconnect the HDMI cable on the back of the TV Remove and reconnect the HDMI cable on the back of the set-top Remove and reconnect the TV rear component cable Remove and reconnect the set-top rear component cable HDMI cable confirmation guide It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase Uncertified cables may not show the screen or cause symptoms such as poor image quality. In this case, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable and use it. Check the "Ultral High Speed HDMI" print or imprint on the HDMI cable. Check HDMI cable test A self-diagnosis function that checks for abnormalities in the HDMI cable connected to the TV is built into the TV to check for abnormalities in the TV or HDMI cable That we've never seen before. (Apply to products after 2019) [Setting Method] Home → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Signal Information Start → HDMI Cable Test Signal information start → HDMI cable test HDMI cable test in progress HDMI cable normal HDMI cable error

question: I can't hear you. (Antenna, wired cable)
There is no digital broadcast.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur because the broadcast signal is weak or the channel is not set. Method of action External input checking method If you watch TV broadcasting through the set-top box, the external input setting for using the set-top box may be wrong and the broadcast screen may not appear. Press the external input button at the top of the remote control to switch to TV mode. Press the TV/External Input button to go to the external input PC → TV Self-diagnosis method If a specific broadcasting channel does not appear, it is a symptom caused by weak broadcasting signals. The TV is equipped with a function to check the broadcast reception sensitivity, so you can check whether it is a product abnormality or a broadcast signal abnormality. [Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Check the digital signal strength. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Digital signal information execution Digital signal sensitivity check [Check 2017 product standard signal information] [Press remote control home button] Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Signal Information] Check antenna signal status When digital signal sensitivity is executed, normal broadcasting viewing is possible only when at least 3 out of 10 antennas are received. If the digital signal sensitivity is displayed below 3 spaces, the broadcast signal reception status is weak. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for inspection of the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] Automatic channel setting method It may be caused by not entering a digital broadcasting channel on the TV. When setting up an automatic channel, search for all channels on the TV, remember channels with broadcast signals, and do not remember channels without broadcast signals, and then search for all channels on the TV It is a function that automatically remembers the channel. It takes about 3 to 5 minutes for the automatic channel. Check [Menu → Channel → Automatic Channel Settings ]. Menu - Channel DTV channel selection (general broadcasting) DTV channel selection (wired broadcasting) Auto channel setup execution  [Note] Select DTV channel 
 ① General: Install a separate digital antenna to select a digital broadcast when watching. 
 ② Wired: Select to watch digital broadcasting using wired/cable broadcasting. In the case of apartments, they are divided into general/wired according to the broadcasting equipment of the apartment management office. → When setting up an automatic channel, set it to DTV channel selection wired and then set up an automatic channel. If DTV broadcasting is not received, set DTV channel selection to normal and proceed with automatic channel.  
 ※ About 90% of domestic TV broadcasting households use wired / cable. [Before 2006] METHOD FOR SETTING AUTOMATIC CHANNEL Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection Antenna connection status selection 
 ※ Select the following items when using UHF antenna [As of 2008 ~ 2010] Menu → Channel → Automatic Channel Setting Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection Auto channel setup execution [2011 ~ 2014 standard] Menu → Channel → Automatic channel setting Menu → Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution [2015 standard] Menu → Channel → Automatic channel setting Menu → Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution [As of 2016] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings However, if it is not a smart remote control, you only need to press the menu button. (☞ 2016 model does not need to distinguish general / wired before setting up automatic channel) [Press remote control home button] [Click Settings on Screen] [Click Channel/Broadcast in Menu] [Click Automatic Channel Settings] [As of 2017] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings However, if it is not a smart remote control, you only need to press the menu button. (☞ 2017 model does not need to distinguish general / wired before setting up automatic channel) [Press remote control home button] Move [Settings] at the bottom left Press [Channel/Broadcast] on the menu Press [Automatic Channel Settings] Explanation of the cause of the broadcast signal If a specific broadcasting channel does not appear even after setting up an automatic channel, please contact the broadcaster for symptoms caused by weak broadcasting signals, not product abnormalities. [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] You need to check the broadcast signal.

question: The screen is broken.
answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by poor sensitivity to receive broadcast signals. Method of action Broadcast signal check confirmation guide If screen disconnection symptoms occur on a specific broadcasting channel, it may occur due to weak reception of broadcast signals, not product abnormalities. Unlike analog TVs used in the past, digital TVs appear to be abnormal in products due to symptoms such as screen stop and screen breakage when broadcasting signals are weak. It is not a problem with the actual product, but a symptom caused by weak reception of the broadcast signal, so please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. Signal strength checking method Symptoms of screen blinking while watching can occur due to broadcast signal problems, TV abnormalities, and abnormality of the product can be checked through the digital signal strength function. [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Digital Signal Intensity] By executing digital signal strength, normal digital broadcasting can be watched only when at least 3 spaces of antenna are received, If antenna reception is displayed below 3 spaces, screen disconnection may occur while watching the broadcast. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Pre-2008 products [Menu → Channel → Digital Signal Intensity] Proceed. Menu - Channel - Digital Signal Intensity Products since 2009 [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Digital Signal Intensity] will be carried out. Menu - Customer Support - Self Diagnosis - Digital Signal Intensity Products since 2015 [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Digital Signal Intensity] will be carried out. question: I can't see the screen.
answer:
Expected cause
 1.It can be caused by more than a broadcast signal. (When watching ATV, DTV, external input)
 2. It may occur due to panel (liquid crystal) abnormality. Method of action Check liquid crystal / panel abnormality If volume and menu phrases are not displayed on the TV screen during volume and menu button operation, they may occur due to abnormalities in TV internal parts (panels, mainboards, etc.) or connection connectors or malfunction symptoms. In this case, disconnect the power cord on the back of the TV and reconnect it about a minute later to initialize the power before using it. If it is the same after reconnecting the power cord It is difficult to take action over the phone, so we need to visit the engineer for inspection. Automatic channel setting confirmation method The channel number is displayed, but if the screen does not appear, it may occur if the channel entered on the TV is erased. In this case, the channel entered on the TV must be re-entered through automatic channel setting. (Remocon Home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings) Reconnect power to set-top box The volume / menu is displayed on the TV screen, but if the screen does not appear, it may be caused by a set-top box malfunction. In this case, it is necessary to check after initializing the power of the set-top box by reconnecting it about 1 minute after removing the power cord of the set-top box. When initializing the power of the set-top box, the BOOT phrase is displayed on the liquid crystal for about 1 to 3 minutes Booting is complete. It is necessary to check if the normal screen appears after rebooting the power of the set-top box, and if the screen does not appear in the same way, you should check the set-top box. Set-top box inspection Even after disconnecting and reconnecting the power cord of the set-top box, the same menu phrase can be seen, but if the screen does not appear, it can be caused by more than the set-top box. In this case, please contact the broadcaster you are watching and check the set-top box [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.].

question: USB video can't be played normally.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur because the TV and the video codec are not compatible. Method of action Check video codec information - In order to play a video on TV, you can play it on TV only when the information of the video file such as extension, codec, etc. is correct. - It occurs because the codec information of the video file is not used on the TV, not because only a specific file is not an abnormality of the TV that cannot play the video, In this case, it is a symptom that the information of the file and the TV are not compatible with each other, not the abnormality of the product. - To check the codec information of the video file, install the video encoding program on your PC and check the information of the video file through the encoding program. - File information of video files, information of video files supported by TV, If the specifications are different, it cannot be played on the TV. Check video codec information [Note] Video support specs that can be supported on TV - For detailed specifications, please refer to the manual for each product. - For more than 2018, Samsung TV does not support DivX and DTS codecs. 2017 QTV standard 2018 NU7100 or higher model and UHD QTV standard Check USB memory format - If the file system of the memory device is damaged, normal playback may not be possible. - Back up the files stored on the memory device to your computer, format the memory device, and use them. Check playback after encoding - In order to play a specific file that cannot be played on the TV, it must be encoded on the PC. - In the case of encoding, you can set the extension, codec, etc. you want, and we cannot provide the program because there is no encoding program operated by Samsung Electronics. - For reference, DaumPod encoders with proven stability and performance are used the most among free encoding programs in Korea, and you can use blogs to get information on how to encode and use them after encoding. [Note ] Video specifications that can be played on TV during encoding (used for encoding environment setting)
 1.Extension: AVI
 2. Video codec: Select from H.264
 3. Voice codec: MP3
 4. Bitrate: Same as the original file (the higher the bitrate, the larger the capacity)
 5. Resolution: Same as the original file The latest version of firmware upgrade guide In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and the upgrade method is as follows. If you upgrade to USB Access to Samsung Electronics homepage (http://www.samsung.com/sec/) → Customer support → Model search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file → Save it in USB memory after decompression → Connect USB TV and upgrade it. Upgrade while connected to the network You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. [Installation Method] ▶ Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update Now Menu - Move Customer Support Select [Software Update] Select [Update now] After checking the update, proceed with the update

question: In the case of apartments, is there a way to receive digital broadcasts directly?
answer:
Direct reception guide for apartment digital broadcasting
 1.In the case of apartments, most of the existing public disclosure facilities need to be renovated. Residents' opinions are gathered through requests for improvement from tenant representatives' associations or management offices. The apartment representative meeting will identify those who wish to receive terrestrial digital TV at the management office. If more than two-thirds of the residents agree, it will be possible to build facilities for the public disclosure office. .
 2. If you want to receive terrestrial broadcasting directly through an antenna, you should first check if the surrounding area can receive digital terrestrial broadcasting. You can check the DTV reception environment by accessing the site below. DTV Korea Homepage: http://dtvkorea.org Search for receiving environment inquiry service after accessing METHOD FOR RECEIVING DIGITAL BROADCASTS BY ACCESSING http://dtv.go.kr/ KBS homepage: http://dtvguide.kbs.co.kr Access top menu "DTV service" Currently, about 85 percent of terrestrial digital TV broadcasts are available across the country. Until 2012, when analog broadcasting ends, the proportion of available areas is expected to increase step by step in accordance with the government's frequency deployment plan. Even within a receivable area, some reception may be difficult depending on the surrounding building or terrain

question: How to mark the reception sensitivity of digital broadcasting...
answer: Reception sensitivity indication guide Digital broadcast reception sensitivity indication Digital broadcasting can be watched in HD-class high-definition, but if the sensitivity of broadcasting reception is weak, symptoms such as screen breakage (mosaic phenomenon), screen blink, and screen disappear occur. For LED/PDP products released after 2009, you can check the current broadcast reception status by adding self-diagnosis function. What's a self-diagnosis function? It is a function that allows the product to self-test image quality, sound quality, and broadcast signals, and is used to distinguish products or signals, and has been applied to products since 2009. For example, In the case of areas where reception is not possible while using a mobile phone, the function to check antenna reception sensitivity is added to TV products, just as the mobile phone antenna sensitivity is checked first. How to enter self-diagnosis and classification of application;   Cases of application according to items of self-diagnosis;        Self-diagnosis item  Application case      Image quality test  Noise, line appearance, screen blur, screen darkness, screen distortion    Sound quality test  Voice interruptions, voice distortions, noises, buzzing noises, tearing noises.    Digital signal strength  Screen broken, screen flickering, no input signal

Touch sensor + acceleration sensor + 3D signal  In other words, the TV sends a 3D signal, holds 3D glasses (touch sensor), lifts glasses, and wears them on the ear (acceleration sensor)   ■ Automatic power off operation condition   When releasing 3D mode on TV (about 3 seconds)  If there is no movement for 5 minutes

question: What is MHL?
answer:
MHL function guide           What is MHL?  It is a function that connects the micro USB terminal of the mobile device and the HDMI terminal of the TV to show the screen of the mobile device as it is on the screen of the TV. In addition, mobile phones can be charged through TV, and mobile phones can be controlled through TV remote control.    How can I see MHL?  You must have a mobile device and TV that supports MHL, and you can watch it by connecting an MHL-only cable or an MHL dongle (HDTV adapter).    Does Samsung TV support all ports?  When using MHL-only cable, MHL is supported only for HDMI
 3.    What kind of TV model can be supported?  It is a model of LED 7 series or higher and PDP 8 series in 11 years.    What kind of mobile device model can be supported?  Compatibility verification has been completed for the Galaxy S2 model, and for other MHL-supported mobile devices, please contact the device manufacturer.    I am the buyer of the existing 11-year TV 7000. How can I do MHL?  If you download the latest SW from the Samsung website and upgrade it, you can use MHL.    How do I connect to MHL?    1) When using MHL-only cable: See Figure 1 on the right - One side of the MHL cable is connected to the micro USB terminal of the mobile device, and the other side is connected to the HDMI3 of the TV.  2) When using MHL dongle (HDTV adapter): See Figure 2 on the right - After connecting the power of the MHL dongle, one side of the MHL dongle connects to the micro USB terminal of the mobile device and the HDMI terminal of the TV with the HDMI cable.     The screen does not appear when connecting the MHL-only cable.  Our TV supports MHL only for HDMI
 3. Please check the input source. Also, please check if your phone supports MHL.    Where can I get an MHL cable or an MHL dongle (HDTV adapter)?  You can search online with an HDTV adapter or purchase it at Samsung Service Center.    Remote control does not work when using MHL dongle.  When using MHL dongle, operation by remote control is not required. Please contact the manufacturer or use the MHL cable.    KEY supported by TV is not running on mobile device.  The actual execution of the key supported by the TV depends on the mobile device. Please contact the manufacturer of the device.    The application of the mobile device does not work with the TV remote control.  The TV provides only movement and selection functions for application execution of the mobile device. Please contact the application manager or mobile device manufacturer to see if the actual application is executed.    Can I see it as a TV USB input through a micro USB cable?  You can't see it with the USB input of the TV, and please use the MHL cable or MHL dongle (HDTV adapter).    I can't charge it while using it.  Depending on the current consumption of the mobile device, charging may take a long time during use.    Can I charge it in TV stand by state?  Provides MHL charging function in standby state.    What is the resolution you support?  MHL can be supported up to 1920X1080 at 30Hz.    Can't I turn on the TV with my cell phone like Anynet+?  MHL does not support turning on TV with mobile device.    Compared with the cell phone, the picture quality is lower.  If the resolution of the one source is low, the TV screen may look worse than a mobile phone because of its large size. Or, if the image resolution sent from the mobile phone is low, the image quality may look bad. If you send it to 1080, the TV will show it as the cell phone sends it, so please contact the cell phone manufacturer for more information.

question: What is the USB PVR function?
answer:
Broadcasting recording function guide  
 1.Is it possible to record ATV (analog) and external input signal? → Not possible. It can only be recorded on DTV, and when you press the "record" button on ATV, "Timeshift and recording are only supported on digital broadcasting. The phrase " appears and it doesn't work. 
 2. I want to record on DTV, but can I record if I can't receive the broadcast normally or can't see it? → "Input signal is weak or not available so recording is not possible. The notice " may appear and not work. 
 3. Can I switch to another channel (DTV / ATV) while recording? → Not possible. If you switch to another channel during recording (or reservation recording), "Would you like to end recording and switch channels? [Yes] [No]." Since it is not a 2TUNER method, it is impossible to watch other channels during recording. 
 4. Can I record even if I turn off the TV during recording (or reservation recording)? → It is possible. Even if the TV is turned off, recording is stopped, or if the recording completion time is not over, recording continues. However, recording is stopped if the power is cut off, not power OFF (power waiting). 
 5. Doesn't the phrase "recording" disappear in the upper left corner during recording? → Yes, the phrase keeps popping up to let you know that it is recording. It also moves little by little to protect the screen. In addition, recording for less than 10 seconds is not carried out during general recording, so "records for less than 10 seconds are not stored. The phrase " appears and the recording cannot be saved.

When installing the stand, use only the components and parts provided.   caution   When assembling, separate the front and back sides of each component.  At least two people carry the TV together. question: There is a tearing noise.
answer: Expected cause It can be caused by the operating characteristics of the circuit applied in the product. Method of action If noise is not heard when the volume is adjusted to "0", noise generated from the speaker may cause broadcasting signal problems, TV abnormalities, and abnormality of the product can be checked through the sound quality test function. [Setting Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test Remote Control - Menu Customer support Self-diagnosis Sound quality test [2017 Product Setting Method] Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] If symptoms cannot be reproduced, select 'No' Select 'Close' when sound quality test is completed During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the sample sound played is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise due to broadcasting signal problems, not product problems. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Noise standard Due to various circuits and large currents applied to the TV, noise may be generated as electrical components operate according to changes in screen brightness. The normal specification managed by the product is managed below 30 dB (decibel) and is similar to the noise of fans (breezes) and humidifiers. Please use it safely within the normal specification range managed by the product to the extent that it is quieter or similar to the noise generated by the humidifier. For more information, please refer to the manual.

question: When you change the channel of the set-top box, there is a "tiriric" noise.
answer:
Noise-cause cause Connection is connected by Skylife set-top box and HDMI cable When changing the digital / analog channel of the Skylife set-top box, the audio output is changed to Dolby ↔ PCM. Noise is generated due to insufficient mute processing due to transient signal output due to audio format change. How to check and take action There is no noise when changing the Dolby setting value to "release" in the AV setting item in the Skylife set-top box.
 1.Press the menu button on the set-top box remote control.
 2. Press the right direction key to select the "User Menu".
 3. Select AV settings.
 4. You can set Audio_Dolby to "release".

question: The "Start internal inspection" phrase appears on the screen.
answer: Cause of internal inspection start phrase occurrence If you press the return key of the remote control for more than 3 seconds, the TV's own defect review program will run and the phrase "Start internal inspection" will appear. How to check and take action  The "Start internal inspection" phrase screen is a function that examines whether a defect occurs on the TV itself and is not defective. You can exit by pressing the “Select Cancel” or exit button in OSD. "Start internal inspection" phrase screen → Press the return key for more than 3 seconds to see the internal inspection phrase. → Press the "Select Cancel" or remote control "End" button to cancel.

question: I can't read the folder stored in multimedia HDD or play it...
answer: The reason why multimedia cannot be played Occurrence phenomenon When playing HDD stored contents with TV products as 2011 products, "folder cannot be read "or "there are too many video files. Invisible files may exist "After the phrase occurs Demonstration is not possible. Cause of occurrence  The 2011 product temporarily stores folder and file information in the internal storage space of the TV product by DBizing the HDD stored file, and symptoms occur when the storage space is exceeded. Internal storage space for each series → LED D6 series or higher: about 8,000, LED D4/5 series (excluding 55.88 cm): about 4,000 Before 2010, products are not DBized in information, but only up to 1,000 are shown, and the rest are ignored. Method of action Reduce the files stored in the HDD, split the HDD, and separate and store the storage. Compared to the 2010 product, the 2011 product shows a lot of capacity, so it takes a lot of loading time compared to the 2010 product.

question: Please let me know how to watch Soccer function / broadcast. (2015 Sports mode name change)
answer:
Soccer mode description Soccer mode usage environment
 1.It can only be used in digital broadcasting through RF. (Excluding wired and cable)
 2. A separate recording device (HDD) is required to use the highlight function.
 3. Highlights only work in soccer games. (It cannot be operated in other programs)
 4. The highlight video is based on the commentator's voice, shout, and background color (green). Soccer mode operation function
 1.Control bar: Shows control functions to the recording function.
 2. Zoom in: Zoom in on the selection screen from the 9 split screen to the full screen.
 3. Automatic Highlights: Start recording automatically when connecting external hard drives. (No menu button)
 4. Manual Highlights: You can select and view highlights recorded during recording.
 5. Highlight Player: Shows the recorded highlight video. Soccer mode execution method
 1.You can enjoy Soccer Mode by running it with the remote control.
 2. If you press the zoom button, it will appear in 9 divisions, and if you press the zoom button again, you can zoom in to the entire screen of the selection part.
 3. You can record the video on the air right away, and you can watch this broadcast/highlight at the same time.
 4. Re-viewing highlight scenes is only available in the recording file. 
 ① Running Soccer Mode 
 ② Start Soccer Mode 
 ③ Enlarge button → Press enlarge button again 
 ④ Record the video on the air immediately 
 ⑤ View the highlight scene again 
 ⑥ Soccer mode out. 2015 Sports Mode Execution Method (Soccer Mode → Changed to Sports Mode) Menu/123 → Menu → System → Sports Mode → On of Remote Control  2015 model changed to sports mode Shortcut keys are not applied to remote control

question: I want to know how to pair the remote control of the smart TV in 2021.
answer: Smart remote control pairing method guide Check Smart Remote Control Support Model ■ 2021 Smart Remote Control Support Model - QLED rechargeable: QA60 or higher - UHD non-chargeable: UA8000 or higher (UA7000 product IR support) Smart remote control support model Model name Q900A, Q800A, Q700A, QA90, QA80, QA70, QA60, LSA03A(Frame) UA9000 UA8000 UA7000 Remote control Guide for pairing with TV ■ Smart remote control pairing method Head the Samsung Smart Remote Control straight to the TV and press the Return button and the Play/Pause button for more than 3 seconds at the same time. ☞ Images, buttons, and functions of Samsung Smart Remote Control may vary depending on the model. ☞ If the remote control is directed to the remote control receiver of the TV, the remote control works more effectively. ■ Initialize remote control (QA60 model ↑) if it is not resolved even after eco remote control pairing attempt Press the Return button and Select button at the same time for at least 10 seconds. ■ Initialize smart remote control if it is not resolved even after other smart remote control pairing attempts Press the return button and the multi-key or additional information button for at least 5 seconds at the same time. Guidance on initialization method due to malfunction If you return the setting to malfunction or shipment conditions, you can restore it to factory shipment conditions through initialization applied to the product. ■ Setting method Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → General → Initialize → Password 0000 → Reboot and complete initialization Initialization setting method Press the remote control home button Press Settings on the Screen General press Initialization press Password [0000] Input Initialization press All settings are initialized, the TV is automatically turned off and on, and the Initial Settings screen appears. When you turn on the TV, it automatically connects to Samsung Smart Control. If it is not automatically connected, head Samsung Smart Control to the remote control receiver of the TV and press the return button and the play/pause button for more than 3 seconds at the same time.

Guidance on initialization method due to malfunction If you return the setting to malfunction or shipment conditions, you can restore it to factory shipment conditions through initialization applied to the product. ■ Setting method Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → General → Initialize → Password 0000 → Reboot and complete initialization Initialization setting method Press the remote control home button Press Settings on the Screen General press Initialization press Password [0000] Input Initialization press All settings are initialized, the TV is automatically turned off and on, and the Initial Settings screen appears. When you turn on the TV, it automatically connects to Samsung Smart Control. If it is not automatically connected, head Samsung Smart Control to the remote control receiver of the TV and press the return button and the play/pause button for more than 3 seconds at the same time.

question: I want to know how to switch to TV or external input.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶). You can change the external input of the TV such as TV, set-top box, game console, etc. ■ External input switching method (how to switch from TV broadcast screen to set top (HDMI1))

answer:

question: Please tell me how to use Digital Butler.
answer:
Function guide Source device The source device is a device that can be connected to an external port.  
 1.To use a source device, such as a game console connected by an external port, select Digital Hub from the TV menu. 
 2. You can select and use the device you want from the digital hub.    IR remote control device IR remote control device means home appliance using remote control.  
 1.You can check the notification popup on the TV by using the remote control of the IR remote control device near the TV. 
 2. Click ‘Register’ to display a control pop-up to test the IR remote control device. If you click Yes after the test, the notification popup will be displayed again. 
 3. Click ‘Go to Digital Hub’ to run the digital hub.   
 ※ Note. Possible devices and functions are as follows.   Description of possible devices and functions    Support device  Support function    Air-conditioner Power On / Power Off / Temperature Up / Temperature Down / Wind Up / Wind Down   Air purifier Power Toggle / Wind Up / Wind Down   Fan Power Toggle / Wind Up / Wind Down   Robot cleaner Power Toggle/Start/Stop   Humidifier Power Toggle / Wind Up / Wind Down    Mobile device The method of connecting a digital hub to a mobile has to do with registering a TV in MobileSmartThings.  
 1.If there is a mobile near the TV, a notification pop-up that guides the connection to the TV is displayed. 
 2. Click 'Register' to display the Mobile SmartThings TV Registration Guide. 
 3. When you lift the mobile and run SmartThings, the TV is detected, and when you press 'Start', the mobile-TV linkage proceeds. 
 4. When interworking is completed, a notification pop-up is displayed again on the TV, and mobile can be used in the digital hub. 
 5. In the digital hub, you can use the Sound Mirroring function through mobile.    Some mobile devices may have different registration methods. Bluetooth device A Bluetooth device is available in a digital hub, as is the use of Bluetooth on a mobile. The Bluetooth device does not provide an alarm on the TV.  
 1.You can find the Bluetooth device you want to connect to in the ‘Registerable Device’ of the Digital Hub. 
 2. Click the Bluetooth device you want to connect to and click the Connect menu. 
 3. You can use the Connect/Disconnect menu.    The Digital Hub displays the ‘Registered Devices’ and ‘Registerable Devices’ menus. The 'registered device' is a device that can be controlled by a TV remote control and is 'registered' Go A good device' means a device that can be connected. SmartThings device SmartThings devices are Samsung's hub for controlling smart home devices and can be downloaded from both Android and iOS devices.  
 1.If the TV and mobile use the same SmartThings account, the SmartThings device connected to the mobile can be used in the digital hub. 
 2. Click the Bluetooth device you want to connect to and click the Connect menu. 
 3. The Digital Hub provides the same features as SmartThings on TVs.

answer:

Jeongsang-myeon Abnormal screen Method of action Broadcasting program confirmation Overall, symptoms that appear dark on the screen may occur due to changes in settings or product abnormalities, but if symptoms that appear dark on the screen vary from channel to channel, they may occur depending on broadcast programs produced by broadcasting stations. Please refer to it when using it as a symptom caused by a broadcasting program, not a product problem. Screen mode changing method If you adjust the screen mode of the TV to the movie screen, the screen may look dark. Screen mode is a function that allows users to adjust the brightness of the screen to the conditions they want, and you can select and watch clear screens, standard screens, optimization screens, and movie screens. Please change the screen mode setting to the standard screen and use it. ■ How to enter screen mode [Menu → Screen → Screen Mode] In the United States. Image quality test method Symptoms that the screen looks dark may occur due to changes in settings or product abnormalities. You can check the abnormality/nothingness of the product through the image quality test function. ■ How to enter image quality test [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] In the United States. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality ■ How to enter 2017 model image quality test [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] In the United States. [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed] During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen. If the image is not dark and can be seen clearly, , you can set it to dark because the power saving function is set. If the high-definition image displayed also looks dark, it can cause circuit abnormalities and you need to check it out. 
 ① Clearly visible during image quality test: Check the power saving function setting and change it to off. 
 ② It looks dark during image quality test: A / S check is required. Power saving function setting method If the power saving function is set, the screen may look dark. Please change the power saving function to off and use it. ■ How to turn off the power saving function [Menu → System → Eco Power Saving Settings → Power Saving → Off] In the United States. Menu - System Echo Power Saving Settings - Power Saving Mode - Select Off How to adjust brightness to backlight value By adjusting the backlight brightness, the closer the screen brightness is to 20, the brighter it becomes. The year-by-year display of adjusted values may be incorrect. ■ Setting method [Menu → Screen → Backlight Adjustment] In the United States. Menu - Screen Backlight adjustment How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster for a set-top box or broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. The upgrade method is as follows.

 ③ When the network is connected You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current TV version. Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update Now Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support Select [Software Update] Select [Update now] After checking the update, proceed with the update If it has not been resolved, I recommend you to check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.
