question: There's static electricity, there's electrical flow.
answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by the unconnected ground outlet in the house and the antenna not being connected. Method of action Since home appliances operate using an AC power source of 220 V, electrical symptoms may occur due to electrical characteristics. ■ Static electricity In the case of static electricity, drying in the home can occur mainly. Please feel free to use this as it is related to the environment at home, not abnormal. ■ Electric flow generation Symptoms of electricity flow can be caused by not grounding all home appliances, including refrigerators and washing machines, and can be grounded to take action against symptoms of electricity flow. ■ How to take action ☞ Try connecting to the ground terminal of the power outlet It is recommended to connect the TV directly to the wall power outlet, not the multi-tap. ■ If there is no ground power outlet
 1.Ground by connecting the wall antenna terminal and the TV rear antenna connection terminal When using IPTV, the TV and the wall antenna may not be connected, causing symptoms.
 2. Ground by connecting the GND WIRE to the Bessa hole used for connecting the wall mount on the back of the TV  Even if the above measures are taken, if the electricity flow is severe, an engineer's visit inspection is required.

question: There are foreign substances and fingerprints on the TV screen in 2020.
answer:
Video caption   
 ※ Depending on the type of foreign matter on the TV, it may be mistaken for damage to the TV liquid crystal or look like a stain.  ■ Exterior stain checking method 
 1.If a stain on the surface of the TV liquid crystal does not occur when the TV power is turned off, it may occur due to foreign substances inside the liquid crystal or abnormal broadcasting signals. 
 2. In this case, you should check for abnormalities in the product through the self-diagnosis function built into the TV. 
 3. If you see the same stain on the self-diagnosis screen, you need to check the product due to symptoms caused by foreign substances inside the liquid crystal. 
 4. If no stains are visible on the self-diagnosis screen, they may be symptoms of screen stains caused by abnormal broadcast signals. Please check the broadcast signal through the broadcasting company you are watching. 
 5. If foreign matter is seen on the exterior of the liquid crystal when the TV power is turned off, it is contaminated by foreign matter on the exterior of the liquid crystal to clean the exterior stain You can proceed.  ■ Exterior stain cleaning method 
 1.Soak the microfiber cloth in water, wipe it gently, and dry it with a dry cloth. 
 2. If the stain is not erased due to severe contamination, use disinfection ethanol sold on the market to quickly wipe the area and gently wipe the remaining oil and water with a microfiber cloth.   To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).  
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video.   How to take action if there are foreign substances or fingerprints on the TV liquid crystal  
 1.If a stain on the surface of the TV liquid crystal does not occur when the TV power is turned off, it may occur due to foreign substances inside the liquid crystal or abnormal broadcasting signals. In this case, the self-diagnosis function built into the TV should be used to check for abnormalities in the product. 
 2. If you see foreign substances on the exterior of the liquid crystal when the TV power is turned off, you can clean the exterior stains due to contamination caused by foreign substances on the exterior of the liquid crystal. 
 3. If the stain is not erased due to severe contamination, wipe the area quickly using disinfection ethanol sold on the market, and then gently wipe the remaining oil and water with a microfiber cloth. 
 4. Please always install the latest version of the TV. (Home → Settings → Customer Support → Software Update → Update Now → Update when latest version is found)

question: When connecting the external hard drive of UN55ES8000 model, it is marked as 'unknown device'
answer: Question content I bought Samsung external SSD MU-PS250B and connected it to Samsung smart TV UN55ES8000 model What should I do if it comes out as an 'unknown device' and can't be recognized? Answers This is a problem that occurs because the TV product in use does not support the eXFAT file system, and the external hard product must be connected to the PC and the file system must be formatted and used in the 'NTFS' method. For reference, the 2012 model of the eXFAT file system is not a support specification and can only be recognized in models that can use external hard drives among models released after 2013.

question: Remote control battery consumption is fast.
answer: Expected cause Remote control lighting may be activated or may occur due to remote control abnormalities. Method of action General remote control The light button is applied to the upper right corner of the TV remote control to compensate for the difficulty of operating because the remote control button is not visible in the evening. (Apply only to general remote control) When you press the light button, all buttons on the remote control light up during remote control operation, providing more convenience when operating the remote control in the evening, but as the light comes on, the remote control battery replacement cycle is shortened because the remote control battery consumption increases, and the remote control battery must be replaced within 3 months. If the remote control is used a lot, the battery may be replaced within one month of battery replacement. ■ How to release remote control lights If you want to use the remote control battery for a long time, press the upper right light button of the remote control repeatedly to turn off the light so that it does not enter the light on the remote control button, and use it for about a year like the TV remote control you used before. Lights off. Lights on. In addition, if you press the power button on the remote control and observe the front part of the remote control through the camera of the Smarton phone, you can check if the signal is being transmitted. Smart remote control ■ If you can not operate the TV with the remote control The connection between the Samsung smart remote control and the TV may be disconnected. Heading Samsung Smart Remote Control to the Front of TV Buttons. Press the button at the same time for at least 3 seconds. If the battery life is short, the remote control may not work or slow down. In this case, please replace it with a new battery. It is recommended to use alkaline batteries to extend life. Make sure the remote control receiver on the TV is blinking. ■ Remote control battery is consumed quickly Battery can be consumed quickly depending on the frequency of use of remote controls that support long-distance voice recognition among Samsung smart remote controls and whether voice call functions are set, so turning off the voice call function can further increase the battery life of the remote control. Short > Find out Now > Settings > Voice Call The voice call function may not be supported depending on the model.

question: My voice is shaking.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality or a speaker output abnormality. Method of action Sound quality test confirmation There may be differences in menu items and settings depending on the TV model. Please refer to the product manual. Symptoms of voice ringing or shaking can occur beyond broadcast signals or TVs, and the sound quality test function can check for abnormalities in the product. [Test Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Customer support → Move self-diagnosis Select [Start sound quality test] Confirm 20-year TV product sound quality test
 1.Press the home button of the remote control
 2. Set Please choose.
 3. Customer support → Device care Please choose.
 4. At the bottom of device care Self-diagnosis Please choose.
 5. Sound quality test Please proceed with. During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the sample sound played is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Check the volume control method If the sound sounds strange while watching the broadcast through the set-top box, it may occur due to the difference in how to adjust the volume of the TV and the set-top box, and it can be easily adjusted. If the volume of the TV is set low (10 or less) or high, the voice level may be lowered and noise may be generated due to external influences. First, set the volume of the TV to 40 to 50, and then adjust the volume to the most suitable volume for listening with the STB remote control. [Note] 
 ① When adjusting the STB volume, the volume is adjusted from 0 to 30 at the top / bottom of the TV screen. 
 ② When adjusting the TV volume, the volume control is displayed from 0 to 100 on the left / right side of the TV screen. Equalizer adjustment method Among the voice signals, low-band sound is emphasized, which may cause symptoms such as voice tremors / noise. Please adjust the sound level of the low band [100Hz, 200Hz] to low on the TV.

question: The remote control doesn't work.
answer: Expected cause It may be caused by a lack of remaining battery capacity of the remote control or a lack of pairing connection. Method of action Remote control battery reinsertion It may be caused by remote control malfunction. OPEN the rear battery cover to remove the battery and insert it again after 1 minute. Check remote control pairing It can be used only when the remote control battery is reinserted or paired when the battery is replaced. [Fairing Method] TV power ON → Press the rear pairing button of the smart remote control for 1 second → Pairing complete [2013 Product Pairing Method] Open the back cover of the remote control and press the "pair" button toward the TV for more than 5 seconds 2013 Product Pairing Method Create while connecting the lower left corner of the TV Create pairing completion at the bottom left of the TV [2014 Product Pairing Method] Press the "Return + Broadcast Guide" button simultaneously toward the TV for more than 5 seconds 2014 Product Pairing Method Create while connecting the lower left corner of the TV Create pairing completion at the bottom left of the TV [2015 Product Pairing Method] Press the "Return / End + Additional Information" button simultaneously toward the TV for more than 5 seconds 2015 Product Pairing Method Create Bluetooth in the lower left corner of the TV Create pairing completion at the bottom left of the TV [2016 Product Pairing Method] 5 seconds to the TV side at the same time with the "Return + Play / Pause" button 2016 product pairing method Create during center connection at the top of TV Create the completion of central pairing at the top of the TV [2017 Product Pairing Method] Press the "Return + Play / Pause" button simultaneously toward the TV for more than 5 seconds 2017 product pairing method Create during center connection at the top of TV Create the completion of central pairing at the top of the TV Check battery replacement If there is little indication of the remaining battery capacity at the bottom left of the TV during pairing, the battery in use must be replaced with a new battery. When replacing the battery, please replace it with an alkaline battery and use it. When using some manganese batteries, it is not recommended to use them because there may be symptoms of intermittent remote control failure due to insufficient battery voltage. Pairing settings must be reset after battery replacement. Initialization method How to initialize TV by 2012 Year description ~ 2009 Initialization function is not applied → Remove power cord for about 1 minute and reconnect 2010 ~ 2011 Press the [End] button in the middle of the remote control for 10 seconds. "First time to set all settings in the center of the TV screen And bring it back to its state. "Message displayed It will be initialized by selecting [OK] 2012 ~ 2014 Menu → Customer Support Self-diagnosis reset Initial password 0000 Initialization check Initialization complete. [2015 TV model initialization setting method] Press menu/123 on remote control → menu → customer support → self-diagnosis → initialization However, if it is not a smart remote control, just press the menu button. question: Please let me know about HDMI UHD Color chroma sampling
answer: Function guide It is about HDMI UHD Color on / off setting. HDMI UHD Color Chroma Sampling It means RGB color space (color depth), and the brightness value Y and the color values Cb and Cr Sampling separately from each other is called chroma sampling. Among them, the color value is lower than the brightness value, such as 4:2:2, 4:2:0 It means sampling. question: The voice drops to zero while watching.
Please tell me about the compatibility of soundware.
answer:
Function guide The TV sound share function has been changed to Bluetooth connection function since 2016. Bluetooth connection method
 1.Press the right side of the sound bar or the remote control (external input) button to select 'BT' mode.
 2. If it is displayed as BT READY", press the (external input) button on the right side of the sound bar or remote control for more than 5 seconds to switch to 'BT PAIRING'. ☞ When connected to the TV, it is displayed as [TV name] → 'BT' in the front display window of the sound bar. External input → Select BT BT pairing → Press and hold for 5 seconds Pairing and Connecting Searching (trying to connect) Connection success (A) Connection success (B)  Check TV Sound Connect Mode Selection ■ Connection method

question: What is the one-connect connection?
answer: Function guide One-connect As the number of cases of installing TVs in a wall-mounted manner increased, the connection of external devices to the back of the TV also required supplementation due to inconvenience in installation. A device that can connect external devices separately is called One Connect. Existing method In the case of existing TVs, there was a terminal on the back of the TV that could connect external devices, so it was difficult to connect external devices when installed with wall hangers. One-connect After connecting the TV and the one-connect, the external device is connected to the one-connect, which has the advantage of being convenient for connecting the external device.

question: Please let me know about HDR, HDR10, HDR+, HDR Dolby Vision
answer:
Function guide HDR, HDR10, HDR+, HDR Dolby Vision Terminology HDR (High Dynamic Range) It is a technology that expands the range of brightness as close as possible to what humans see from the brightest to the darkest. HDR application can be seen in detail from very bright scenes to very dark scenes. For example, in dark cave scenes, HDR-applied TVs deliver not only the texture of cave walls but also their shapes and colors realistically. Every single sunshine is clearly shown in the scene where the yacht passes over the sea where the sun is shining. ☞ SDR (Standard Dynamic Range) - Standard degree of brightness difference (DR) between bright and dark parts (FHD application) ☞ HDR(High Dynamic Range) - The degree to which the brightness difference (DR) between the bright and dark parts is expanded to be close to what a person actually sees (UHD application) HDR type ■ HDR+ It automatically provides optimal HDR effect for SDR or HDR images. It is a technology that analyzes the contrast of images in detail and shows images similar to those viewed by human eyes. ■ HDR10 The HDR function of a product that satisfies the maximum brightness of 1,000nit, one of the specs related to brightness established by the UHD Alliance, is specifically called HDR10. ■ HDR10+ If the brightness spec established by the UHA is satisfied, the image itself must be created with HDR10+ as a standard that can obtain premium UHD certification. It is an abbreviation of UHD Alliance and is a coalition formed by TV manufacturing technology companies, Hollywood studios, content distributors, and video technology companies. ▶ The difference between HDR10 and HDR10+ is in metadata. Metadata is data such as color and brightness information contained in content such as videos, games, and TV apps. HDR10 uses static metadata that applies the same color and brightness even if the scene changes. The quality of the image is bound to decrease in very dark or bright scenes, while HDR10+ is applied with dynamic metadata that automatically sets metadata for each scene, providing all scenes with optimized image quality. 
 ※ Metadata refers to additional image information in the content. This includes color, brightness information used in the HDR image mastering process. ■ Dolby Vision This is the name of the image technology provided by Dolby. Dolby Vision embodies brightness, extended contrast ratio, vivid color, detail, and three-dimensionality through technologies similar to HDR that can express a wide color space.

question: There's a noise in my voice.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality or a speaker output abnormality. Method of action Sound quality test confirmation Symptoms of voice ringing or shaking can occur beyond broadcast signals or TVs, and the sound quality test function can check for abnormalities in the product. [Test Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Customer support → Move self-diagnosis Select [Start sound quality test] During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the sample sound played is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Check the volume control method If the sound sounds strange while watching the broadcast through the set-top box, it may occur due to the difference in how to adjust the volume of the TV and the set-top box, and it can be easily adjusted. If the volume of the TV is set low (10 or less) or high, the voice level may be lowered and noise may be generated due to external influences. TV volume control Set-top box volume control First, set the volume of the TV to 40 to 50, and then adjust the volume to the most suitable volume for listening with the STB remote control. [Note] 
 ① When adjusting the STB volume, the volume is adjusted from 0 to 30 at the top / bottom of the TV screen. 
 ② When adjusting the TV volume, the volume control is displayed from 0 to 100 on the left / right side of the TV screen. Equalizer adjustment method Among the voice signals, low-band sound is emphasized, which may cause symptoms such as voice tremors / noise. Please adjust the sound level of the low band [100Hz, 200Hz] to low on the TV. [Settings Method] TV remote control home → setting → sound → expert setting → equalizer
 1.Remote control home button → Settings
 2. Acoustic selection
 3. Expert setting selection
 4. Equalizer selection
 5. Equalizer bass band adjustment
 6. Adjust 100Hz, 200Hz level low Upgrade latest version firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster for [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] set-top box or broadcast signal inspection. The upgrade method is as follows.
 1.If you upgrade to USB Access to Samsung Electronics homepage (http://www.samsung.com/sec/) → Customer support → Model search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file → Release compression and save it in USB memory → Connect USB TV to upgrade. 2 . Upgrade while connected to the network You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. [Installation Method] menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Select Update Now.
 1.Menu → Move customer support
 2. Select [Software Update]
 3. Select [Update now]
 4. After checking the update, proceed with the update

question: Your voice speed isn't right.
answer: Expected cause Since the processing speed of the video signal and the voice signal is different or the sound is heard through the home theater, a slight difference in the speed of the video/voice may occur. Method of action Explanation of the cause of the broadcast signal If symptoms that do not match the screen and voice speed occur, it may occur in some or all broadcast programs due to broadcast signals transmitted by broadcasting stations. Because the processing speed of the video signal and the voice signal is different, there is a slight difference in the speed of the video/voice, and although it is not usually felt, the speed difference may feel sensory depending on some broadcasting programs. It is not a symptom caused by a product abnormality, so please feel free to use it. Speaker delay time setting method When listening to TV voice through the home theater, the video is displayed directly on the TV screen, but since the voice signal is output from the TV through the home theater, some delay time occurs in the process of transmitting the voice from the TV to the home theater. Some of the functions of the TV can be set up by applying a function that can minimize the delay time. [Menu → Sound → SPDIF Settings → Delay Time Adjustment] If the voice is faster than the screen: Please set the delay time adjustment higher. [+] If the voice is slower than the screen: Please set the delay time adjustment lower. [-] Even if the delay time is adjusted, there is a time when voice is transmitted from the TV to the home theater, so symptoms that the screen / voice speed is not correct may occur. This is not a product problem, but a problem caused by the time the voice is transmitted from the TV to the home theater, so please refer to it when using it. Explain the cause of set-top box When watching a broadcast through a set-top box, the speed of video/voice may vary slightly depending on the speed of video/voice signal transmission from the set-top box to the TV. It doesn't usually feel big, but some broadcasting programs may feel the speed difference.

question: Do you use RGB color filter for Samsung TV?
answer: Function guide RGB color filter - Color filter is a thin layer that represents various colors in LCD. - When the light from the LCD backlight passes through the color filter through the liquid crystal, it passes through the red (R), green (G), and blue (B) parts of the color filter, and the color of the light changes. - It is the same principle that when the flashlight light is shined on the cellophane, the light changes to various colors depending on the color of the cellophane. If there is no color filter, LCD will be expressed only bright and dark like black and white TV. - Most displays use a combination of red (R), green (G), and blue (B), which are the three primary colors of light, for each pixel to express various colors. - In the color filter layer, sub-pixels of R, G, and B are generally placed for each pixel, and these three colors represent more than millions of colors. - Samsung TV products use all model RGB color filters based on LCD and LED products. - RGBW is a specification with more white (W) filters, and among the products released by Samsung, RGBW type color filters were applied only to KN55S9CAF products in the past.

question: The symptoms of blinking the screen and not appearing on the screen are repeated.
answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by poor sensitivity to receive broadcast signals. Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide If screen disconnection symptoms occur on a specific broadcast channel, it may occur due to weak reception of broadcast signals, not product abnormalities. Unlike analog TVs used in the past, digital TVs appear to be abnormal in products due to symptoms such as screen stop and screen breakage when broadcasting signals are weak, but It is not a problem with the actual product, but a symptom caused by weak reception of the broadcast signal, so please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] Signal strength checking method Symptoms of screen blinking while watching can occur due to broadcast signal problems, TV abnormalities, and abnormality of the product can be checked through the digital signal strength function. [Setting Method] Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self-diagnosis → Start signal information ■ Products after 2009   ■ Products after 2015   ■ Products after 2018 Customer Support - Self Diagnosis - Start Signal Information Check the signal information for the channel while watching. If the antenna signal is 4 or less, or the SNR value is 20 or less, the broadcast signal is weak. You'd better check the broadcast signal. Check set-top box It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. If you do not use an authenticated HDMI cable, you may experience screen blinking symptoms due to communication errors. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase, symptoms such as screen blinking may occur with an unauthorized cable. In this case, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable and use it. Check the "Ultral High Speed HDMI" print or imprint on the HDMI cable. A self-diagnosis function that checks for abnormalities in the HDMI cable connected to the TV is built into the TV to check for abnormalities in the TV or HDMI cable  That we've never seen before. (Apply to products after 2019)  [Setting Method] Home → Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Signal Information Start → HDMI Cable Test Signal information start → HDMI cable test HDMI cable test in progress HDMI cable normal HDMI cable error If the HDMI cable test result is normal, it is necessary to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if there is an abnormality in the test result You need to use it after replacing it with a genuine HDMI cable. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase Uncertified cables can cause symptoms such as screen blinking. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, it is necessary to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade Please contact the broadcaster and check the set-top box or broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. There are two ways to upgrade: USB or network.
 1.Upgrade to USB Access to Samsung Electronics homepage → Customer support → Model search → Download → Firmware → Download firmware file → Save to USB memory after decompression → Connect USB TV
 2. When the network is connected You can update it directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. [Installation Method] Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update Now Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu – Customer Support – Soft Upgrade Select [Update Now]

question: There's a dot on the screen. (NOISE, noise, mess, nausea)
answer:
Expected cause It can occur when watching analog (ATV) broadcasts or when broadcasting signals are unstable. Jeongsang-myeon Abnormal (cloud, hazy) Abnormal (screen glitter) Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide In the case of symptoms occurring on a specific channel, they may occur beyond a broadcast signal, not beyond a product. This may occur if the broadcast signal is weak when watching an analog wired broadcast channel. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Self-diagnosis method If the image quality looks bad, it may occur due to broadcasting signal problems, TV abnormalities, and abnormality of the product can be checked through the image quality test function. Image quality test entry method The remote control. Press (home button) → Set → Customer support → Self-diagnosis → Image quality test Selection Remote control cutout Button press Lower-left Set Displacement Customer support Selection Self-diagnosis Selection Image quality test started Selection Sample image stored on TV is displayed The remote control. Press (home button) → Set → Customer support → Device care →  Self-diagnosis → Image quality test Selection Self-diagnosis of device care Image quality test of self-diagnosis 
 ※ Depending on the TV model, the process of entering the image quality test may vary, so please refer to the manual. - When the image quality test is conducted, the image is displayed on the screen. If the image appears normally, it is not a product abnormality Please contact the broadcaster for set-top box abnormalities or broadcasting signal problems and check the broadcasting signal [cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] METHOD FOR CHANGING CONNECTION OF SET-TOOP BOX AND TV - In order to connect the set-top box and watch the broadcast in high definition, the connection terminal must be checked. - Analog noise may occur when connecting to an external input/component terminal, which may look messy like noise on the screen. - Please change it to HDMI that can communicate digitally. Set-top box resolution change method - If the resolution of the set-top box is set low, the screen may look blurry or messy. ■ How to check the resolution of the set-top box - Press the information display button on the TV remote control and check the resolution displayed at the top of the TV screen. - It is necessary to change the resolution displayed to the resolution supported by the TV. - UHD: 3840 × 2160, FHD: 1920 × 1080 need to be changed. ■ How to change the resolution of the set-top box - Depending on the set-top box model, there is a button or menu setting method to select resolution. In the case of button type, you can change it by pressing the set-top body resolution button, and in the case of changing it in the menu, you need to contact the broadcaster for consultation.  Even if you adjust the resolution, please check HDMI cable reconnection and set-top box reboot if the same symptoms occur. Turn off the main switch of the set-top box and turn it on. It takes about 1 to 3 minutes to reboot the set-top box. Check HDMI cable - It is recommended to use a genuine cable when connecting the TV and the set-top box with an HDMI cable. - If the certified HDMI cable is not used, communication errors may cause poor image quality while watching. The genuine HDMI cable is printed or imprinted on the cable with Ultral High Speed HDMI, and if there is no corresponding phrase, please replace it with a genuine HDMI cable with an uncertified cable. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, it is necessary to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade Please contact the broadcaster and check the set-top box or broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. There are two ways to upgrade: USB or network.
 1.Upgrade to USB - Samsung Electronics homepage access → customer support → model search → download → firmware → firmware file download → Save to USB memory after decompression → Connect USB TV
 2. When the network is connected - You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current version. [Installation Method] The remote control. Press (home button) → Set → Customer support → Software update → Update now Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Customer Support → Software Update Select [Update now]

question: The same channel is double-displayed.
answer: Expected cause It may occur due to duplicate reception of digital broadcasting physical channels. Method of action Duplicate channel deleting method Digital broadcasting is divided into physical channels transmitted from actual broadcasting stations and virtual channels actually watched in order to watch on the same channel anywhere in the country. When watching a broadcast through a separate broadcaster such as wired broadcasting / cable TV / Skylife, the channels do not overlap, but when watching a broadcast by installing a separate digital broadcasting antenna, the broadcast channels may be received in duplicate and two to three same channels may be caught. For example, if a digital antenna is installed and the metropolitan area receives duplicate broadcasts from Namsan Mountain and Gwanaksan Mountain, symptoms of receiving two MBC channels, 11-1 and 11-1, may occur. If the broadcast channel is duplicated through several relay stations, not the product, the duplicate channel can be deleted and used. Press the home button on the remote control → Channel list → Move the channel to delete → Delete Select the duplicate channel you want to delete by running , delete it in order, and use it. Press the home button of the remote control Move

question: Please let me know USB device supported format method (FAT/NTFS).

All USB terminals on the TV support the FAT file system by default. Among TV models, models that support USB external HDD support FAT and NTFS systems at the same time. If an external HDD is connected to a model without a USB HDD terminal, the file system is not supported and cannot be used. For some models since 2013, the file system supports exFAT format. question: Input signal is weak or missing.

question: The power doesn't come on.
answer:
Expected cause Wall outlet / TV rear power cord connection may be poor or product abnormality may occur. Method of action Check reconnection after disconnecting power outlet It is necessary to check the connection status of the wall power outlet. There may be cases where the wall power outlet is not connected or the power is not generated due to a wall outlet abnormality.
 1.Please disconnect the TV power cord from the wall outlet and reconnect it.
 2. Please connect other electronic products such as cell phone charger and hair dryer to the wall outlet to check if they work normally.
 3. When using the power outlet at all times, please select it in constant mode and use it. Power cord connection missing Power cord normal connection status Constant power outlet Constant power outlet button Check the reconnection after disconnecting the power cord on the back of the TV When adjusting the TV angle to the left/right for TV viewing or when lifting the TV for external device connection (HDMI, USB, PC) while wall-mounted The power cord contact on the back of the TV is loose and seemingly normal, but it may be caused by no power cord contact. In this case, disconnect the power cord on the back of the TV and reconnect the power cord. When reconnecting the power cord, you need to plug it in so that it can be contacted well. TV rear power cord Loose contact TV rear power cord Connection separation TV rear power cord Reconnection Check the power switch of the multi-tap In order to improve energy efficiency, it can usually occur when the multi-tap power switch is 'off'. Please change the power switch of the multi-tap to 'on' and use it. Multi-tap power switch “off” state Multi-tap power switch “on” state Multi-tap individual power “off” state Check the connection status of the multi-tap If the power of all products such as TV, set-top box, DVD, and mobile phone charger connected to the multi-tap is not turned on, it may occur more than the multi-tap, and in this case, please replace the multi-tap with a new one and use it. If it is not solved by the method I informed, there is a possibility that it may occur due to TV power circuit or mainboard symptoms.  Please get an accurate diagnosis from a professional engineer for that part.

question: Repeat the screen brightly and darkly.
answer:

(Motion lighting, echo power saving function, automatic contrast, backlight adjustment) Method of action Broadcasting program confirmation In the case of a symptom occurring in a specific channel, it may occur as a broadcast signal abnormality rather than a product abnormality. TVs can watch digital and analog broadcasts at the same time, which can occur if the broadcast signal is weak when watching analog wired broadcasting channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Check motion lighting settings Motion lighting, which automatically changes brightness depending on the contrast of the image, may be set and generated. The method of setting motion lighting is as follows. (Motion lighting is supported from 2011 D series or higher )     How to set: Menu → Screen → Advanced Settings → Motion Lighting → Turn off 2017 Model Setting Method: Menu - General - Eco Power Saving Settings - Motion Brightness Adjustment - Change to Off Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Motion brightness control selection Uncheck Motion Brightness Items Echo power saving setting confirmation method Among the TV functions, the screen brightness function adjusts the screen brightly when the surroundings are bright and dark when the surroundings are dark depending on the brightness of the surroundings. If the function is set, it is being watched. The screen may appear brightly and darkly repeatedly. Please change the screen brightness adjustment function to off and use it. How to change echo power saving settings [Menu → System → Eco Power Saving Settings → Eco Sensor → Off] Menu - System Echo Power Saving Settings - Echo Sensor - Select Off How to change the 2017 model eco power saving setting [Menu - General - Eco Power Saving Settings - Screen Brightness Adjustment - Change to Off] Screen brightness adjustment selection Uncheck screen brightness adjustment item Automatic contrast adjustment setting method Setting method [Menu → Screen → Advanced Settings → Automatic Brightness] proceed. Screen – Expert Settings – Automatic Brightness Adjustment Select Turn Off Automatic Light and Dark Adjustment  METHOD FOR ADJUSTING BRIGHTNESS WITH BACKLIGHT VALUE By adjusting the backlight brightness, the closer the screen brightness is to 20, the brighter it becomes. 
 ※ Adjustment value display by year may be wrong. Setting method [Menu → Screen → Backlight Adjustment] Proceed. Menu - Screen Backlight adjustment 2017 model setting method [Menu - Screen - Expert Settings - Backlight Adjustment] Screen – Expert Settings Choose Backlight Adjustment to Adjust How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] You should check the set-top box or broadcast signal.  ③ When the network is connected You can update directly to the network without a separate USB connection. However, it can be updated only when there is an update of the higher version than the current TV version. question: There's a shadow on the screen. (Ghost, afterimage, double screen)
answer: Expected cause It can occur when watching analog (ATV) broadcasts or when broadcasting signals are unstable. Jeongsang-myeon Abnormal (cloud, hazy) Abnormal (screen glitter) Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide Symptoms that appear to be shadowing on the screen on a specific channel can occur beyond a broadcast signal, not a product abnormality. TV can watch digital broadcasting and analog (wired) broadcasting at the same time, which can occur if the broadcast signal is weak when watching analog wired broadcasting channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Self-diagnosis signal information checking method Symptoms that overlap as if a shadow appears on the screen on a specific channel can occur when the broadcast signal is weak, In this case, you can check the abnormality of the product through the function of checking the sensitivity of the broadcast signal built into the TV. ■ Setting method Press the home button of the remote control → Settings → Menu → Customer Support → Self-diagnosis → Start signal information Customer Support - Self Diagnosis - Start Signal Information Check the signal information for the channel while watching. If there are less than 4 antenna signals or the SNR value is less than 20, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal in this case if the broadcast signal is weak. If the image comes out normally, please contact the broadcaster for more than a set-top box or a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. [Cable, Skylife, IPTV, etc.] You need to check the broadcast signal. question: QLED TVs Cut Off Terrestrial Broadcasting
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.If the TV broadcast screen is not in good condition or is cut off, it mainly occurs due to more than signals from antennas, boosters, and distributors in apartments and general homes.
 2. If you are watching TV with an antenna, please completely separate and reconnect the antenna connection line between the one connector and the wall terminal.
 3. Please check the status of antenna cable pin. If the antenna pin is bent or broken, please replace the cable.
 4. If you are using a distributor or booster, please separate it completely and reconnect it. Or try connecting directly to the TV.
 5. If there is an external problem through self-diagnosis, contact the apartment management office or cable cable company. The broadcast signal self-diagnosis method is as follows.
 6. When watching digital, you can check the broadcast signal along with the antenna picture by pressing the home or menu button of the remote control to set → customer support → self-diagnosis → signal information.
 7. When checking, if the antenna signal strength is 4 spaces or less or the SNR value is 20 spaces or less, it is recommended to check the broadcast signal. “Signal Information” is a feature only available on digital broadcast channels.
 8. If you select "signal history," you can check the history of automatically storing channels with weak signal strength.

question: QLED TV, sound bar TV, no voice. It's cut off.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.Symptoms of TV sound not coming out or disconnection on the sound bar are often caused by loose connection terminals or poor contact with outlets.
 2. If it is connected by HDMI, please completely separate and reconnect the power cord of the one-connect and sound bar.
 3. Separate the HDMI cable and connect it to the HDMI input (ARC) terminal of the one-connect and the HDMI OUT (TV-ARC) terminal of the sound bar.
 4. If connected by BT (wireless), please completely separate and reconnect the power cord of the TV and sound bar.
 5. Press the external input button on the side button of the sound bar to switch to BT mode, and press it for another 5 seconds to select the sound bar from the TV's speaker list in pairing state.
 6. The speaker list of the TV is connected by pressing the home or menu button of the remote control to select the sound bar model name from the setting → sound → sound output → speaker list. 
 ※ Naver Nanum Gothic font is applied to this video.

question: QLED TV, automatic channel, no specific channel.
answer:

 1.If you have moved to another area, or if a specific channel does not come out due to signal construction in the apartment or around your residence, or if the screen / voice is strange, the broadcast signal has been changed.
 2. Please reconnect the wall antenna cable first. Please reconnect the antenna cable of the one-connect.
 3. Please set up the automatic channel of the TV. Please enter Home → Settings → Channel → Automatic Channel and search for the channel. (The number of channels searched may vary depending on the region, broadcaster, and surrounding environment. )
 4. If the channel or automatic channel setting is disabled, it is an external device (set-top box) rather than a public wave signal, so please contact the set-top and carrier to be informed of the automatic channel setting. To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).

question: QLED TV turns off and on intermittently
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.If the TV is not powered on, the connection part of the power cord is loose or the connection part of the outlet is defective.
 2. First of all, if the screen does not appear on the TV, please check the LED lamp at the bottom of the TV. The LED lamp is located in the center or corner of the bottom.
 3. If the lamp is off, please reconnect the one-connect and the TV. Please separate the AOC (Magic) cable from the TV and one-connect and assemble it.
 4. Please reconnect the power cord of the one-connect as well.
 5. If it is connected to a power saving outlet, please connect it to a power outlet at all times.
 6. If the lamp is on, the TV is on standby, so please press the power button with the remote control.
 7. If there is no response to the lamp even if you press the power button of the remote control, the battery of the remote control is consumed, so please replace it with a new battery.
 8. For models that use a jack pack (one-connect), completely separate and reconnect the cable and jack pack power cord that connects the jack pack and the TV body.

question: QLED TV, no network, intermittent disconnection.
answer:
To watch the video, press the Play button (▶).
 1.Network failure or disconnection on the TV usually occurs depending on the router and network status.
 2. Please disconnect and reconnect the power cord of the Internet router completely.
 3. Please completely disconnect and reconnect the LAN wire connected to the Internet router. The mode LED on the Internet router flashes, which is normal.
 4. It may take 1~2 minutes to stabilize the Internet router.
 5. Please reset the network of the TV. Enter home and proceed with network initialization by entering Settings → General → Network.

question: QLED TV, remote control is not working
answer:

 2. If there is no response to the TV reception lamp even if you press the power button of the remote control toward the TV reception unit, the battery of the remote control is consumed, so please replace it with a new battery.
 3. If it is the same after replacing the battery, take a picture of the front (black window) signal transmission part of the remote control with your mobile phone. If infrared light is taken with a black window according to the remote control power button operation, the remote control is normal. However, if the light does not come out even after replacing the battery, the remote control is defective.

question: I can't control my voice.

answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by high current used in USB devices. Method of action Check USB extension cable removal When connecting a USB external HDD to a TV, you must connect it to a USB (HDD) terminal. When connecting to a terminal other than the USB (HDD) terminal, a USB power excess message may occur. USB terminal basically supports 5 V 0.5 A, which is USB
 2.0 standard, and USB (HDD) to cope with USB external HDD We are applying 5 V 1 A spec. When using USB external HDD, please connect to USB (HDD) terminal and use it. If you use Y-shaped auxiliary power, you can use it after connecting to USB (HDD) terminal and other USB terminal on the side of the TV. TV initialization method Due to TV malfunction symptoms, it must be initialized under factory shipment conditions. 
 ※ [Caution] Initialization must be carried out after initialization. Product initialization method by production year ~ 2009 Initialization Method [Setting Method] Initialization function is not applied → Remove the power cord for about 1 minute and reconnect. Initialization method from 2010 to 2011 [Setting method] Press the [End] button in the middle of the remote control for 10 seconds. question: Please let me know about setting the simultaneous screen.

The main screen cannot use the simultaneous screen function in TV mode. [2013 Simultaneous Screen Setting Method] Select Menu → System → Simultaneous Screen → Off / On. Menu → System Simultaneous screen Off/on

Simultaneous screens are only available under component, RGB, and HDMI input conditions. 1) Available when watching the main screen component RGB(D-SUB) HDMI 2) Impossible External input

answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by selecting a POP function to display the function of the product. Method of action Advertisement window release method In store mode, the ability to display the main features of the product on the TV screen can be applied to display advertising phrases. By changing the store mode to home mode, normal viewing is possible without displaying advertising phrases. ■ Pre-2008 products (excluding Brown tube TV and some models) Menu → System or Settings → Initial Settings → Change Store Mode to Home Mode → Skip → Skip → Check. Press the remote control menu button Press Settings on the Screen Initialization press Press OK on the automatic channel Check in 'home mode' Press the 'Menu' button on the remote control to skip Press the 'Menu' button on the remote control to skip Click check the remote control to complete. ■ 2009 ~ 2012 products Change Menu → System or Settings → Initial Settings → Store Mode to Home Mode. Menu - System Initial setup Store mode → Change home mode Menu Language - Korean - Next Network Settings - Skip Home mode selection Select the Current Time - Remote Control [Exit] button ■ Products from 2013 to 2014 Menu → Customer Support → Usage Mode (bottom of page) → Change Home Mode. Menu - Customer Support Use Mode - Change to Home Mode ■ 2015 product: Menu → Customer support → Usage mode (bottom of page) → Change home mode Menu - Customer Support Use Mode - Change to Home Mode ■ 2016 product: Menu → System → Usage mode (bottom of page) → Change home mode Menu - System - Expert Settings Use Mode - Change to Home Mode ■ Note: Release E-POP / function view Easy Menu - Move E-POP Select to turn off E-POP ■ How to release the main body manual shortcut key
 1.2006-2007: Press the main body menu button for 3 seconds to change to home mode. When the store mode is released normally, a clear screen appears in the pop-up window.
 2. 2008-2011: Main body volume + while pressing Menu button for 3 seconds When pressed, a pop-up window appears on the standard screen. → When the store mode is released normally, a clear screen or standard screen pop-up window appears. When you press the information display while watching TV, the screen mode Confirmed in store (shop) mode Clear screen pop-up window → Complete
 3. 2012-2014: Select rear 5-way key while watching TV → Move external input → Press long 3 seconds → Release Store mode screen Pop-up window appears when selecting rear 5-way key Press and hold for 3 seconds after moving external input Five-way key screen window disappears and is released

question: I want to know about digital antenna (UHF) connection and installation.
answer:
Expected cause An inquiry may occur when connecting to a TV using a UHF antenna. Method of action Antenna installation guide Connect the cable to the cable connection terminal of the UHF antenna and the antenna input terminal of the TV. Connecting Cables to Indoor UHF Antennas Connect cable to TV antenna input terminal Select Menu → "Channel" from Remote Control Channel → Select "Automatic Channel Settings" and click Start to proceed with automatic setting [Before 2006] Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection Select antenna connection status, select the following items when using UHF antenna [As of 2008 ~ 2010] Menu → Channel → Automatic Channel Setting
 1.Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection
 2. Auto channel setup execution [2011 ~ 2014 standard] Menu → Channel → Automatic channel setting Menu → Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution [2015 standard] Menu → Channel → Automatic channel setting
 1.Menu → Channel
 2. DTV channel selection (general/wired)
 3. Auto channel setup execution [Note] Select DTV channel 
 ① General: Install a separate digital antenna to select a digital broadcast when watching. 
 ② Wired: Select to watch digital broadcasting using wired/cable broadcasting.  In the case of apartments, they are divided into general/wired according to the broadcasting equipment of the apartment management office. → When setting up an automatic channel, set it to DTV channel selection wired and then set up an automatic channel. If DTV broadcast is not received, set DTV channel selection to normal and proceed with automatic channel. 
 ※ About 90% of domestic TV broadcasting households use wired / cable. [As of 2016] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings However, if it is not a smart remote control, you only need to press the menu button. (☞ 2016 model does not need to distinguish general / wired before setting up automatic channel) [As of 2017] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings However, if it is not a smart remote control, you only need to press the menu button. (☞ 2017 model does not need to distinguish general / wired before setting up automatic channel)

question: There's a scratch on the exterior. (Panel, liquid crystal, cathode ray tube, case, bezel)
answer:
Expected cause
 1.Liquid crystal breakage / breakage may occur due to external impact.
 2. It may be caused by a broadcast signal abnormality. Method of action Self-diagnosis confirmation method If it looks broken without external impact, it may occur due to more than a broadcast signal, not a symptom of exterior damage. In this case, you can check whether the product is abnormal or not through the image quality test function. [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test] [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed] During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if it does not look broken by the high-definition image and can be seen clearly, , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. If you still can't take action, I recommend you to check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.

question: Please let me know about using smartphone removable disk compatibility.
answer: Function guide Mobile disks may not be available depending on the TV model and smartphone method. It is divided into two ways: connecting to a removable disk method among smartphones and connecting to an MTP/PTP method. Among Samsung Electronics smartphones, Galaxy S2 and Galaxy Note can be connected to mobile disks, and since MTP/PTP methods are supported from models with Galaxy S3 or higher in early 2012, TVs do not support video, photo, and music playback stored on smartphones because they are not recognized as mobile disks when connecting smartphones.

question: Receiver listening is not activated.
answer:
Expected cause This may occur due to incorrect connection or poor receiver listening settings. Method of action Check the connection with the home theater If you want to listen to TV voice through the home theater speaker, you must proceed with the initial installation. HDMI, optical cable is required separately for installation. HDMI cable Optical cable
 1.Please connect HDMI and optical cable to the rear terminal of the TV. TV rear terminal HDMI Cable Connection Optical cable connection
 2. Connect the HDMI, optical cable to the rear terminal of the home theater. Home theater rear terminal HDMI Cable Connection Optical cable connection Anynet+ Confirm Settings If the Anynet+ setting is changed to Off, the Anynet+ item is not displayed in the simple menu item, and the receiver listening function is not available. In this case, please check Anynet+ settings before using them. Menu → System → Anynet + → [Off → On Change] Check initialization settings Initialization must be carried out due to communication error between TV and home theater. After initialization, please check the first stage Anynet + setting method again. Set-top box connection confirmation When using the receiver listening function to listen to the TV's voice through the home theater, it can be operated through the Anynet+ function among the functions applied to the TV. The condition for the Anynet+ function to operate is that Anynet+ must be supported between the TV and the device connected by HDMI, and if the device connected by HDMI does not support Anynet+ The Anynet+ feature on the TV is not available. When connecting a set-top box (cable/skylife/IPTV) at home to a TV and HDMI terminal, the set-top box does not support Anynet+ function, so when connecting a TV and a set-top box The Anynet+ function will not be available, and the Anynet+ function will not be available, so the receiver listening function will not be available, making it impossible to listen to TV voice on the home theater. [Method of Action]
 1.After connecting the TV and the set-top box to the component terminal, you can listen to TV voice at the home theater with the [Simple Menu → Listening to Receiver] function.
 2. When you press the Home Theater remote control and the Main Body [Select Function] button, the [DIGITAL IN] phrase is displayed on the liquid crystal of the Home Theater Main Body, and you can listen to TV voice through the Home Theater. Remote Control - Select Functions Home Theater Body - Select Functions

question: It's black and white.
answer:
Expected cause This may be caused by unstable broadcast signals. Black-and-white Redness/color abnormalities Color blur / overlap / double Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide If it appears black and white only on a specific channel, it may occur as a broadcast signal or more, not as a product abnormality. This is because if there is an abnormality in the product, the same color spreads on all channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. There are two types of screen blur symptoms for wired (local) cable subscribers without set-top boxes. (If it is directly connected to the coaxial cable TV)
 1.When only analog comes out because channel is not set → Menu - Channel - Wired Selection - Automatic channel progress (2016 ~ 2017 high-end model does not require general, wired setting )
 2. If you do not receive a DTV channel even though you have set up an automatic channel, you can watch a wired channel on a DTV channel even for subscribers who do not have a set-top from 2017. There is a possibility of signal error during channel relocation operation. (We need to contact the cable company ) If the channel mark is '9', Need to set up automatic channel If the channel mark is '9-1', Receiving through DTV channel Self-diagnosis method If the color looks spread, it may occur due to a broadcast signal problem, TV abnormality, or abnormality of the product can be checked through the image quality test function. ■ How to check image quality test Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. [Click remote control home button] [Move left lower setting] [Menu → Move Customer Support] [Self-diagnosis Selection] [Select to start image quality test] [Sample image stored on TV is displayed]   How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] You should check the set-top box or broadcast signal. The upgrade method is as follows. 
 ① Internet Upgrade '12 years ago: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Internet Update After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Menu → Customer Support Software update Update now 
 ② USB Upgrade [Downpath: Samsung Electronics homepage access → customer support → model search → download → firmware → firmware file download → decompression and save in USB memory → USB TV connection] ■ Installation method After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Before '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Upgrade → USB Upgrade Press the remote control home button Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support Select [Software Update] Select [Update now] After checking the update, proceed with the update

In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. Self-diagnosis method If the color looks spread, it may occur due to a broadcast signal problem, TV abnormality, or abnormality of the product can be checked through the image quality test function. ■ How to check image quality test Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen. If the color of the high-definition image does not look red and can be clearly seen, , It is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If the color looks red on the high-definition image displayed, , it may occur due to circuit problems and you need to get an inspection. ■ How to check 2017 model image quality test Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. question: I can't change the channel.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur due to set-top box malfunction or TV malfunction. Method of action Check the set-top box. This is because when watching TV broadcasts by connecting the set-top box, the TV acts as a monitor and changes to the channel you want to watch in the set-top box. If the channel is not changed, it may occur due to set-top box malfunction. Remove the power cord of the set-top box for about a minute and reconnect it, and in the same case, contact the broadcaster (cable / sky life / IPTV) for an inspection of the set-top box. Change remote control mode settings If the remote control mode is selected as a product other than the TV, the remote control may not work. In this case, please select the device selection toward the TV and use it. When you press the remote control mode button, it changes in the order of TV → STB → AC. If you have the same symptoms after checking the remote control mode selection, please proceed with the TV initialization method. Initialization method Due to TV malfunction symptoms, it must be initialized under factory shipment conditions. 
 ※ [Caution] Initialization must be carried out after initialization. ~ 2009 product Initialization function is not applied → Remove the power cord for about 1 minute and reconnect. Products from 2010 to 2011

The message ” is displayed and [OK] is selected to proceed with initialization. 2012 ~ Product Menu of remote control → Customer support → Self diagnosis → Initialization → Enter password (initial number :0000) → Select 'Example' in factory initial value setting → Initialization is completed.

question: I hear high-frequency noise.
answer: Expected cause It can be caused by the operating characteristics of the circuit applied in the product. Method of action Sound quality test confirmation If noise is heard when the volume is adjusted to “0”, the noise generated by the speaker may cause a broadcast signal problem or TV abnormality, and through the sound quality test function You can check if there is any abnormality in the product. [Settings Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test Remote Control - Menu Customer support Self-diagnosis Sound quality test [2017 Product Setting Method] Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] If symptoms cannot be reproduced, select 'No' Select 'Close' when sound quality test is completed During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the sample sound played is heard neatly without noise, it is a symptom of noise due to broadcasting signal problems, not product problems. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If noise is generated in the reproduced sample sound, it can be caused by an abnormality in the speaker or voice circuit and must be checked. Noise standard Due to various circuits and large currents applied to the TV, noise may be generated as electrical components operate according to changes in screen brightness. The normal specifications managed by the product are managed below 30 dB and are similar to the noise of fans (breezes) and humidifiers. Please use it safely within the normal specification range managed by the product to the extent that it is quieter or similar to the noise generated by the humidifier. For more information, please refer to the manual. Noise check Electric spark splashing (high frequency) noise may occur due to abnormalities in the internal circuit of the product, but may also occur due to abnormalities in the multi-tap connected to the product. If you connect to the multi-tap and use it, please connect the TV power cord directly to the wall terminal, not the multi-tap. If noise is louder than the sound heard from the humidifier, it may occur in excess of the normal specifications managed by the product, so you should check it. If it has not been resolved, I recommend you to check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.

 3.0 Theoretically, the maximum transmission capacity is 5 Gbps, but under actual use conditions, it averages 100 to 110 Mbps. Power is 5 V 700 mA.

 3.0 memory, but the actual speed operates at USB
 2.0.

question: The voice gets louder and smaller repeatedly while watching.
answer:
Expected cause Depending on the broadcast program, if the voice comes out and then breaks and the voice starts again, it may occur if the automatic volume function is set to normal (on). Method of action Broadcasting program's own characteristics Symptoms of repeated symptoms of voice increase or decrease while watching a specific channel broadcast program may occur depending on the location or location of the broadcast filming site, and symptoms of voice increase or decrease may occur as soon as outdoor filming and narration voice change. This is a symptom caused by different voice levels depending on the filming location, and can be set through the automatic volume adjustment function. If the same symptom occurs even after setting the automatic volume function, please note that it is used as a symptom caused by the characteristics of the broadcasting program itself. Automatic volume off method Usually, when watching the news, when an announcer speaks and connects a reporter at the scene, the voice may suddenly grow. In other words, if the voice starts again after it is cut off while coming out, it may occur if the automatic volume function applied to the TV is set to normal (on). You can change the automatic volume setting from normal (on) to off. [Menu → Sound → Speaker Settings → Automatic Volume → Change to Off]
 1.Menu - Sound
 2. Speaker setting
 3. Automatic volume
 4. Normal (on) → Change to off Sound quality test method If the symptoms of voice increase / decrease occur while watching, it may occur due to the characteristics of the broadcast signal program, may occur due to TV malfunction, and the sound quality test function can check whether the product is abnormal or not. [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Sound Quality Test] Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Sound quality test Check During the sound quality test, the sample sound built into the TV is played, and if the sample sound played is heard well without any change in voice, it is a problem caused by a broadcasting program, not a product abnormality. Please refer to it and use it. If there is a change in voice in the sample sound being played, it may occur due to an abnormality in the speaker or voice circuit and you need to check it. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster for a set-top box or broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. In both ways, data from mobile phones can be backed up to PCs, and only smartphones that support removable disk methods can be connected when connected to TVs. The MTP method is not recognized on TV. question: There is no specific channel.
answer:
Expected cause It may occur because the broadcast signal is weak and the channel is skipped or the channel is not remembered. Method of action Automatic channel setting method When setting up an automatic channel, it is a function that automatically remembers the channel after searching all channels of the TV in a way that remembers channels with broadcast signals while searching all channels of the TV, and does not remember channels without broadcast signals. It takes about 3 to 5 minutes for the automatic channel. ■ Menu → Channel / (Broadcast) → Automatic channel setting (2011 ~ 2014) Automatic channel setup execution Menu - Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution   ■ Select DTV channel 
 ① General: Install a separate digital antenna to select a digital broadcast when watching. 
 ② Wired: Select to watch digital broadcasting using wired/cable broadcasting. In the case of apartments, they are divided into general/wired according to the broadcasting equipment of the apartment management office. → When setting up an automatic channel, set it to DTV channel selection wired and then set up an automatic channel. If DTV broadcasting is not received, set DTV channel selection to normal and proceed with automatic channel. 
 ※ About 90% of domestic TV broadcasting households use wired / cable. [Before 2006] METHOD FOR SETTING AUTOMATIC CHANNEL Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection Antenna connection status selection 
 ※ Select the following items when using UHF antenna [As of 2008 ~ 2010] Menu → Channel → Automatic Channel Setting Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection Auto channel setup execution [2011 ~ 2014 standard] Menu → Channel → Automatic channel setting Menu → Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution [2015 standard] Menu → Channel → Automatic channel setting Menu → Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution [As of 2016] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings However, if it is not a smart remote control, you only need to press the menu button. (☞ 2016 model does not need to distinguish general / wired before setting up automatic channel) [Press remote control home button] [Click Settings on Screen] [Click Channel/Broadcast in Menu] [Click Automatic Channel Settings] [As of 2017] Remote control home → Settings → Menu → Channel / Broadcasting → Automatic Channel Settings However, if it is not a smart remote control, you only need to press the menu button. (☞ 2017 model does not need to distinguish general / wired before setting up automatic channel) [Press remote control home button] Move [Settings] at the bottom left Press [Channel/Broadcast] on the menu Press [Automatic Channel Settings] Broadcast signal confirmation If a specific broadcasting channel does not appear even after setting up an automatic channel, it is a symptom caused by a weak broadcasting signal, not a product abnormality. The TV is equipped with a function to check the broadcast reception sensitivity, so you can check whether it is a product abnormality or a broadcast signal abnormality. ■ Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Check the digital signal strength. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Digital signal information execution Digital signal sensitivity check [2017 product standard] [Press remote control home button] Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Signal Information] Check antenna signal status When digital signal sensitivity is executed, normal broadcasting viewing is possible only when at least 3 out of 10 antennas are received. If the digital signal sensitivity is displayed below 3 spaces, the broadcast signal reception status is weak. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for inspection of the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]
