question: Integrated remote control / smart remote control voice recognition is not working.
answer:
Expected cause When ordering voice recognition with the remote control, it must operate while pressing the "voice recognition" button, and if the remote control battery is insufficient, it may not work. Method of action Check voice recognition settings You need to check the voice recognition settings to use the voice recognition function. Please change the voice recognition function to On and use it. ■ Voice recognition utterance when watching TV
 1.“High TV power on” or “Smart TV power on” when initial power is turned on
 2. If you do “High TV” or “Smart TV,” it appears at the bottom of the screen as follows. (The default is high TV ) ■ How to turn on the voice recognition function Menu → Select "System" System → Select "Voice and Motion Recognition" Voice and Motion Recognition → Select "Voice Recognition" Voice recognition → Select "on" How to use remote control voice recognition When the voice recognition function is operated using the smart remote control, voice recognition is performed only when a command is used while pressing the “voice recognition” button on the remote control. Please use the voice recognition function while pressing the voice recognition button in the center of the remote control. ■ Voice recognition button location of remote control Press the voice recognition button on the smart remote control and give a command. 2012 2013 2014 Check remote control battery replacement Most of the symptoms that the remote control does not work are caused by the lack of remaining battery capacity of the remote control. The battery of the remote control provided at the time of purchase is naturally discharged in the distribution process, so it is difficult to use it as much as expected, and the remote control battery must be replaced with a new one. In the case of products sold as cheap bundled products, the usage time is much shorter than that of genuine batteries, so it is recommended to use genuine batteries packaged in pairs. When replacing the remote control battery, if the battery used by another product is replaced instead of replaced in a pair, it may not work normally on the TV due to lack of battery voltage. Unlike remote controls used in the past, remote controls on smart TVs are equipped with smart functions and have high power consumption, so even batteries that operated normally in other products must be replaced when replacing remote control batteries. ■ Recommendations for battery replacement of remote control A pair of remote control batteries (recommended) Remote control battery different pair ■ If it is the same symptom after replacement
 1.Battery polarity needs to be checked
 2. It is necessary to check whether the remote control mode is set to TV
 3. It is necessary to check whether it is caused by a three-wavelength fluorescent lamp

question: I want to know how to use 2015 TV motion recognition...
answer:
METHOD FOR USING TV MOTION RECOGNITION Support model - Please refer to '15 UHD = JS9500 / JS9000 series products. ☞ JS9000 series is supported when installing separate camera Support specification Integrated remote control support specification Model RF STB IR cable JS9000 or higher support support Separate sale JU6900 or higher support Unsupported X (No IR output terminal) Connection condition - JS9500: Camera built-in can be connected immediately - Other models: VG-STC5000 (separate sale) is mounted on USB terminal (recommended to install VG-STC5000 exclusively for Samsung TV) ☞ For external cameras, it is necessary to connect to the network once for the first time Setting method Menu – System – Motion Recognition – Select Motion Recognition “On” - Check finger recognition (available after motion recognition activation) Street specification  It is recommended to use short distance (for long distance, normal operation may not be possible Testing the environment before use
 1.Please put the camera on the TV. (Excluding 9500 model) - Please connect to the USB (CAMERA) terminal on the back of the product. This feature is not available when connecting to another USB terminal.
 2. Run Menu/123 - Menu - System - Motion Recognition “On”. 
 3. Menu/123 – Menu – System – Motion Recognition – Run Motion Recognition Environment Test to check usage conditions. (Run 1.5 ~ 4 m away. ) 
 4. Check if it is possible by shaking the index finger left and right like the image at the bottom within 15 seconds.  Motion recognition operation method  Please activate motion recognition by clenching your fist and shaking it from side to side with a black but flat surface 1.5 to 4m away from the TV. The following commands are available.
 1.Pointer moving  When you move your hand, the pointer on the screen moves along your hand.
 2. Item selection  Fold and stretch your index finger as if you were clicking on a mouse. You can select the TV menu or run the feature. If you keep folding your index finger, it works the same as pressing the remote control button.
 3. Return to previous menu  If you circle your hand counterclockwise, it moves to the previous screen.
 4. Calling the Options Menu/Checking Broadcast Information  Fold and stretch your index finger for at least 1 second. In the selected item, you can call the available options menu on the screen. Fold and unfold your index finger for more than a second on an empty screen while watching the broadcast. You can check the broadcast information for all automatically stored channels. Motion recognition operation method Screen icon Screen icon description You can run a virtual remote control. You can check the information of the broadcast program you are watching and run a list of channels. You can run a smart hub. You can adjust the volume and select and listen to the speakers you want. You can adjust volume and channel and change the view mode of motion recognition to motion pointing mode. If there is no channel △, ▽, please proceed with STB integrated remote control setting. Motion recognition usage environment condition The motion recognition function is recommended to be used at a distance of about 1.5 m or more to
 3.5 m, and the recognition range may vary depending on the angle of the camera and other environmental conditions. Motion recognition is provided as an accessory or operates as a camera built into the TV, so it is not recognized when the camera is looking up or down. Adjust the angle using the camera angle adjustment knob. Light the camera lens directly with direct sunlight or light or prevent it from being covered by objects. The TV camera detects movement, so the user and background must be clearly contrasted. The ambient proper brightness of the indoor space is 50 to 500 Lux. (100 Lux: bathroom, bathroom, 400 Lux: living room) Avoid direct sunlight when using motion recognition. Before using the motion recognition function, run a motion recognition environment test first to test the camera's recognition range. Motion recognition is provided as an accessory or operates with a camera built into the TV, so the user must be within the recognition range of the TV camera. The recognition range may vary depending on ambient brightness and other conditions. Before using the motion recognition function, first run a motion recognition environment test to see if the user is within the camera recognition range. Long-term motion recognition can cause fatigue in the body.

question: I have a fever.
answer:
Expected cause Heat generation may occur due to the driving characteristics that make the screen. Method of action [LED, LCD] The biggest cause of heat on the TV is that the backlight is operated to display the screen, which can cause the TV screen to heat up due to heat generated from the backlight. Depending on the type of product, the backlight application location is different, so the heat generation location varies.
 1.Slim LED product The backlight is located on the edge of the TV, so the middle of the screen is lukewarm, but hot symptoms may occur only on the edge. Heat is circulated in stores or large spaces, so you don't feel much heat generation, but heat generation can be felt more in narrow spaces, enclosed spaces, and general home environments. This is not a problem with the product, but heat generation caused by backlight operation, so please use it with confidence.
 2. General LED and LCD Products The backlight is located throughout the TV screen, so you can feel hot symptoms evenly on the TV screen, and due to the nature of the heat, the upper part can feel hotter than the lower part. This is not a problem with the product, but heat generation caused by backlight operation, so please use it with confidence. [PDP] PDP products are products that create screens based on the principle of gas discharge and have similar characteristics to fluorescent lights and neon signs. In other words, because the screen is made by gas discharge, a high temperature occurs, and just as you felt hot when replacing fluorescent lights, PDP products can feel hot as products that display the screen by discharging the same gas. This is not a problem with the product, but heat generation due to the characteristics of the driving method, so please use it with confidence. If you need further confirmation, we recommend that you check it through an accurate diagnosis by the engineer.

question: How do I use the smart control remote control provided to Samsung TV I bought in 2014?
answer:
How to use Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) makes it easier and easier to use TVs than regular remote controls. When you press the "More Buttons" button, a virtual remote control appears on the screen, making it easy to use number input, content playback control, and function buttons. - Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) recommends use within 6 m, and the usage distance may vary depending on wireless environment conditions. How to insert a battery into Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) (AA battery × 2)
 1.Lift the grooves of the battery cover slightly, then hold the open area and remove the cover completely.
 2. Insert two alkaline batteries (1.5 V, AA) to +/- polarity of the battery.
 3. Place the battery cover over the remote control and place a groove on top.
 4. Press the grooves on both sides of the battery cover by hand in the order of the picture to ensure that the cover is in full contact with the remote control. [Notification of battery replacement] While using Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control), when the battery life is short, the notification window as shown in the picture below blinks and appears on the screen. When the notification window appears, replace the battery of Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control). It is recommended to use alkaline batteries to extend battery life. How to connect Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) to TV To use Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control), you must first connect the TV with the Bluetooth function built into Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control). - Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) can be connected to only one TV.
 1.With the TV turned off, turn on the TV by pressing the TV button after facing the remote control receiver of the TV with Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control). - The direction of the remote control receiver may vary depending on the model.
 2. When the TV is turned on, Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) is automatically connected. Reconnecting Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) If Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) does not work, replace the battery first. If it still doesn't work, you have to reconnect Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) to the TV.
 1.Press the return button and broadcast guide button of Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) for 3 seconds at the same time. - Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) must be within 30 cm to 4 m from the TV and face the remote control receiver of the TV.
 2. A connection image appears on the screen, and Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) is automatically reconnected to the TV. Name and Description of Samsung Smart Control (Samsung Smart Remote Control) Button

question: The product has a fever while watching TV.
answer: Heat-generating cause All LED/LCD/PDP TV products implement display screens using back light or driving elements, and the heat generation temperature varies slightly depending on the operating principle and appearance type  Heat generation cannot be largely recognized in stores or large spaces, and heat is generated equally in narrow spaces or in all products produced around the world.  Internal management is based on the recommendations of the Medical Association related to thermal burns, so there is no harm to the human body in using the product.     Heat generation by product    Product name  Details      LED  - In the case of edge LEDs, LED BARs are located in certain areas of the top, bottom, left, and right due to their characteristics, so only certain areas can be hotter, and the product is slim and has high thermal conductivity, so it can feel hotter than other product groups. - You can see that the LED BAR, which is a light source, is installed in the hottest part by touching it with your hand.    LCD  - Back light is lamp, so heat is generated overall, and heat is generated most at the top of the front.    PDP  - Since the image is implemented by the gas discharge type plasma, invisible light is generated when the plasma collides, and heat is generated in the pixel in the process of generating visible light by hitting the phosphor.

question: Please tell me how to set the automatic execution of smart TV ticker....
If DTV broadcast is not received, is recording supported? ...
answer: If DTV broadcast is not received, recording is not supported. During recording, you can't watch it because you switch to another channel (DTV / ATV). If you switch to another channel during recording (or reservation recording), you will say, "Would you like to end recording and switch channels? [Yes] [No]." It is not a two-tuner method, so you can't watch other channels during recording.  You can record even if you turn off the TV during recording (or reservation recording). Even if the TV is turned off, recording is stopped, or if the recording completion time is not over, recording continues. However, recording is stopped if the power is cut off, not the power off (power waiting).

question: The power's on late.

TV power running time guide In the case of recently sold digital TVs, when the product is powered on, the power is turned on after checking the operation of various circuits to implement high-definition images and preparing to implement high-definition images, so the initial power is turned on for a long time compared to analog TVs in the past. The specifications managed by the product are within 10 seconds of initial power ON, and if the TV screen is displayed within 10 seconds, it is a characteristic of high-definition TV, not a product abnormality, so please refer to it. Power cord connecting method It can be caused by temporary malfunction of the power supply circuit. In the case of temporary malfunction symptoms, simple initialization is possible, and please disconnect the power cord connection on the back of the TV and reconnect the power cord. 
 ※ To initialize the power circuit enough, remove the power cord and plug it in after about 1 minute. When reconnecting the power cord, you need to plug it in so that it can be contacted well. The power cord on the back of the TV is loose. answer: Anynet+, ARC Configuration In order to listen to the sound of V through the home theater, you need to set Anynet+ and ARC to use it. Check if HIGH SPEED is marked.

question: No digital broadcasting / No DTV channel / No channel
answer:
External input checking method If you watch TV broadcasting through the set-top box, the external input setting for using the set-top box may be wrong and the broadcast screen may not appear. Press the external input button at the top of the remote control to switch to TV mode. Press the TV/External Input button Go to external input PC → TV Go to external input PC → TV Self-diagnosis method If a specific broadcasting channel does not appear, it is a symptom caused by weak broadcasting signals. The TV is equipped with a function to check the broadcast reception sensitivity, so you can check whether it is a product abnormality or a broadcast signal abnormality. [Method] Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Check the digital signal strength. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Digital signal information execution Digital signal sensitivity check [Check 2017 product standard signal information] [Press remote control home button] Move [Settings] at the bottom left Menu → Move customer support Select [Self Diagnosis] Select [Signal Information] Check antenna signal status When digital signal sensitivity is executed, normal broadcasting viewing is possible only when at least 3 out of 10 antennas are received. If the digital signal sensitivity is displayed below 3 spaces, the broadcast signal reception status is weak. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for inspection of the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.] Automatic channel setting method It may be caused by not entering a digital broadcasting channel on the TV. When setting up an automatic channel, it is a function that automatically remembers the channel after searching all channels of the TV in a way that remembers channels with broadcast signals while searching all channels of the TV, and does not remember channels without broadcast signals. It takes about 3 to 5 minutes for the automatic channel. Check [Menu → Channel → Automatic Channel Settings ]. Menu - Channel DTV channel selection (general/wired) DTV channel selection (general/wired) Auto channel setup execution Auto channel setup execution [Note] Select DTV channel 
 ① General: Install a separate digital antenna to select a digital broadcast when watching. 
 ② Wired: Select to watch digital broadcasting using wired/cable broadcasting. In the case of apartments, they are divided into general/wired according to the broadcasting equipment of the apartment management office. → When setting up an automatic channel, set it to DTV channel selection wired and then set up an automatic channel. If DTV broadcasting is not received, set DTV channel selection to normal and proceed with automatic channel. 
 ※ About 90% of domestic TV broadcasting households use wired / cable. [Before 2006] METHOD FOR SETTING AUTOMATIC CHANNEL Menu → Channel → DTV Channel Selection → Wire Selection Antenna connection status selection

question: It's black and white.
answer:
Expected cause It may be caused by unstable broadcast signals. Black-and-white Redness/color abnormalities Color blur / overlap / double Method of action Broadcasting signal check guide If the color spreads only on a specific channel, it may occur as a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. This is because if there is an abnormality in the product, the same color spreads on all channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.].  Self-diagnosis method If the color looks smudged, it may occur due to a broadcast signal problem, may occur due to TV abnormalities, and the image quality test function can check whether the product is abnormal or not. How to check image quality test Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen. If the color of the high-definition image does not look red and can be clearly seen, , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If the color looks red on the high-definition image displayed, , it may occur due to circuit problems and you need to get an inspection. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster for a set-top box or broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. The upgrade method is as follows. 
 ① Internet Upgrade '12 years ago: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Internet Update After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Menu → Customer Support Software update Update now 
 ② USB Upgrade [Downpath: Samsung Electronics homepage access → customer support → model search → download → firmware → firmware file download → decompression and save in USB memory → USB TV connection] Installation method After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Before '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Upgrade → USB Upgrade Menu → Customer Support Software update Select Upgrade to USB

"If it comes out, it can be caused by a change in channel settings, and all channel memories received on TV must be re-established by executing automatic channel settings. question: It doesn't come out from the TV voice home theater.
answer:
Cause of occurrence It may occur because the connection is wrong or the receiver listening setting is not set. How to check the connection between TV and home theater If you want to listen to TV voice on the home theater speaker, you need to proceed with the initial connection, and please prepare HDMI and optical cable for connection. HDMI cable Optical cable 
 1.Please connect HDMI and optical cable to the rear terminal of the TV. TV rear terminal HDMI Cable Connection Optical cable connection
 2. Please connect HDMI and optical cable to the rear terminal of the home theater. Home theater rear terminal HDMI Cable Connection Optical cable connection If the Anynet+ setting is changed to Off, the Anynet+ item is not displayed in the simple menu item and the receiver listening function is not available. 
 ※ Anynet function: Function to use remote control operation comfortably when connecting Samsung Electronics products and external devices Remote control → Simple menu Anynet+ Item In this case, you should check Anynet+ settings. Remote control Menu Press button → System → Turn off Anynet + (HDMI-CEC) On Please change it to. System selection Anynet+ Turn off → Change on If a communication error persists between the TV and the home theater, initialization must proceed. 
 ※ Caution) Please make sure to proceed with the initial setting after initialization. ~ 2009 Initialization function is not applied → Remove the power cord for about 1 minute and reconnect. 2010-2011 In the middle of the remote control. end Press the button for 10 seconds. Return all " settings to their initial state in the center of the TV screen. "When a message is displayed, Check Please select and proceed with initialization. 2012 ~ Press the menu of the remote control → Select customer support → Select self-diagnosis → Select initialization → Enter initial password 0000 → Set factory initial value Yes Press → Initialization is complete. Customer support selection Self-diagnosis selection Select Initialize Enter the initial password 0000. Yes pressed on factory initialization screen Initialization is complete How to check HDMI connection with set-top box If you use the receiver listening function to listen to the TV's voice through the home theater, you can operate through the Anynet+ function among the TV functions. The condition for the Anynet+ function to operate is that Anynet+ must support each other between the TV and the device connected by HDMI, and the Anynet+ function of the TV is not available if the device connected by HDMI does not support Anynet+. When connecting a set-top box (cable/skylife/IPTV) at home to a TV and HDMI terminal, the set-top box does not support the Anynet+ function, so the Anynet+ function cannot be used when connecting the TV and the set-top box. Because the Anynet+ function is not available, the receiver listening function is not available, and TV voice is not available to the home theater. Method of action

 2. Home Theater Remote Control, Main Body [ Function selection ] When you press the button, the home theater body liquid crystal [DIGITAL IN] Words are displayed, and TV voices can be heard at the home theater. question: The power saving mode is automatically released.
answer: Screen mode automatically changes to clear screen You can choose between store mode and home mode to watch the product. Home mode is a mode used in ordinary homes in which menu settings are maintained, and store mode is a mode that automatically changes to a clear screen after 30 minutes of power ON / OFF for the best image quality. The reason why the screen is changed to a clear screen when the power is turned on/off or when the channel is changed is a symptom caused by setting it to store mode, and normal viewing is possible when changing to home mode. 2009-2012 products Menu → System or (Settings) → Initial Settings → Change store mode to home mode. question: I can't save the TV recordings to my computer.
answer:
OS characteristic problem guide This is a problem that occurs when recording TV broadcasting because the format supported is different from PC. Recorded broadcasts cannot be played or backed up on other TVs or PCs due to copyright protection. For reference, PC is Windows-based OS, so it supports FAT16, FAT32, NTFS format, and TV is Linux-based OS, so it supports XFS format. After all, TV and PC are problems caused by different OSs. (However, it does not matter when playing) When playing, it means playing a file already stored on a PC or other external device on a TV. 
 ※ Note: All previous data will be deleted during formatting. (Required backup to other storage space) Recorded broadcasting (contents) Error phrase when playing on other TV Recorded broadcasting (contents) Error phrase when connecting to PC

question: Your voice speed isn't right.
answer: Explanation of the cause of the broadcast signal If symptoms that do not match the screen and voice speed occur, it may occur in some or all broadcast programs due to broadcast signals transmitted by broadcasting stations. Because the processing speed of the video signal and the voice signal is different, there is a slight difference in the speed of the video/voice, and although it is not usually felt, the speed difference may feel sensory depending on some broadcasting programs. It is not a symptom caused by a product abnormality, so please feel free to use it. Speaker delay time setting method When listening to TV voice through the home theater, the video is displayed directly on the TV screen, but since the voice signal is output from the TV through the home theater, some delay time occurs in the process of transmitting the voice from the TV to the home theater. Some of the functions of the TV can be set up by applying a function that can minimize the delay time. [Menu → Sound → SPDIF Settings → Delay Time Adjustment] If the voice is faster than the screen: Please set the delay time adjustment higher. [+] If the voice is slower than the screen: Please set the delay time adjustment lower. [-] Even if the delay time is adjusted, there is a time when voice is transmitted from the TV to the home theater, so symptoms that the screen / voice speed is not correct may occur. This is not a product problem, but a problem caused by the time the voice is transmitted from the TV to the home theater, so please refer to it when using it. Menu - Sound SPDIF Configuration If the voice is faster than the screen, the delay time Please set it high If the voice is slower than the screen, the delay time Please set it low. Explain the cause of set-top box When watching a broadcast through a set-top box, the speed of video/voice may vary slightly depending on the speed of video/voice signal transmission from the set-top box to the TV. It doesn't usually feel big, but some broadcasting programs may feel the speed difference. It is not a symptom caused by a product abnormality, so please feel free to use it.

question: It's popping.
answer:
Expected cause It can be caused by shrinkage/expansion of the product exterior case and screw fastening part due to temperature change. Method of action Guidance on the occurrence of thud noise due to temperature change during viewing The cause of the pop-up noise while watching is the sound caused by the temperature change of the product It contracts / expands according to internal temperature changes while watching TV, so it is a sound that occurs momentarily at the screw fastening part of the front / rear case assembly part, and it is not a product problem due to temperature change, not a product failure problem, so you can use it with confidence. If the thud noise occurs periodically (more than 10 times a day), you should check it out. For more information, please refer to the manual. 
 ※ Go to the download library directly. Click ←. Guidance on the occurrence of thud noise due to temperature change when turned off The cause of the thud noise when the power is turned off is the sound caused by the temperature change of the product. The temperature that has risen while watching TV gradually decreases when the power is turned off, and it contracts as the temperature changes, so you can use it with confidence because it is a sound that occurs momentarily at the screw fastening part of the front / rear case assembly part and is not a product problem due to temperature change, not a product failure problem. If the thud noise occurs periodically (more than 10 times a day), you should have an A/S inspection.

question: USB / external HDD connection is not recognized
answer:
Check USB terminal 
 ① When connecting USB memory, you can connect to all USB terminals applied to the TV. However, if the USB memory is formatted in the NTFS method, it can only be recognized at the USB (HDD) terminal. 
 ② When connecting USB external HDD, it can only be recognized at USB (HDD) terminal. If it is connected to a terminal other than the USB (HDD) terminal, it is not recognized. 
 ③ When a memory or HDD is connected to a PC, it may not be recognized as memory or HDD or higher. USB terminal connection When connecting USB external HDD, it can only be recognized at USB (HDD) terminal. It does not recognize when connecting to other USB terminals. [Note] TV USB terminal support specification General USB terminal: File system (FAT), voltage/current (5V, 0.5A) support USB external HDD: File system (FAT/NTFS), voltage/current (5V, 1.0A) support

question: Integrated remote control / smart remote control voice recognition is not working
answer:
Check voice recognition settings You need to check the voice recognition settings to use the voice recognition function Please change the voice recognition function to On and use it. Voice recognition utterance word when watching TV
 1.“High TV power on” or “Smart TV power on” when initial power is turned on
 2. If you do “High TV” or “Smart TV,” it appears at the bottom of the screen as follows. (The default is high TV ) METHOD FOR ONTING VOICE RECOGNITION FUNCTION Menu → Select "System" System → Select "Voice and Motion Recognition" Voice and Motion Recognition → Select "Voice Recognition" Voice recognition → Select "on" How to use remote control voice recognition When the voice recognition function is operated using the smart remote control, voice recognition is performed only when a command is used while pressing the “voice recognition” button on the remote control. Please use the voice recognition function while pressing the voice recognition button in the center of the remote control. Location of the voice recognition button on the remote control Press the voice recognition button on the smart remote control and command. AD 12 AD 13 AD 14 Check remote control battery replacement Most of the symptoms that the remote control does not work are caused by the lack of remaining battery capacity of the remote control. The battery of the remote control provided at the time of purchase is naturally discharged in the distribution process, so it is difficult to use it as much as expected, and the remote control battery must be replaced with a new one. In the case of products sold as cheap bundled products, the usage time is much shorter than that of genuine batteries, so it is recommended to use genuine batteries packaged in pairs. When replacing the remote control battery, if the battery used by another product is replaced instead of replaced in a pair, it may not work normally on the TV due to lack of battery voltage. Unlike remote controls used in the past, remote controls on smart TVs are equipped with smart functions and have high power consumption, so even batteries that operated normally in other products must be replaced when replacing remote control batteries. Recommendations for battery replacement of remote control A pair of remote control batteries (recommended) Remote control battery different pair If the symptom is the same after replacement
 1.Battery polarity needs to be checked
 2. It is necessary to check whether the remote control mode is set to TV
 3. It is necessary to check whether it is caused by a three-wavelength fluorescent lamp

question: I wonder how to take action when I feel static electricity (electric flow) on the TV.
answer:
Method of action Since home appliances operate using 220V of AC power, electrical symptoms may occur due to electrical characteristics. static electricity In the case of static electricity, drying in the home can occur mainly. Please feel free to use this as it is related to the environment at home. Electricity flow and leakage current generation Symptoms of electricity flow can be caused by not grounding all home appliances, including refrigerators and washing machines, and can be grounded to take action against symptoms of electricity flow. Method of action When connected to the ground terminal of the power outlet, it can be used without leakage current. It is recommended to connect the TV directly to the wall power outlet, not the multi-tap. If there is no ground power outlet
 1.When using ground IPTV by connecting the wall antenna terminal and the TV rear antenna connection terminal, the TV and the wall antenna are not connected, which may cause symptoms.
 2. Please connect the GND WIRE to the Bessa Hall used for connecting the wall mount on the back of the TV and ground it.

question: I can't connect my 3D glasses.
answer:
Motion distance guide Please keep the proper distance for pairing and watching TV when using 3D glasses. Pairing or 3D TV viewing may not be possible. - Appropriate distance for pairing: Within 50 cm - Appropriate distance when watching TV: 2 ~ 6 m Battery replacement/charging method If the red LED above the glasses flashes every 2 seconds or the LED light does not work at all even if you press the button, the battery is discharged, so replace or charge the battery. SSG-4100GB (battery type) battery replacement method Insert the battery in the same direction as the + indicated on the battery cover. SSG-3550CR (Rechargeable) Charging Method 
 ① Charging: Orange LEDs blink every second. 
 ② Charging complete: Green LEDs blink every 2 seconds. 
 ③ It takes about 30 minutes to fully charge after discharge. Pairing reset method The pairing method is as follows. 
 ① First, turn on the TV. 
 ② When you press the power button of 3D glasses for 2 to 3 seconds, the green and red LEDs blink alternately and turn off, saying, "3D glasses are connected to the TV screen If you get the message ", it's done. 3D setting method Press the "3D" shortcut on the TV remote to switch to 3D. Press the 3D shortcut key Completed when the stereoscopic image screen appears

question: There's a black line.
answer:
Broadcast signal check confirmation guide If a horizontal line occurs only on a specific channel, it may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. If there is an abnormality in the product, a line is formed in the same position on all channels, but if a line is generated by a broadcast signal, the position where the line is formed varies from channel to channel. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. Broadcast signal check confirmation guide When you press the menu button on the remote control, you can check for product abnormalities using the menu window displayed. ☞ If the line appears to be covered by the menu window, it is necessary to check the broadcast signal as a symptom of a line occurring due to a broadcast signal abnormality. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. ☞ If the line appears on the menu window as it is, it is a symptom of product abnormality and needs to be checked by the engineer. Self-diagnosis method The cause of the line on the screen may be a broadcast signal problem, a TV abnormality, or an abnormality in the product can be checked through the image quality test function. How to check image quality test Select [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if the high-definition image does not have a line and is clearly visible, , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster to check the broadcast signal [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. If there is a line in the high-definition image displayed, it can cause circuit abnormalities and you need to check it out. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware Software malfunctions applied to TVs can cause line-up symptoms. Updates are required with the latest software and upgrade methods are as follows. 
 ① Internet Upgrade '12 years ago: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Internet Update After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Menu → Customer Support Software update Update now 2 USB upgrade [Downpath: Samsung Electronics homepage access → customer support → model search → download → firmware → firmware file download → decompression and save in USB memory → USB TV connection] Installation method After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Before '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Upgrade → USB Upgrade Menu → Customer Support Software update Select Upgrade to USB

question: There's noise, dots, and nausea on the screen.
answer:
Broadcasting signal check guide Symptoms that occur on a specific channel may occur due to a broadcast signal abnormality, not a product abnormality. TVs can watch digital and analog broadcasts at the same time, which can occur if the broadcast signal is weak when watching analog wired broadcasting channels. In this case, please contact the broadcaster for a broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. Self-diagnosis method If the image quality looks bad, it may occur due to a broadcast signal problem, TV abnormality, or abnormality of the product can be checked through the image quality test function. Image quality test entry method Run [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Image Quality Test]. Menu - Customer Support Self-diagnosis Image quality test Checking for abnormality During the image quality test, the high-definition image built into the TV is displayed on the screen, and if the high-definition image is clearly visible without noise , it is a symptom caused by a broadcast signal problem, not a product problem. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. If there is noise in the displayed high-definition image, it may occur due to circuit abnormalities and you need to check it. Check the connection between the set-top box and the TV You need to check the connection terminal to connect the set-top box and watch the broadcast in high definition. If you watch a broadcast with an external input, image quality deterioration may occur, and you need to change the connection between the TV and the set-top box with the component/HDMI terminal to watch a high-definition broadcast. Set-top box resolution change If the resolution of the set-top box is set low, image quality deterioration may occur. [How to check set-top box resolution] Press the Information Display button on the TV remote control and check the resolution displayed at the top of the TV screen. If the displayed resolution is set to 720*480, it needs to be changed to 1920*1080. [How to change the resolution of set-top box] Depending on the set-top box model, there is a button or menu setting method for selecting resolution. In the case of button type, you can change it by pressing the set-top body resolution button, and in the case of changing it in the menu, please contact the broadcaster. Even if the resolution is adjusted, if the same symptom occurs, it is necessary to reconnect the HDMI cable connected to the set-top and TV and reboot the set-top box. Matters to be verified; TV and set-top power OFF TV back cable Reconnect after separation (HDMI, component) If it is difficult to separate from the TV, Reconnect after disconnecting cable (HDMI, component) Main switch on the back of the set-top box ON 1 minute after OFF Set-top booting takes at least 1 to 10 minutes It's done when the broadcast comes out. How to upgrade the latest version of firmware In this case, you need to upgrade to the latest version of the software, and if the same symptoms occur after the upgrade, please contact the broadcaster for a set-top box or broadcast signal check [wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.]. The upgrade method is as follows. 
 ① Internet Upgrade '12 years ago: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Internet Update After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Menu → Customer Support Software update Update now 
 ② USB Upgrade [Downpath: Samsung Electronics homepage access → customer support → model search → download → firmware → firmware file download → decompression and save in USB memory → USB TV connection] Installation method After '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Update → Update now Before '13: Menu → Customer Support → Software Upgrade → USB Upgrade Menu → Customer Support Software update Select Upgrade to USB

question: There's a break in the screen.
answer:
Broadcasting signal check guide If a screen break occurs on a specific broadcasting channel, it may be caused by a weak reception of a broadcast signal, not a product abnormality. Unlike analog TVs used in the past, digital TVs appear to be abnormal in products due to symptoms such as screen stop and screen breakage when broadcasting signals are weak, but you should contact broadcasters (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check broadcasting signals. Signal strength checking method Symptoms of screen breaking while watching can occur due to broadcast signal problems, TV abnormalities, and abnormality of the product can be checked through the digital signal strength function. [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Digital Signal Intensity] By executing the digital signal strength, the antenna must receive at least 3 spaces to watch normal digital broadcasting, and if the antenna reception is displayed below 3 spaces, screen breakage symptoms may occur while watching the broadcast. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the broadcast signal. METHOD FOR CHECKING DIGITAL SIGNAL STRENGTH OF PRODUCT BEFORE 2008 Check [Menu → Channel → Digital Signal Intensity]. Digital signal strength Menu - Channel - Digital Signal Intensity How to check product digital signal strength since 2009 Check [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Digital Signal Intensity]. Self-diagnosis Digital signal strength Menu - Customer Support - Self Diagnosis - Digital Signal Intensity Products since 2015 [Menu → Customer Support → Self Diagnosis → Digital Signal Intensity] will be carried out. Menu - Customer Support - Self Diagnosis - Digital Signal Intensity Set-top box inspection guide If a screen break occurs while watching a broadcast through a set-top box, it may occur due to a set-top box abnormality or weak reception of a broadcast signal. In this case, please contact the broadcaster (wired, cable, skylife, IPTV, etc.) to check the set-top box or broadcast signal. Matters to be verified; TV and set-top power OFF TV back cable Reconnect after separation (HDMI, component) If it is difficult to separate from the TV, Reconnect after disconnecting cable (HDMI, component) Main switch on the back of the set-top box ON 1 minute after OFF Set-top booting takes at least 1 to 10 minutes It's done when the broadcast comes out. question: The phrase "start internal inspection" appears on the screen...
answer: Cause of internal inspection start phrase occurrence If you press the return key of the remote control for more than 3 seconds, the TV's own defect review program will run and the phrase "Start internal inspection" will appear. How to check and take action The "Start internal inspection" phrase screen is a function that examines whether a defect occurs on the TV itself and is not defective. You can exit by pressing the “Select Cancel” or exit button in OSD. "Start internal inspection" phrase screen → Press the return key for more than 3 seconds to see the internal inspection phrase. → Press the "Select Cancel" or remote control "End" button to cancel.

question: Please tell me how to connect TV and sound bar HDMI (ARC).
answer:
[Video subtitles] 
 ※ This video is a video without voice. TV and Soundbar HDMI (ARC) Connection
 1.Prepare the genuine HDMI cable. Unauthenticated cable Errors may occur when using. Check the print or imprint of the HDMI cable.
 2. Cable to TV’s “ HDMI input (ARC) Connect to ”
 3. Connect to “HDMI OUT (TV-ARC)” on the bottom of the soundbar. If you connect to the “HDMI IN“ terminal, there is no sound.
 4. Turn on the TV.
 5. Press the remote control of the sound bar or the power button of the main body.
 6. “TV ARC” appears in the front display window and TV sound is played. I can't hear the TV.
 1.Initialize the product with the sound bar on.
 2. Press two volume buttons on the sound bar for more than 5 seconds at the same time.
 3. Front display window “INTI” → “BYE” appears and the power is turned off.
 4. Remove and reconnect the power cord of the TV and sound bar completely. And please turn on the power of both products.
 5. Press the home button on the TV remote control. Go to Settings and change Sound Output to Soundbar.
 6. “TV ARC” appears in the front display window and TV sound is played.
 7. I informed you about HDMI (ARC) connection between Samsung sound bar and TV. 
 ※ Uncertified cable: Please check the compatible cable, HDMI cable imprint, or contact the cable manufacturer. 
 ※ HDMI input (ARC): HDMI terminal HDMI input (ARC) Please connect me to the marked terminal. 
 ※ Front display window: Light phrases are displayed on the front of the sound bar.
